139 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
140 /**
141  * @brief MainWindow constructor.
142  * @param parent parent widget.
143  */
144 MainWindow::MainWindow(QWidget *parent)
145  : MainWindowsNoGUI(parent)
146  , ui(new Ui::MainWindow)
147  , watcher(new QFileSystemWatcher(this))
148  , currentTool(Tool::Arrow)
149  , lastUsedTool(Tool::Arrow)
150  , draftScene(nullptr)
151  , pieceScene(nullptr)
152  , mouseCoordinates(nullptr)
153  , infoToolButton(nullptr)
154  , helpLabel(nullptr)
155  , isInitialized(false)
156  , mChanges(false)
157  , mChangesAsked(true)
158  , patternReadOnly(false)
159  , dialogTable(nullptr)
160  , dialogTool()
161  , historyDialog(nullptr)
162  , fontComboBox(nullptr)
163  , fontSizeComboBox(nullptr)
164  , draftBlockComboBox(nullptr)
165  , draftBlockLabel(nullptr)
166  , mode(Draw::Calculation)
167  , currentBlockIndex(0)
168  , currentToolBoxIndex(0)
169  , isToolOptionsDockVisible(true)
170  , isGroupsDockVisible(true)
171  , isLayoutsDockVisible(false)
172  , isToolboxDockVisible(true)
173  , drawMode(true)
174  , recentFileActs()
175  , separatorAct(nullptr)
176  , leftGoToStage(nullptr)
177  , rightGoToStage(nullptr)
178  , autoSaveTimer(nullptr)
179  , guiEnabled(true)
180  , gradationHeights(nullptr)
181  , gradationSizes(nullptr)
182  , gradationHeightsLabel(nullptr)
183  , gradationSizesLabel(nullptr)
184  , toolProperties(nullptr)
185  , groupsWidget(nullptr)
186  , patternPiecesWidget(nullptr)
187  , lock(nullptr)
188  , zoomScaleSpinBox(nullptr)
189  , m_penToolBar(nullptr)
190  , m_penReset(nullptr)
191  , m_zoomToPointComboBox(nullptr)
192 {
193  for (int i = 0; i < MaxRecentFiles; ++i)
194  {
195  recentFileActs[i] = nullptr;
196  }
197 
198  CreateActions();
199  InitScenes();
200  doc = new VPattern(pattern, &mode, draftScene, pieceScene);
201  connect(doc, &VPattern::ClearMainWindow, this, &MainWindow::Clear);
202  connect(doc, &VPattern::patternChanged, this, &MainWindow::patternChangesWereSaved);
203  connect(doc, &VPattern::UndoCommand, this, &MainWindow::fullParseFile);
204  connect(doc, &VPattern::setGuiEnabled, this, &MainWindow::setGuiEnabled);
205  connect(doc, &VPattern::CheckLayout, this, [this]()
206  {
207  if (pattern->DataPieces()->count() == 0)
208  {
209  if(!ui->showDraftMode->isChecked())
210  {
211  showDraftMode(true);
212  }
213  }
214  });
215  connect(doc, &VPattern::setCurrentDraftBlock, this, &MainWindow::changeDraftBlockGlobally);
216  connect(doc, &VPattern::CheckLayout, this, [&](){
217  this->updateZoomToPointComboBox(draftPointNamesList());
218  });
219  qApp->setCurrentDocument(doc);
220  qApp->setCurrentData(pattern);
221 
222  showMaximized();
223  InitDocksContain();
224  CreateMenus();
225  initDraftToolBar();
226  initPointNameToolBar();
227  initModesToolBar();
228  InitToolButtons();
229  initPenToolBar();
230 
231  helpLabel = new QLabel(QObject::tr("Create new pattern piece to start working."));
232  ui->statusBar->addWidget(helpLabel);
233 
234  initToolsToolBar();
235 
236  connect(qApp->getUndoStack(), &QUndoStack::cleanChanged, this, &MainWindow::patternChangesWereSaved);
237 
238  InitAutoSave();
239 
240  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentIndex(0);
241 
242  ReadSettings();
243  initToolBarVisibility();
244 
245  setCurrentFile("");
246  WindowsLocale();
247 
248  connect(ui->listWidget, &QListWidget::currentRowChanged, this, &MainWindow::showLayoutPages);
249 
250  connect(watcher, &QFileSystemWatcher::fileChanged, this, &MainWindow::MeasurementsChanged);
251  connect(qApp, &QApplication::focusChanged, this, [this](QWidget *old, QWidget *now)
252  {
253  if (old == nullptr && isAncestorOf(now) == true)
254  {// focus IN
255  static bool asking = false;
256  if (!asking && mChanges && not mChangesAsked)
257  {
258  asking = true;
259  mChangesAsked = true;
260  const auto answer = QMessageBox::question(this, tr("Measurements"),
261  tr("Measurements were changed. Do you want to sync measurements now?"),
262  QMessageBox::Yes|QMessageBox::No, QMessageBox::Yes);
263  if (answer == QMessageBox::Yes)
264  {
265  SyncMeasurements();
266  }
267  asking = false;
268  }
269  }
270 
271  // In case we will need it
272  // else if (isAncestorOf(old) == true && now == nullptr)
273  // focus OUT
274  });
275 
276 #if defined(Q_OS_MAC)
277  // On Mac default icon size is 32x32.
278  ui->draft_ToolBar->setIconSize(QSize(24, 24));
279  ui->mode_ToolBar->setIconSize(QSize(24, 24));
280  ui->edit_Toolbar->setIconSize(QSize(24, 24));
281  ui->zoom_ToolBar->setIconSize(QSize(24, 24));
282 
283  setUnifiedTitleAndToolBarOnMac(true);
284 
285  // Mac OS Dock Menu
286  QMenu *menu = new QMenu(this);
287 
288  QAction *newPattern_Action = menu->addAction(tr("New pattern"));
289  newPattern_Action->setMenuRole(QAction::NoRole);
290  connect(newPattern_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::New);
291 
292  QAction *openPattern_Action = menu->addAction(tr("Open pattern"));
293  openPattern_Action->setMenuRole(QAction::NoRole);
294  connect(openPattern_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::Open);
295 
296  QAction *openSeamlyMe_Action = menu->addAction(tr("Create/Edit measurements"));
297  openSeamlyMe_Action->setMenuRole(QAction::NoRole);
298  connect(openSeamlyMe_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::CreateMeasurements);
299 
300  QAction *appPreferences_Action = menu->addAction(tr("Preferences"));
301  appPreferences_Action->setMenuRole(QAction::NoRole);
302  connect(appPreferences_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::Preferences);
303 
304  menu->setAsDockMenu();
305 #endif //defined(Q_OS_MAC)
306 }
307 
308 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
309 void MainWindow::addDraftBlock(const QString &blockName)
310 {
311  if (doc->appendDraftBlock(blockName) == false)
312  {
313  qCWarning(vMainWindow, "Error creating draft block with the name %s.", qUtf8Printable(blockName));
314  return;
315  }
316 
317  if (draftBlockComboBox->count() == 0)
318  {
319  draftScene->InitOrigins();
320  draftScene->enablePiecesMode(qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->getShowControlPoints());
321  pieceScene->InitOrigins();
322  }
323 
324  draftBlockComboBox->blockSignals(true);
325  draftBlockComboBox->addItem(blockName);
326 
327  pattern->ClearGObjects();
328  //Create single point
329  emit ui->view->itemClicked(nullptr);//hide options previous tool
330  const QString label = doc->GenerateLabel(LabelType::NewPatternPiece);
331  const QPointF startPosition = draftBlockStartPosition();
332  VPointF *point = new VPointF(startPosition.x(), startPosition.y(), label, 5, 10);
333  auto spoint = VToolBasePoint::Create(0, blockName, point, draftScene, doc, pattern, Document::FullParse,
334  Source::FromGui);
335  ui->view->itemClicked(spoint);
336 
337  setToolsEnabled(true);
338  setWidgetsEnabled(true);
339 
340  const qint32 index = draftBlockComboBox->findText(blockName);
341  if (index != -1)
342  { // -1 for not found
343  draftBlockComboBox->setCurrentIndex(index);
344  }
345  else
346  {
347  draftBlockComboBox->setCurrentIndex(0);
348  }
349  draftBlockComboBox->blockSignals(false);
350 
351  // Show best for new PP
352  VMainGraphicsView::NewSceneRect(ui->view->scene(), ui->view, spoint);
353  ui->view->zoom100Percent();
354 
355  ui->newDraft_Action->setEnabled(true);
356  helpLabel->setText("");
357  groupsWidget->updateGroups();
358 }
359 
360 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
361 QPointF MainWindow::draftBlockStartPosition() const
362 {
363  const qreal originX = 30.0;
364  const qreal originY = 40.0;
365  const qreal margin = 40.0;
366  if (draftBlockComboBox->count() > 1)
367  {
368  const QRectF rect = draftScene->visibleItemsBoundingRect();
369  if (rect.width() <= rect.height())
370  {
371  return QPointF(rect.width()+margin, originY);
372  }
373  else
374  {
375  return QPointF(originX, rect.height()+margin);
376  }
377  }
378  else
379  {
380  return QPointF(originX, originY);
381  }
382 }
383 
384 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
385 void MainWindow::InitScenes()
386 {
387  draftScene = new VMainGraphicsScene(this);
388  currentScene = draftScene;
389  qApp->setCurrentScene(&currentScene);
390  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableItemMove, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::EnableItemMove);
391  connect(this, &MainWindow::ItemsSelection, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ItemsSelection);
392 
393  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableLabelSelection, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleLabelSelection);
394  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnablePointSelection, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::TogglePointSelection);
395  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableLineSelection, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleLineSelection);
396  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableArcSelection, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleArcSelection);
397  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableElArcSelection, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleElArcSelection);
398  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableSplineSelection, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleSplineSelection);
399  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableSplinePathSelection, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleSplinePathSelection);
400 
401  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableLabelHover, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleLabelHover);
402  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnablePointHover, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::TogglePointHover);
403  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableLineHover, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleLineHover);
404  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableArcHover, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleArcHover);
405  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableElArcHover, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleElArcHover);
406  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableSplineHover, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleSplineHover);
407  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableSplinePathHover, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleSplinePathHover);
408 
409  connect(draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::mouseMove, this, &MainWindow::MouseMove);
410 
411  pieceScene = new VMainGraphicsScene(this);
412  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableItemMove, pieceScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::EnableItemMove);
413 
414  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableNodeLabelSelection, pieceScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleNodeLabelSelection);
415  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableNodePointSelection, pieceScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleNodePointSelection);
416  connect(this, &MainWindow::enablePieceSelection, pieceScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::togglePieceSelection);
417 
418  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableNodeLabelHover, pieceScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleNodeLabelHover);
419  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableNodePointHover, pieceScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleNodePointHover);
420  connect(this, &MainWindow::enablePieceHover, pieceScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::togglePieceHover);
421 
422  connect(pieceScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::mouseMove, this, &MainWindow::MouseMove);
423 
424  ui->view->setScene(currentScene);
425 
426  draftScene->setCurrentTransform(ui->view->transform());
427  pieceScene->setCurrentTransform(ui->view->transform());
428 
429  connect(ui->view, &VMainGraphicsView::mouseRelease, this, [this](){EndVisualization(true);});
430  connect(ui->view, &VMainGraphicsView::signalZoomScaleChanged, this, &MainWindow::zoomScaleChanged);
431 
432  QSizePolicy policy(QSizePolicy::Expanding, QSizePolicy::Expanding);
433  policy.setHorizontalStretch(12);
434  ui->view->setSizePolicy(policy);
435  qApp->setSceneView(ui->view);
436 }
437 
438 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
439 QSharedPointer<MeasurementDoc> MainWindow::openMeasurementFile(const QString &fileName)
440 {
441  QSharedPointer<MeasurementDoc> measurements;
442  if (fileName.isEmpty())
443  {
444  return measurements;
445  }
446 
447  try
448  {
449  measurements = QSharedPointer<MeasurementDoc>(new MeasurementDoc(pattern));
450  measurements->setSize(VContainer::rsize());
451  measurements->setHeight(VContainer::rheight());
452  measurements->setXMLContent(fileName);
453 
454  if (measurements->Type() == MeasurementsType::Unknown)
455  {
456  VException exception(tr("Measurement file has unknown format."));
457  throw exception;
458  }
459 
460  if (measurements->Type() == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
461  {
462  MultiSizeConverter converter(fileName);
463  measurements->setXMLContent(converter.Convert());// Read again after conversion
464  }
465  else
466  {
467  IndividualSizeConverter converter(fileName);
468  measurements->setXMLContent(converter.Convert());// Read again after conversion
469  }
470 
471  if (!measurements->eachKnownNameIsValid())
472  {
473  VException exception(tr("Measurement file contains invalid known measurement(s)."));
474  throw exception;
475  }
476 
477  checkRequiredMeasurements(measurements.data());
478 
479  if (measurements->Type() == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
480  {
481  if (measurements->measurementUnits() == Unit::Inch)
482  {
483  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Wrong units.")),
484  qUtf8Printable(tr("Application doesn't support multisize table with inches.")));
485  measurements->clear();
486  if (!VApplication::IsGUIMode())
487  {
488  qApp->exit(V_EX_DATAERR);
489  }
490  return measurements;
491  }
492  }
493  }
494 
495  catch (VException &exception)
496  {
497  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("File exception.")),
498  qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()), qUtf8Printable(exception.DetailedInformation()));
499  measurements->clear();
500  if (!VApplication::IsGUIMode())
501  {
502  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
503  }
504  return measurements;
505  }
506  return measurements;
507 }
508 
509 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
510 bool MainWindow::loadMeasurements(const QString &fileName)
511 {
512  QSharedPointer<MeasurementDoc> measurements = openMeasurementFile(fileName);
513 
514  if (measurements->isNull())
515  {
516  return false;
517  }
518 
519  if (qApp->patternUnit() == Unit::Inch && measurements->Type() == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
520  {
521  qWarning() << tr("Gradation doesn't support inches");
522  return false;
523  }
524 
525  try
526  {
527  qApp->setPatternType(measurements->Type());
528  initStatusBar();
529  pattern->ClearVariables(VarType::Measurement);
530  measurements->readMeasurements();
531  }
532 
533  catch (VExceptionEmptyParameter &exception)
534  {
535  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("File exception.")),
536  qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()), qUtf8Printable(exception.DetailedInformation()));
537 
538  if (!VApplication::IsGUIMode())
539  {
540  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
541  }
542  return false;
543  }
544 
545  if (measurements->Type() == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
546  {
547 
548  VContainer::setSize(UnitConvertor(measurements->BaseSize(), measurements->measurementUnits(),
549  *measurements->GetData()->GetPatternUnit()));
550 
551  qCInfo(vMainWindow, "Multisize file %s was loaded.", qUtf8Printable(fileName));
552 
553  VContainer::setHeight(UnitConvertor(measurements->BaseHeight(), measurements->measurementUnits(),
554  *measurements->GetData()->GetPatternUnit()));
555 
556  doc->SetPatternWasChanged(true);
557  emit doc->UpdatePatternLabel();
558  }
559  else if (measurements->Type() == MeasurementsType::Individual)
560  {
561 
562  setSizeHeightForIndividualM();
563 
564  qCInfo(vMainWindow, "Individual file %s was loaded.", qUtf8Printable(fileName));
565  }
566 
567  return true;
568 }
569 
570 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
571 bool MainWindow::updateMeasurements(const QString &fileName, int size, int height)
572 {
573  QSharedPointer<MeasurementDoc> measurements = openMeasurementFile(fileName);
574 
575  if (measurements->isNull())
576  {
577  return false;
578  }
579 
580  if (qApp->patternType() != measurements->Type())
581  {
582  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Measurement files types have not match.")));
583  if (!VApplication::IsGUIMode())
584  {
585  qApp->exit(V_EX_DATAERR);
586  }
587  return false;
588  }
589 
590  try
591  {
592  pattern->ClearVariables(VarType::Measurement);
593  measurements->readMeasurements();
594  }
595 
596  catch (VExceptionEmptyParameter &exception)
597  {
598  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("File exception.")),
599  qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()), qUtf8Printable(exception.DetailedInformation()));
600 
601  if (!VApplication::IsGUIMode())
602  {
603  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
604  }
605  return false;
606  }
607 
608  if (measurements->Type() == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
609  {
610  VContainer::setSize(size);
611  VContainer::setHeight(height);
612 
613  doc->SetPatternWasChanged(true);
614  emit doc->UpdatePatternLabel();
615  }
616  else if (measurements->Type() == MeasurementsType::Individual)
617  {
618  setSizeHeightForIndividualM();
619  }
620 
621  return true;
622 }
623 
624 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
625 void MainWindow::checkRequiredMeasurements(const MeasurementDoc *measurements)
626 {
627  auto tempMeasurements = measurements->ListAll();
628  auto docMeasurements = doc->ListMeasurements();
629  const QSet<QString> match = QSet<QString>(docMeasurements.begin(), docMeasurements.end()).
630  subtract(QSet<QString>(tempMeasurements.begin(), tempMeasurements.end()));
631  if (!match.isEmpty())
632  {
633  QList<QString> list = match.values();
634  for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i)
635  {
636  list[i] = qApp->TrVars()->MToUser(list.at(i));
637  }
638 
639  VException exception(tr("Measurement file doesn't include all the required measurements."));
640  exception.AddMoreInformation(tr("Please provide additional measurements: %1").arg(QStringList(list).join(", ")));
641  throw exception;
642  }
643 }
644 
645 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
646 /**
647  * @brief SetToolButton set tool and show dialog.
648  * @param checked true if tool button checked.
649  * @param t tool type.
650  * @param cursor path tool cursor icon.
651  * @param toolTip first tooltipe.
652  * @param closeDialogSlot function what handle after close dialog.
653  */
654 template <typename Dialog, typename Func>
655 void MainWindow::SetToolButton(bool checked, Tool t, const QString &cursor, const QString &toolTip,
656  Func closeDialogSlot)
657 {
658  if (checked)
659  {
660  CancelTool();
661  emit EnableItemMove(false);
662  currentTool = lastUsedTool = t;
663  auto cursorResource = cursor;
664  if (qApp->devicePixelRatio() >= 2)
665  {
666  // Try to load HiDPI versions of the cursors if available
667  auto cursorHidpiResource = QString(cursor).replace(".png", "@2x.png");
668  if (QFileInfo(cursorResource).exists())
669  {
670  cursorResource = cursorHidpiResource;
671  }
672  }
673  QPixmap pixmap(cursorResource);
674  QCursor cur(pixmap, 2, 2);
675  ui->view->viewport()->setCursor(cur);
676  helpLabel->setText(toolTip);
677  ui->view->setShowToolOptions(false);
678  dialogTool = QSharedPointer<Dialog>(new Dialog(pattern, 0, this));
679 
680  switch(t)
681  {
682  case Tool::ArcIntersectAxis:
683  dialogTool->setWindowTitle("Point - Intersect Arc and Axis");
684  break;
685  case Tool::Midpoint:
686  dialogTool->Build(t);
687  break;
688  case Tool::InternalPath:
689  case Tool::AnchorPoint:
690  case Tool::InsertNodes:
691  dialogTool->SetPiecesList(doc->getActivePatternPieces());
692  break;
693  default:
694  break;
695  }
696 
697  VMainGraphicsScene *scene = qobject_cast<VMainGraphicsScene *>(currentScene);
698  SCASSERT(scene != nullptr)
699 
700  connect(scene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ChosenObject, dialogTool.data(), &DialogTool::ChosenObject);
701  connect(scene, &VMainGraphicsScene::SelectedObject, dialogTool.data(), &DialogTool::SelectedObject);
702  connect(dialogTool.data(), &DialogTool::DialogClosed, this, closeDialogSlot);
703  connect(dialogTool.data(), &DialogTool::ToolTip, this, &MainWindow::ShowToolTip);
704  emit ui->view->itemClicked(nullptr);
705  }
706  else
707  {
708  if (QToolButton *tButton = qobject_cast< QToolButton * >(this->sender()))
709  {
710  tButton->setChecked(true);
711  }
712  }
713 }
714 
715 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
716 template <typename Dialog, typename Func, typename Func2>
717 /**
718  * @brief SetToolButtonWithApply set tool and show dialog.
719  * @param checked true if tool button checked.
720  * @param t tool type.
721  * @param cursor path tool cursor icon.
722  * @param toolTip first tooltipe.
723  * @param closeDialogSlot function to handle close of dialog.
724  * @param applyDialogSlot function to handle apply in dialog.
725  */
726 void MainWindow::SetToolButtonWithApply(bool checked, Tool t, const QString &cursor, const QString &toolTip,
727  Func closeDialogSlot, Func2 applyDialogSlot)
728 {
729  if (checked)
730  {
731  SetToolButton<Dialog>(checked, t, cursor, toolTip, closeDialogSlot);
732 
733  connect(dialogTool.data(), &DialogTool::DialogApplied, this, applyDialogSlot);
734  }
735  else
736  {
737  if (QToolButton *tButton = qobject_cast< QToolButton * >(this->sender()))
738  {
739  tButton->setChecked(true);
740  }
741  }
742 }
743 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
744 /**
745  * @brief ClosedDialog handle close dialog
746  * @param result result working dialog.
747  */
748 template <typename DrawTool>
749 void MainWindow::ClosedDialog(int result)
750 {
751  SCASSERT(!dialogTool.isNull())
752  if (result == QDialog::Accepted)
753  {
754  VMainGraphicsScene *scene = qobject_cast<VMainGraphicsScene *>(currentScene);
755  SCASSERT(scene != nullptr)
756 
757  QGraphicsItem *tool = dynamic_cast<QGraphicsItem *>(DrawTool::Create(dialogTool, scene, doc, pattern));
758  // Do not check for nullptr! See issue #719.
759  ui->view->itemClicked(tool);
760  }
761  handleArrowTool(true);
762 }
763 
764 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
765 /**
766  * @brief ClosedDialogWithApply handle close dialog that has apply button
767  * @param result result working dialog.
768  */
769 template <typename DrawTool>
770 void MainWindow::ClosedDialogWithApply(int result, VMainGraphicsScene *scene)
771 {
772  SCASSERT(!dialogTool.isNull())
773  if (result == QDialog::Accepted)
774  {
775  ApplyDialog<DrawTool>(scene);
776  }
777  // If before Cancel was used Apply we have an item
778  DrawTool *vtool = qobject_cast<DrawTool *>(dialogTool->GetAssociatedTool());// Don't check for nullptr here
779  if (dialogTool->GetAssociatedTool() != nullptr)
780  {
781  SCASSERT(vtool != nullptr)
782  vtool->DialogLinkDestroy();
783  connect(vtool, &DrawTool::ToolTip, this, &MainWindow::ShowToolTip);
784  }
785  handleArrowTool(true);
786  ui->view->itemClicked(vtool);// Don't check for nullptr here
787  // If insert not to the end of file call lite parse
788  if (doc->getCursor() > 0)
789  {
790  doc->LiteParseTree(Document::LiteParse);
791  if (historyDialog)
792  {
793  historyDialog->updateHistory();
794  }
795  }
796 }
797 
798 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
799 /**
800  * @brief ApplyDialog handle apply in dialog
801  */
802 template <typename DrawTool>
803 void MainWindow::ApplyDialog(VMainGraphicsScene *scene)
804 {
805  SCASSERT(!dialogTool.isNull())
806 
807  // Only create tool if not already created with apply
808  if (dialogTool->GetAssociatedTool() == nullptr)
809  {
810  SCASSERT(scene != nullptr)
811 
812  dialogTool->SetAssociatedTool(DrawTool::Create(dialogTool, scene, doc, pattern));
813  }
814  else
815  { // Or update associated tool with data
816  DrawTool * vtool = qobject_cast<DrawTool *>(dialogTool->GetAssociatedTool());
817  SCASSERT(vtool != nullptr)
818  vtool->FullUpdateFromGuiApply();
819  }
820 }
821 
822 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
823 template <typename DrawTool>
824 void MainWindow::ClosedDrawDialogWithApply(int result)
825 {
826  ClosedDialogWithApply<DrawTool>(result, draftScene);
827 }
828 
829 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
830 template <typename DrawTool>
831 void MainWindow::ApplyDrawDialog()
832 {
833  ApplyDialog<DrawTool>(draftScene);
834 }
835 
836 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
837 template <typename DrawTool>
838 void MainWindow::ClosedPiecesDialogWithApply(int result)
839 {
840  ClosedDialogWithApply<DrawTool>(result, pieceScene);
841  if (pattern->DataPieces()->size() > 0)
842  {
843  ui->anchorPoint_ToolButton->setEnabled(true);
844  ui->internalPath_ToolButton->setEnabled(true);
845  ui->insertNodes_ToolButton->setEnabled(true);
846  ui->anchorPoint_Action->setEnabled(true);
847  ui->internalPath_Action->setEnabled(true);
848  ui->insertNodes_Action->setEnabled(true);
849  }
850 }
851 
852 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
853 template <typename DrawTool>
854 void MainWindow::applyPiecesDialog()
855 {
856  ApplyDialog<DrawTool>(pieceScene);
857 }
858 
859 //Points
860 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
861 void MainWindow::handleMidpointTool(bool checked)
862 {
863  ToolSelectPointByRelease();
864  // Reuse DialogAlongLine and VToolAlongLine but with different cursor
865  SetToolButtonWithApply<DialogAlongLine>
866  (
867  checked,
868  Tool::Midpoint,
869  ":/cursor/midpoint_cursor.png",
870  tr("<b>Tool::Point - Midpoint on Line</b>: Select first point"),
871  &MainWindow::ClosedDrawDialogWithApply<VToolAlongLine>,
872  &MainWindow::ApplyDrawDialog<VToolAlongLine>
873  );
874 }
875

1347  "://cursor/point_from_arc_and_tangent_cursor.png",
1348  tr("<b>Tool::Point - Intersect Arc and Tangent:</b> Select point on tangent"),
1349  &MainWindow::ClosedDrawDialogWithApply<VToolPointFromArcAndTangent>,
1350  &MainWindow::ApplyDrawDialog<VToolPointFromArcAndTangent>
1351  );
1352 }

1390 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1391 void MainWindow::handleGroupTool(bool checked)
1392 {
1393  ToolSelectGroupObjects();
1394  const QString tooltip = tr("<b>Tool::Operations - Create Group:</b> Select one or more objects -"
1395  " Hold <b>%1</b> for multiple selection, "
1396  "Press <b>ENTER</b> to finish group creation ")
1397  .arg(QCoreApplication::translate(strQShortcut.toUtf8().constData(),
1398  strCtrl.toUtf8().constData()));
1399  SetToolButton<AddToGroupDialog>
1400  (
1401  checked,
1402  Tool::Group,
1403  ":/cursor/group_cursor.png",
1404  tooltip,
1405  &MainWindow::ClosedEditGroupDialog
1406  );
1407 }
1408 
1409 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1410 void MainWindow::ClosedEditGroupDialog(int result)
1411 {
1412  SCASSERT(dialogTool != nullptr)
1413  if (result == QDialog::Accepted)
1414  {
1415  QSharedPointer<AddToGroupDialog> dialog = dialogTool.objectCast<AddToGroupDialog>();
1416  SCASSERT(dialog != nullptr)
1417 
1418  QString gName = dialog->getName();
1419  QMap<quint32, quint32> gData = dialog->getGroupData();
1420  QDomElement group = doc->addGroupItems(gName, gData);
1421  if (group.isNull())
1422  {
1423  QMessageBox::information(this, tr("Add Group Objects"), tr("Group is Locked. Unlock to add objects"),
1424  QMessageBox::Ok, QMessageBox::Ok);
1425  }
1426  }
1427  handleArrowTool(true);
1428 }
1429

1614 void MainWindow::ClosedInsertNodesDialog(int result)
1615 {
1616  SCASSERT(dialogTool != nullptr);
1617  if (result == QDialog::Accepted)
1618  {
1619  QSharedPointer<InsertNodesDialog> tool = dialogTool.objectCast<InsertNodesDialog>();
1620  SCASSERT(tool != nullptr)
1621  PatternPieceTool::insertNodes(tool->getNodes(), tool->getPieceId(), pieceScene, pattern, doc);
1622  }
1623  handleArrowTool(true);
1624  doc->LiteParseTree(Document::LiteParse);
1625 }

1724 
1725 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1726 /**
1727  * @brief showEvent handle after show window.
1728  * @param event show event.
1729  */
1730 void MainWindow::showEvent(QShowEvent *event)
1731 {
1732  QMainWindow::showEvent(event);
1733  if (event->spontaneous())
1734  {
1735  return;
1736  }
1737 
1738  if (isInitialized)
1739  {
1740  return;
1741  }
1742  // do your init stuff here
1743 
1744  MinimumScrollBar();
1745 
1746  isInitialized = true;//first show windows are held
1747 }
1748 
1749 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1750 void MainWindow::changeEvent(QEvent *event)
1751 {
1752  if (event->type() == QEvent::LanguageChange)
1753  {
1754  // retranslate designer form (single inheritance approach)
1755  ui->retranslateUi(this);
1756  undoAction->setText(tr("&Undo"));
1757  redoAction->setText(tr("&Redo"));
1758  helpLabel->setText(QObject::tr("Changes applied."));
1759  draftBlockLabel->setText(tr("Draft Block:"));
1760 
1761  if (mode == Draw::Calculation)
1762  {
1763  ui->groups_DockWidget->setWindowTitle(tr("Group Manager"));
1764  }
1765  else
1766  {
1767  ui->groups_DockWidget->setWindowTitle(tr("Pattern Pieces"));
1768  }
1769 
1770  UpdateWindowTitle();
1771  initPenToolBar();
1772  emit pieceScene->LanguageChanged();
1773  }
1774  // remember to call base class implementation
1775  QMainWindow::changeEvent(event);
1776 }
1777 
1778 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1779 /**
1780  * @brief closeEvent handle after close window.
1781  * @param event close event.
1782  */
1783 void MainWindow::closeEvent(QCloseEvent *event)
1784 {
1785  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Closing main window");
1786  if (MaybeSave())
1787  {
1788  FileClosedCorrect();
1789 
1790  event->accept();
1791  QApplication::closeAllWindows();
1792  }
1793  else
1794  {
1795  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Closing canceled.");
1796  event->ignore();
1797  }
1798 }
1799 
1800 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1801 void MainWindow::customEvent(QEvent *event)
1802 {
1803  if (event->type() == UNDO_EVENT)
1804  {
1805  qApp->getUndoStack()->undo();
1806  }
1807 }
1808 
1809 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1810 void MainWindow::CleanLayout()
1811 {
1812  qDeleteAll (scenes);
1813  scenes.clear();
1814  shadows.clear();
1815  papers.clear();
1816  ui->listWidget->clear();
1817  groupsWidget->clear();
1818  SetLayoutModeActions();
1819 }
1820 
1821 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1822 void MainWindow::PrepareSceneList()
1823 {
1824  for (int i=1; i<=scenes.size(); ++i)
1825  {
1826  QListWidgetItem *item = new QListWidgetItem(ScenePreview(i-1), QString::number(i));
1827  ui->listWidget->addItem(item);
1828  }
1829 
1830  if (!scenes.isEmpty())
1831  {
1832  ui->listWidget->setCurrentRow(0);
1833  SetLayoutModeActions();
1834  }
1835 }
1836 
1837 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1838 void MainWindow::exportToCSVData(const QString &fileName, const DialogExportToCSV &dialog)
1839 {
1840  QxtCsvModel csv;
1841 
1842  csv.insertColumn(0);
1843  csv.insertColumn(1);
1844  csv.insertColumn(2);
1845 
1846  if (dialog.WithHeader())
1847  {
1848  csv.setHeaderText(0, tr("Name"));
1849  csv.setHeaderText(1, tr("The calculated value"));
1850  csv.setHeaderText(2, tr("Formula"));
1851  }
1852 
1853  const QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<VIncrement> > increments = pattern->variablesData();
1854  QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<VIncrement> >::const_iterator i;
1855  QMap<quint32, QString> map;
1856  //Sorting QHash by id
1857  for (i = increments.constBegin(); i != increments.constEnd(); ++i)
1858  {
1859  QSharedPointer<VIncrement> incr = i.value();
1860  map.insert(incr->getIndex(), i.key());
1861  }
1862 
1863  qint32 currentRow = -1;
1864  QMapIterator<quint32, QString> iMap(map);
1865  while (iMap.hasNext())
1866  {
1867  iMap.next();
1868  QSharedPointer<VIncrement> incr = increments.value(iMap.value());
1869  currentRow++;
1870 
1871  csv.insertRow(currentRow);
1872  csv.setText(currentRow, 0, incr->GetName()); // name
1873  csv.setText(currentRow, 1, qApp->LocaleToString(*incr->GetValue())); // calculated value
1874 
1875  QString formula;
1876  try
1877  {
1878  formula = qApp->TrVars()->FormulaToUser(incr->GetFormula(), qApp->Settings()->GetOsSeparator());
1879  }
1880  catch (qmu::QmuParserError &error)
1881  {
1882  Q_UNUSED(error)
1883  formula = incr->GetFormula();
1884  }
1885 
1886  csv.setText(currentRow, 2, formula); // formula
1887  }
1888 
1889  csv.toCSV(fileName, dialog.WithHeader(), dialog.Separator(), QTextCodec::codecForMib(dialog.SelectedMib()));
1890 }
1891 
1892 void MainWindow::handleExportToCSV()
1893 {
1894  QString file = tr("untitled");
1895  if(!qApp->getFilePath().isEmpty())
1896  {
1897  QString filePath = qApp->getFilePath();
1898  file = QFileInfo(filePath).baseName();
1899  }
1900  exportToCSV(file);
1901 }
1902 
1903 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1904 void MainWindow::LoadIndividual()
1905 {
1906  const QString filter = tr("Individual measurements") + QLatin1String(" (*.") + smisExt +
1907  QLatin1String(" *.") + vitExt + QLatin1String(")");
1908 
1909  //Use standard path to individual measurements
1910  const QString dir = qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->getIndividualSizePath();
1911 
1912  bool usedNotExistedDir = false;
1913 
1914  QDir directory(dir);
1915 
1916  if (!directory.exists())
1917  {
1918  usedNotExistedDir = directory.mkpath(".");
1919  }
1920 
1921  const QString filename = fileDialog(this, tr("Open file"), dir, filter, nullptr, QFileDialog::DontUseNativeDialog,
1922  QFileDialog::ExistingFile, QFileDialog::AcceptOpen);
1923 
1924 
1925  if (!filename.isEmpty())
1926  {
1927  if (loadMeasurements(filename))
1928  {
1929  if (!doc->MPath().isEmpty())
1930  {
1931  watcher->removePath(AbsoluteMPath(qApp->getFilePath(), doc->MPath()));
1932  }
1933 
1934  qCInfo(vMainWindow, "Individual file %s was loaded.", qUtf8Printable(filename));
1935 
1936  ui->unloadMeasurements_Action->setEnabled(true);
1937 
1938  doc->SetMPath(RelativeMPath(qApp->getFilePath(), filename));
1939  watcher->addPath(filename);
1940  patternChangesWereSaved(false);
1941 
1942  ui->editCurrent_Action->setEnabled(true);
1943  helpLabel->setText(tr("Measurements loaded"));
1944  doc->LiteParseTree(Document::LiteParse);
1945 
1946  UpdateWindowTitle();
1947  }
1948  }
1949 
1950  if (usedNotExistedDir)
1951  {
1952  QDir directory(dir);
1953  directory.rmpath(".");
1954  }
1955 }
1956 
1957 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1958 void MainWindow::LoadMultisize()
1959 {
1960  const QString filter = tr("Multisize measurements") + QLatin1String(" (*.") + smmsExt +
1961  QLatin1String(" *.") + vstExt + QLatin1String(")");
1962 
1963  //Use standard path to multisize measurements
1964  QString dir = qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->getMultisizePath();
1965  dir = VCommonSettings::prepareMultisizeTables(dir);
1966 
1967  const QString filename = fileDialog(this, tr("Open file"), dir, filter, nullptr, QFileDialog::DontUseNativeDialog,
1968  QFileDialog::ExistingFile, QFileDialog::AcceptOpen);
1969 
1970  if (!filename.isEmpty())
1971  {
1972  QString hText;
1973  if (!gradationHeights.isNull())
1974  {
1975  hText = gradationHeights->currentText();
1976  }
1977  QString sText;
1978  if (!gradationSizes.isNull())
1979  {
1980  sText = gradationSizes->currentText();
1981  }
1982 
1983  if(loadMeasurements(filename))
1984  {
1985  if (!doc->MPath().isEmpty())
1986  {
1987  watcher->removePath(AbsoluteMPath(qApp->getFilePath(), doc->MPath()));
1988  }
1989 
1990  qCInfo(vMainWindow, "Multisize file %s was loaded.", qUtf8Printable(filename));
1991 
1992  ui->unloadMeasurements_Action->setEnabled(true);
1993 
1994  doc->SetMPath(RelativeMPath(qApp->getFilePath(), filename));
1995  watcher->addPath(filename);
1996  patternChangesWereSaved(false);
1997 
1998  ui->editCurrent_Action->setEnabled(true);
1999  helpLabel->setText(tr("Measurements loaded"));
2000  doc->LiteParseTree(Document::LiteParse);
2001 
2002  UpdateWindowTitle();
2003 
2004  if (qApp->patternType() == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
2005  {
2006  if (!hText.isEmpty() && not gradationHeights.isNull())
2007  {
2008  gradationHeights->setCurrentText(hText);
2009  }
2010 
2011  if (!sText.isEmpty() && not gradationSizes.isNull())
2012  {
2013  gradationSizes->setCurrentText(sText);
2014  }
2015  }
2016  }
2017  }
2018 }
2019 
2020 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2021 void MainWindow::UnloadMeasurements()
2022 {
2023  if (doc->MPath().isEmpty())
2024  {
2025  ui->unloadMeasurements_Action->setDisabled(true);
2026  return;
2027  }
2028 
2029  if (doc->ListMeasurements().isEmpty())
2030  {
2031  watcher->removePath(AbsoluteMPath(qApp->getFilePath(), doc->MPath()));
2032  if (qApp->patternType() == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
2033  {
2034  initStatusBar();
2035  }
2036  qApp->setPatternType(MeasurementsType::Unknown);
2037  doc->SetMPath(QString());
2038  emit doc->UpdatePatternLabel();
2039  patternChangesWereSaved(false);
2040  ui->editCurrent_Action->setEnabled(false);
2041  ui->unloadMeasurements_Action->setDisabled(true);
2042  helpLabel->setText(tr("Measurements unloaded"));
2043 
2044  UpdateWindowTitle();
2045  }
2046  else
2047  {
2048  qCWarning(vMainWindow, "%s",
2049  qUtf8Printable(tr("Couldn't unload measurements. Some of them are used in the pattern.")));
2050  }
2051 }
2052 
2053 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2054 void MainWindow::ShowMeasurements()
2055 {
2056  if (!doc->MPath().isEmpty())
2057  {
2058  const QString absoluteMPath = AbsoluteMPath(qApp->getFilePath(), doc->MPath());
2059 
2060  QStringList arguments;
2061  if (qApp->patternType() == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
2062  {
2063  arguments = QStringList()
2064  << absoluteMPath
2065  << "-u"
2066  << UnitsToStr(qApp->patternUnit())
2067  << "-e"
2068  << QString().setNum(static_cast<int>(UnitConvertor(VContainer::height(), doc->measurementUnits(), Unit::Cm)))
2069  << "-s"
2070  << QString().setNum(static_cast<int>(UnitConvertor(VContainer::size(), doc->measurementUnits(), Unit::Cm)));
2071  }
2072  else
2073  {
2074  arguments = QStringList() << absoluteMPath
2075  << "-u"
2076  << UnitsToStr(qApp->patternUnit());
2077  }
2078 
2079  if (isNoScaling)
2080  {
2081  arguments.append(QLatin1String("--") + LONG_OPTION_NO_HDPI_SCALING);
2082  }
2083 
2084  const QString seamlyme = qApp->SeamlyMeFilePath();
2085  const QString workingDirectory = QFileInfo(seamlyme).absoluteDir().absolutePath();
2086  QProcess::startDetached(seamlyme, arguments, workingDirectory);
2087  }
2088  else
2089  {
2090  ui->editCurrent_Action->setEnabled(false);
2091  }
2092 }
2093 
2094 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2095 void MainWindow::MeasurementsChanged(const QString &path)
2096 {
2097  mChanges = false;
2098  QFileInfo checkFile(path);
2099  if (checkFile.exists())
2100  {
2101  mChanges = true;
2102  mChangesAsked = false;
2103  }
2104  else
2105  {
2106  for(int i=0; i<=1000; i=i+10)
2107  {
2108  if (checkFile.exists())
2109  {
2110  mChanges = true;
2111  mChangesAsked = false;
2112  break;
2113  }
2114  else
2115  {
2116  std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::milliseconds(10));
2117  }
2118  }
2119  }
2120 
2121  UpdateWindowTitle();
2122  ui->syncMeasurements_Action->setEnabled(mChanges);
2123 }
2124 
2125 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2126 void MainWindow::SyncMeasurements()
2127 {
2128  if (mChanges)
2129  {
2130  const QString path = AbsoluteMPath(qApp->getFilePath(), doc->MPath());
2131  if(updateMeasurements(path, static_cast<int>(VContainer::size()), static_cast<int>(VContainer::height())))
2132  {
2133  if (!watcher->files().contains(path))
2134  {
2135  watcher->addPath(path);
2136  }
2137  const QString msg = tr("Measurements have been synced");
2138  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(msg));
2139  helpLabel->setText(msg);
2140  VWidgetPopup::PopupMessage(this, msg);
2141  doc->LiteParseTree(Document::LiteParse);
2142  mChanges = false;
2143  mChangesAsked = true;
2144  UpdateWindowTitle();
2145  ui->syncMeasurements_Action->setEnabled(mChanges);
2146  }
2147  else
2148  {
2149  qCWarning(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Couldn't sync measurements.")));
2150  }
2151  }
2152 }
2153 
2154 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2155 #if defined(Q_OS_MAC)
2156 void MainWindow::OpenAt(QAction *where)
2157 {
2158  const QString path = qApp->getFilePath().left(qApp->getFilePath().indexOf(where->text())) + where->text();
2159  if (path == qApp->getFilePath())
2160  {
2161  return;
2162  }
2163  QProcess process;
2164  process.start(QStringLiteral("/usr/bin/open"), QStringList() << path, QIODevice::ReadOnly);
2165  process.waitForFinished();
2166 }
2167 #endif //defined(Q_OS_MAC)
2168 
2169 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2170 /**
2171  * @brief initStatusBar initialize horizontal bar for presenting status information
2172  */
2173 void MainWindow::initStatusBar()
2174 {
2175  if (!mouseCoordinates.isNull())
2176  {
2177  delete mouseCoordinates;
2178  }
2179  if (!infoToolButton.isNull())
2180  {
2181  delete infoToolButton;
2182  }
2183  if (!gradationHeights.isNull())
2184  {
2185  delete gradationHeights;
2186  }
2187  if (!gradationSizes.isNull())
2188  {
2189  delete gradationSizes;
2190  }
2191  if (!gradationHeightsLabel.isNull())
2192  {
2193  delete gradationHeightsLabel;
2194  }
2195  if (!gradationSizesLabel.isNull())
2196  {
2197  delete gradationSizesLabel;
2198  }
2199 
2200  if (qApp->patternType() == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
2201  {
2202  const QStringList listHeights = MeasurementVariable::ListHeights(doc->GetGradationHeights(), qApp->patternUnit());
2203  const QStringList listSizes = MeasurementVariable::ListSizes(doc->GetGradationSizes(), qApp->patternUnit());
2204 
2205  gradationHeightsLabel = new QLabel(tr("Height:"), this);
2206  gradationHeights = SetGradationList(gradationHeightsLabel, listHeights);
2207 
2208  // set default height
2209  SetDefaultHeight();
2210 
2211  connect(gradationHeights.data(), static_cast<void (QComboBox::*)(int)>(&QComboBox::currentIndexChanged),
2212  this, &MainWindow::ChangedHeight);
2213 
2214  gradationSizesLabel = new QLabel(tr("Size:"), this);
2215  gradationSizes = SetGradationList(gradationSizesLabel, listSizes);
2216 
2217  // set default size
2218  SetDefaultSize();
2219 
2220  connect(gradationSizes.data(), static_cast<void (QComboBox::*)(int)>(&QComboBox::currentIndexChanged),
2221  this, &MainWindow::ChangedSize);
2222 
2223  }
2224 
2225  mouseCoordinates = new MouseCoordinates(qApp->patternUnit());
2226  ui->statusBar->addPermanentWidget((mouseCoordinates));
2227 
2228  infoToolButton = new QToolButton();
2229  infoToolButton->setDefaultAction(ui->documentInfo_Action);
2230  ui->statusBar->addPermanentWidget((infoToolButton));
2231 }
2232 
2233 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2234 QComboBox *MainWindow::SetGradationList(QLabel *label, const QStringList &list)
2235 {
2236  QComboBox *comboBox = new QComboBox(this);
2237  comboBox->addItems(list);
2238  ui->statusBar->addPermanentWidget(label);
2239  ui->statusBar->addPermanentWidget(comboBox);
2240 
2241  return comboBox;
2242 }
2243

2249  ui->mode_ToolBar->insertWidget(ui->pieceMode_Action, leftGoToStage);
2250 
2251  rightGoToStage = new QLabel(this);
2252  rightGoToStage->setPixmap(QPixmap("://icon/24x24/left_to_right_arrow.png"));
2253  ui->mode_ToolBar->insertWidget(ui->layoutMode_Action, rightGoToStage);
2254 }

2256 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2257 /**
2258  * @brief initPointNameToolBar enable Point Name toolbar.
2259  */
2260 void MainWindow::initPointNameToolBar()
2261 {
2262  fontComboBox = new QFontComboBox ;
2263  fontComboBox->setCurrentFont(qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->getPointNameFont());
2264  ui->pointName_ToolBar->insertWidget(ui->showPointNames_Action,fontComboBox);
2265  fontComboBox->setSizeAdjustPolicy(QComboBox::AdjustToContents);
2266  fontComboBox->setEnabled(true);
2267 
2268  connect(fontComboBox, static_cast<void (QFontComboBox::*)(const QFont &)>(&QFontComboBox::currentFontChanged),
2269  this, [this](QFont font)
2270  {
2271  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->setPointNameFont(font);
2272  upDateScenes();
2273  });
2274 
2275  fontSizeComboBox = new QComboBox ;
2276  ui->pointName_ToolBar->insertWidget(ui->showPointNames_Action,fontSizeComboBox);
2277  fontSizeComboBox->setSizeAdjustPolicy(QComboBox::AdjustToContents);
2278  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("6", QVariant(static_cast<int>(6)));
2279  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("7", QVariant(static_cast<int>(7)));
2280  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("8", QVariant(static_cast<int>(8)));
2281  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("9", QVariant(static_cast<int>(9)));
2282  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("10", QVariant(static_cast<int>(10)));
2283  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("11", QVariant(static_cast<int>(11)));
2284  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("12", QVariant(static_cast<int>(12)));
2285  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("13", QVariant(static_cast<int>(13)));
2286  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("14", QVariant(static_cast<int>(14)));
2287  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("15", QVariant(static_cast<int>(15)));
2288  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("16", QVariant(static_cast<int>(16)));
2289  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("18", QVariant(static_cast<int>(18)));
2290  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("20", QVariant(static_cast<int>(20)));
2291  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("22", QVariant(static_cast<int>(22)));
2292  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("24", QVariant(static_cast<int>(24)));
2293  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("26", QVariant(static_cast<int>(26)));
2294  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("28", QVariant(static_cast<int>(28)));
2295  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("32", QVariant(static_cast<int>(32)));
2296  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("36", QVariant(static_cast<int>(36)));
2297  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("40", QVariant(static_cast<int>(40)));
2298  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("44", QVariant(static_cast<int>(44)));
2299  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("48", QVariant(static_cast<int>(48)));
2300  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("54", QVariant(static_cast<int>(54)));
2301  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("60", QVariant(static_cast<int>(60)));
2302  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("66", QVariant(static_cast<int>(66)));
2303  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("72", QVariant(static_cast<int>(72)));
2304  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("80", QVariant(static_cast<int>(80)));
2305  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("96", QVariant(static_cast<int>(96)));
2306 
2307  int index = fontSizeComboBox->findData(qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->getPointNameSize());
2308  if (index < 0 || index > 28)
2309  {
2310  index = 18;
2311  }
2312  fontSizeComboBox->setCurrentIndex(index);
2313 
2314  connect(fontSizeComboBox, &QComboBox::currentTextChanged, this, [this](QString text)
2315  {
2316  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->setPointNameSize(text.toInt());
2317  upDateScenes();
2318  });
2319  fontSizeComboBox->setEnabled(true);
2320 }

2322 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2323 /**
2324  * @brief initDraftToolBar enable draw toolbar.
2325  */
2326 void MainWindow::initDraftToolBar()
2327 {
2328  draftBlockLabel = new QLabel(tr("Draft Block:"));
2329  ui->draft_ToolBar->addWidget(draftBlockLabel);
2330 
2331  // By using Qt UI Designer we can't add QComboBox to toolbar
2332  draftBlockComboBox = new QComboBox;
2333  ui->draft_ToolBar->addWidget(draftBlockComboBox);
2334  draftBlockComboBox->setSizeAdjustPolicy(QComboBox::AdjustToContents);
2335  draftBlockComboBox->setEnabled(false);
2336 
2337  connect(draftBlockComboBox, static_cast<void (QComboBox::*)(int)>(&QComboBox::currentIndexChanged),
2338  this, [this](int index){changeDraftBlock(index);});
2339 
2340  connect(ui->renameDraft_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this]()
2341  {
2342  const QString activeDraftBlock = doc->getActiveDraftBlockName();
2343  const QString draftBlockName = createDraftBlockName(activeDraftBlock);
2344  if (draftBlockName.isEmpty())
2345  {
2346  return;
2347  }
2348  RenameDraftBlock *draftBlock = new RenameDraftBlock(doc, draftBlockName, draftBlockComboBox);
2349  qApp->getUndoStack()->push(draftBlock);
2350  fullParseFile();
2351  });
2352 }
2353 
2354 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2355 void MainWindow::initToolsToolBar()
2356 {
2357  /*First we will try use Standard Shortcuts from Qt, but because keypad "-" and "+" not the same keys like in main
2358  keypad, shortcut Ctrl+"-" or "+" from keypad will not working with standard shortcut (QKeySequence::ZoomIn or
2359  QKeySequence::ZoomOut). For example "+" is Qt::Key_Plus + Qt::KeypadModifier for keypad.
2360  Also for me don't work Qt:CTRL and work Qt::ControlModifier.*/
2361 
2362  QList<QKeySequence> zoomInShortcuts;
2363  zoomInShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(QKeySequence::ZoomIn));
2364  zoomInShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::ControlModifier + Qt::Key_Plus + Qt::KeypadModifier));
2365  ui->zoomIn_Action->setShortcuts(zoomInShortcuts);
2366  connect(ui->zoomIn_Action, &QAction::triggered, ui->view, &VMainGraphicsView::zoomIn);
2367 
2368  QList<QKeySequence> zoomOutShortcuts;
2369  zoomOutShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(QKeySequence::ZoomOut));
2370  zoomOutShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::ControlModifier + Qt::Key_Minus + Qt::KeypadModifier));
2371  ui->zoomOut_Action->setShortcuts(zoomOutShortcuts);
2372  connect(ui->zoomOut_Action, &QAction::triggered, ui->view, &VMainGraphicsView::zoomOut);
2373 
2374  QList<QKeySequence> zoom100PercentShortcuts;
2375  zoom100PercentShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::ControlModifier + Qt::Key_0));
2376  zoom100PercentShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::ControlModifier + Qt::Key_0 + Qt::KeypadModifier));
2377  ui->zoom100Percent_Action->setShortcuts(zoom100PercentShortcuts);
2378  connect(ui->zoom100Percent_Action, &QAction::triggered, ui->view, &VMainGraphicsView::zoom100Percent);
2379 
2380  QList<QKeySequence> zoomToFitShortcuts;
2381  zoomToFitShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::ControlModifier + Qt::Key_Equal));
2382  ui->zoomToFit_Action->setShortcuts(zoomToFitShortcuts);
2383  connect(ui->zoomToFit_Action, &QAction::triggered, ui->view, &VMainGraphicsView::zoomToFit);
2384 
2385  QList<QKeySequence> zoomToSelectedShortcuts;
2386  zoomToSelectedShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::ControlModifier + Qt::Key_Right));
2387  ui->zoomToSelected_Action->setShortcuts(zoomToSelectedShortcuts);
2388  connect(ui->zoomToSelected_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::zoomToSelected);
2389 
2390  QList<QKeySequence> zoomToPreviousShortcuts;
2391  zoomToPreviousShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::ControlModifier + Qt::Key_Left));
2392  ui->zoomToPrevious_Action->setShortcuts(zoomToPreviousShortcuts);
2393  connect(ui->zoomToPrevious_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::zoomToPrevious);
2394 
2395  QList<QKeySequence> zoomToAreaShortcuts;
2396  zoomToAreaShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::ControlModifier + Qt::Key_A));
2397  ui->zoomToArea_Action->setShortcuts(zoomToAreaShortcuts);
2398  connect(ui->zoomToArea_Action, &QAction::toggled, this, &MainWindow::zoomToArea);
2399 
2400  resetPanShortcuts();
2401  connect(ui->zoomPan_Action, &QAction::toggled, this, &MainWindow::zoomPan);
2402 
2403  QList<QKeySequence> zoomToPointShortcuts;
2404  zoomToPointShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::ControlModifier + Qt::AltModifier + Qt::Key_P));
2405  ui->zoomToPoint_Action->setShortcuts(zoomToPointShortcuts);
2406  connect(ui->zoomToPoint_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::showZoomToPointDialog);
2407 
2408  m_zoomToPointComboBox = new QComboBox(ui->zoom_ToolBar);
2409  m_zoomToPointComboBox->setEnabled(false);
2410  m_zoomToPointComboBox->setToolTip(ui->zoomToPoint_Action->toolTip());
2411  ui->zoom_ToolBar->addWidget(m_zoomToPointComboBox);
2412  connect(m_zoomToPointComboBox, &QComboBox::currentTextChanged, this, &MainWindow::zoomToPoint);
2413 
2414  if (zoomScaleSpinBox != nullptr)
2415  {
2416  delete zoomScaleSpinBox;
2417  }
2418  zoomScaleSpinBox = new QDoubleSpinBox();
2419  zoomScaleSpinBox->setDecimals(1);
2420  zoomScaleSpinBox->setAlignment(Qt::AlignRight);
2421  zoomScaleSpinBox->setSingleStep(0.1);
2422  zoomScaleSpinBox->setMinimum(qFloor(VMainGraphicsView::MinScale()*1000)/10.0);
2423  zoomScaleSpinBox->setMaximum(qFloor(VMainGraphicsView::MaxScale()*1000)/10.0);
2424  zoomScaleSpinBox->setSuffix("%");
2425  zoomScaleSpinBox->setMaximumWidth(80);
2426  zoomScaleSpinBox->setKeyboardTracking(false);
2427  ui->zoom_ToolBar->insertWidget(ui->zoomIn_Action,zoomScaleSpinBox);
2428 
2429  zoomScaleChanged(ui->view->transform().m11());
2430  connect(zoomScaleSpinBox, QOverload<double>::of(&QDoubleSpinBox::valueChanged),
2431  this,[this](double d){ui->view->zoomByScale(d/100.0);});
2432 
2433 }
2434 
2435 void MainWindow::initToolBarVisibility()
2436 {
2437  updateToolBarVisibility();
2438  connect(ui->tools_ToolBox_ToolBar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
2439  {
2440  ui->tools_ToolBox_ToolBar->setVisible(visible);
2441  qApp->Settings()->setShowToolsToolBar(visible);
2442  });
2443  connect(ui->points_ToolBar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
2444  {
2445  ui->points_ToolBar->setVisible(visible);
2446  qApp->Settings()->setShowPointToolBar(visible);
2447  });
2448  connect(ui->lines_ToolBar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
2449  {
2450  ui->lines_ToolBar->setVisible(visible);
2451  qApp->Settings()->setShowLineToolBar(visible);
2452  });
2453  connect(ui->curves_ToolBar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
2454  {
2455  ui->curves_ToolBar->setVisible(visible);
2456  qApp->Settings()->setShowCurveToolBar(visible);
2457  });
2458  connect(ui->arcs_ToolBar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
2459  {
2460  ui->arcs_ToolBar->setVisible(visible);
2461  qApp->Settings()->setShowArcToolBar(visible);
2462  });
2463  connect(ui->operations_ToolBar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
2464  {
2465  ui->operations_ToolBar->setVisible(visible);
2466  qApp->Settings()->setShowOpsToolBar(visible);
2467  });
2468  connect(ui->pieces_ToolBar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
2469  {
2470  ui->pieces_ToolBar->setVisible(visible);
2471  qApp->Settings()->setShowPieceToolBar(visible);
2472  });
2473  connect(ui->details_ToolBar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
2474  {
2475  ui->details_ToolBar->setVisible(visible);
2476  qApp->Settings()->setShowDetailsToolBar(visible);
2477  });
2478  connect(ui->layout_ToolBar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
2479  {
2480  ui->layout_ToolBar->setVisible(visible);
2481  qApp->Settings()->setShowLayoutToolBar(visible);
2482  });
2483 }

2485 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2486 /**
2487  * @brief initPenToolBar enable default color, line wight & type toolbar.
2488  */
2489 void MainWindow::initPenToolBar()
2490 {
2491  if (m_penToolBar != nullptr)
2492  {
2493  disconnect(m_penToolBar, nullptr, this, nullptr);
2494  delete m_penToolBar;
2495  }
2496  m_penToolBar = new PenToolBar(tr("Pen Toolbar"), this);
2497  m_penToolBar->setSizePolicy(QSizePolicy::Expanding, QSizePolicy::Expanding);
2498  m_penToolBar->setObjectName("penToolBar");
2499  this->addToolBar(Qt::TopToolBarArea, m_penToolBar);
2500 
2501  connect(m_penToolBar, &PenToolBar::penChanged, this, &MainWindow::penChanged);
2502 }

2504 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2505 /**
2506  * @brief initPropertyEditor initialize the Properties Editor.
2507  */
2508 void MainWindow::initPropertyEditor()
2509 {
2510  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Initialize the Tool Property Editor.");
2511  if (toolProperties != nullptr)
2512  {
2513  disconnect(toolProperties, nullptr, this, nullptr);
2514  delete toolProperties;
2515  }
2516  toolProperties = new VToolOptionsPropertyBrowser(pattern, ui->toolProperties_DockWidget);
2517 
2518  connect(ui->view, &VMainGraphicsView::itemClicked, toolProperties, &VToolOptionsPropertyBrowser::itemClicked);
2519  connect(doc, &VPattern::FullUpdateFromFile, toolProperties, &VToolOptionsPropertyBrowser::updateOptions);
2520 }
2521 
2522 /**
2523  * Called when something changed in the pen tool bar
2524  * (e.g. color, weight, or type).
2525  */
2526 void MainWindow::penChanged(Pen pen)
2527 {
2528  doc->setDefaultPen(pen);
2529 }
2530 
2531 void MainWindow::updateToolBarVisibility()
2532 {
2533  setToolBarVisibility(ui->tools_ToolBox_ToolBar, qApp->Settings()->getShowToolsToolBar());
2534  setToolBarVisibility(ui->points_ToolBar, qApp->Settings()->getShowPointToolBar());
2535  setToolBarVisibility(ui->lines_ToolBar, qApp->Settings()->getShowLineToolBar());
2536  setToolBarVisibility(ui->curves_ToolBar, qApp->Settings()->getShowCurveToolBar());
2537  setToolBarVisibility(ui->arcs_ToolBar, qApp->Settings()->getShowArcToolBar());
2538  setToolBarVisibility(ui->operations_ToolBar, qApp->Settings()->getShowOpsToolBar());
2539  setToolBarVisibility(ui->pieces_ToolBar, qApp->Settings()->getShowPieceToolBar());
2540  setToolBarVisibility(ui->details_ToolBar, qApp->Settings()->getShowDetailsToolBar());
2541  setToolBarVisibility(ui->layout_ToolBar, qApp->Settings()->getShowLayoutToolBar());
2542 }
2543 
2544 void MainWindow::setToolBarVisibility(QToolBar *toolbar, bool visible)
2545 {
2546  toolbar->blockSignals(true);
2547  toolbar->setVisible(visible);
2548  toolbar->blockSignals(false);
2549 }
2550 
2551 void MainWindow::zoomScaleChanged(qreal scale)
2552 {
2553  zoomScaleSpinBox->blockSignals(true);
2554  zoomScaleSpinBox->setValue(qFloor(scale*1000)/10.0);
2555  zoomScaleSpinBox->blockSignals(false);
2556  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Value %f\n", (qreal(qFloor(scale*1000)/10.0)));
2557 }
2558 
2559 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2560 void MainWindow::zoomToSelected()
2561 {
2562  if (qApp->getCurrentScene() == draftScene)
2563  {
2564  ui->view->zoomToRect(doc->ActiveDrawBoundingRect());
2565  }
2566  else if (qApp->getCurrentScene() == pieceScene)
2567  {
2568  QGraphicsItem *item = qApp->getCurrentScene()->focusItem();
2569  {
2570  if ((item != nullptr) && (item->type() == QGraphicsItem::UserType + static_cast<int>(Tool::Piece)))
2571  {
2572  QRectF rect;
2573  rect = item->boundingRect();
2574  rect.translate(item->scenePos());
2575  ui->view->zoomToRect(rect);
2576  }
2577  }
2578  }
2579 }
2580 
2581 void MainWindow::zoomToPrevious()
2582 {
2583  VMainGraphicsScene *scene = qobject_cast<VMainGraphicsScene *>(currentScene);
2584  SCASSERT(scene != nullptr)
2585 
2586  /*Set transform for current scene*/
2587  scene->swapTransforms();
2588  ui->view->setTransform(scene->transform());
2589  zoomScaleChanged(ui->view->transform().m11());
2590 }
2591 
2592 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2593 void MainWindow::zoomToArea(bool checked)
2594 {
2595  ui->view->zoomToAreaEnabled(checked);
2596 
2597  if (ui->zoomToArea_Action->isChecked())
2598  {
2599  ui->zoomPan_Action->setChecked(false);
2600  }
2601 }
2602 
2603 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2604 void MainWindow::zoomPan(bool checked)
2605 {
2606  ui->view->zoomPanEnabled(checked);
2607  if (checked)
2608  {
2609  ui->zoomToArea_Action->setChecked(false);
2610  }
2611 }
2612 
2613 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2614 /**
2615  * @brief zoomToPoint show dialog for choosing a point and update the graphics view to focus on it.
2616  */
2617 void MainWindow::showZoomToPointDialog()
2618 {
2619  QStringList pointNames = draftPointNamesList();
2620 
2621  bool ok;
2622  QString pointName = QInputDialog::getItem(this, tr("Zoom to Point"), tr("Point:"), pointNames, 0, true, &ok,
2623  Qt::WindowSystemMenuHint | Qt::WindowTitleHint);
2624  if (!ok || pointName.isEmpty()) return;
2625 
2626  zoomToPoint(pointName);
2627 }
2628 
2629 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2630 /**
2631  * @brief zoomToPoint show dialog for choosing a point and update the graphics view to focus on it.
2632  * @param pointName name of to zoom into.
2633  */
2634 void MainWindow::zoomToPoint(const QString &pointName)
2635 {
2636  const QHash<quint32, QSharedPointer<VGObject> > *objects = pattern->DataGObjects();
2637  QHash<quint32, QSharedPointer<VGObject> >::const_iterator i;
2638 
2639  for (i = objects->constBegin(); i != objects->constEnd(); ++i)
2640  {
2641  QSharedPointer<VGObject> object = i.value();
2642  const quint32 objectId = object->getIdObject();
2643  const QString objectName = object->name();
2644 
2645  if (objectName == pointName)
2646  {
2647  VPointF *point = (VPointF*)object.data();
2648  ui->view->zoom100Percent();
2649  ui->view->centerOn(point->toQPointF());
2650 
2651  // show point name if it's hidden
2652  // TODO: Need to make this work with operation's and dart tools
2653  quint32 toolId = point->getIdTool();
2654  const quint32 objId = point->getIdObject();
2655  if (objId != NULL_ID)
2656  {
2657  toolId = objId;
2658  }
2659  if (VAbstractTool *tool = qobject_cast<VAbstractTool *>(VAbstractPattern::getTool(toolId)))
2660  {
2661  tool->setPointNameVisiblity(toolId, true);
2662  }
2663 
2664  // show any hiden groups containing object
2665  QMap<quint32,QString> groups = doc->getGroupsContainingItem(toolId, objectId, true);
2666  groupsWidget->showGroups(groups);
2667 
2668  // Reset combobox so same point can be selected again
2669  m_zoomToPointComboBox->blockSignals(true);
2670  m_zoomToPointComboBox->setCurrentIndex(-1);
2671  m_zoomToPointComboBox->blockSignals(false);
2672 
2673  return;
2674  }
2675  }
2676 }
2677 
2678 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2679 void MainWindow::InitToolButtons()
2680 {
2681  connect(ui->arrowPointer_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleArrowTool);
2682 
2683  // This check helps to find missed tools
2684  Q_STATIC_ASSERT_X(static_cast<int>(Tool::LAST_ONE_DO_NOT_USE) == 53, "Check if all tools were connected.");
2685 
2686  connect(ui->pointAtDistanceAngle_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked,
2687  this, &MainWindow::handlePointAtDistanceAngleTool);
2688  connect(ui->line_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleLineTool);
2689  connect(ui->alongLine_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleAlongLineTool);
2690  connect(ui->shoulderPoint_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleShoulderPointTool);
2691  connect(ui->normal_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleNormalTool);
2692  connect(ui->bisector_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleBisectorTool);
2693  connect(ui->lineIntersect_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleLineIntersectTool);
2694  connect(ui->curve_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleCurveTool);
2695  connect(ui->curveWithCPs_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleCurveWithControlPointsTool);
2696  connect(ui->arc_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleArcTool);
2697  connect(ui->spline_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleSplineTool);
2698  connect(ui->splineWithCPs_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleSplineWithControlPointsTool);
2699  connect(ui->pointOfContact_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handlePointOfContactTool);
2700  connect(ui->addPatternPiece_ToolButton,&QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handlePatternPieceTool);
2701  connect(ui->internalPath_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleInternalPathTool);
2702  connect(ui->height_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleHeightTool);
2703  connect(ui->triangle_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleTriangleTool);
2704  connect(ui->pointIntersectXY_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handlePointIntersectXYTool);
2705  connect(ui->pointAlongCurve_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handlePointAlongCurveTool);
2706  connect(ui->pointAlongSpline_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handlePointAlongSplineTool);
2707  connect(ui->unitePieces_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleUnionTool);
2708  connect(ui->pointAlongArc_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handlePointAlongArcTool);
2709  connect(ui->lineIntersectAxis_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleLineIntersectAxisTool);
2710  connect(ui->curveIntersectAxis_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleCurveIntersectAxisTool);
2711  connect(ui->arcIntersectAxis_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleArcIntersectAxisTool);
2712  connect(ui->layoutSettings_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleNewLayout);
2713  connect(ui->pointOfIntersectionArcs_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked,
2714  this, &MainWindow::handlePointOfIntersectionArcsTool);
2715  connect(ui->pointOfIntersectionCircles_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked,
2716  this, &MainWindow::handlePointOfIntersectionCirclesTool);
2717  connect(ui->pointOfIntersectionCurves_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked,
2718  this, &MainWindow::handleCurveIntersectCurveTool);
2719  connect(ui->pointFromCircleAndTangent_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked,
2720  this, &MainWindow::handlePointFromCircleAndTangentTool);
2721  connect(ui->pointFromArcAndTangent_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked,
2722  this, &MainWindow::handlePointFromArcAndTangentTool);
2723  connect(ui->arcWithLength_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleArcWithLengthTool);
2724  connect(ui->trueDarts_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleTrueDartTool);
2725  connect(ui->exportDraftBlocks_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::exportDraftBlocksAs);
2726  connect(ui->group_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleGroupTool);
2727  connect(ui->rotation_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleRotationTool);
2728  connect(ui->mirrorByLine_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleMirrorByLineTool);
2729  connect(ui->mirrorByAxis_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleMirrorByAxisTool);
2730  connect(ui->move_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleMoveTool);
2731  connect(ui->midpoint_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleMidpointTool);
2732  connect(ui->exportLayout_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::exportLayoutAs);
2733  connect(ui->exportPiecesAs_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::exportPiecesAs);
2734  connect(ui->ellipticalArc_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleEllipticalArcTool);
2735  connect(ui->anchorPoint_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleAnchorPointTool);
2736  connect(ui->insertNodes_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleInsertNodesTool);
2737 }
2738 
2739 void MainWindow::handlePointsMenu()
2740 {
2741  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Points Menu selected. \n");
2742 
2743  QMenu menu;
2744 
2745  QAction *action_PointAtDA = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/segment.png"), tr("Length and Angle") + "\tL, A");
2746  QAction *action_PointAlongLine = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/along_line.png"), tr("On Line") + "\tO, L");
2747  QAction *action_Midpoint = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/midpoint.png"), tr("Midpoint") + "\t" + tr("Shift+O, Shift+L"));
2748  QAction *action_AlongPerpendicular = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/normal.png"), tr("On Perpendicular") + "\tO, P");
2749  QAction *action_Bisector = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/bisector.png"), tr("On Bisector") + "\tO, B");
2750  QAction *action_Shoulder = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/shoulder.png"), tr("Length to Line") + "\tP, S");
2751  QAction *action_PointOfContact = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/point_of_contact.png"), tr("Intersect Arc and Line") + "\tA, L");
2752  QAction *action_Triangle = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/triangle.png"), tr("Intersect Axis and Triangle") + "\tX, T");
2753  QAction *action_PointIntersectXY = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/point_intersectxy_icon.png"), tr("Intersect XY") + "\tX, Y");
2754  QAction *action_PerpendicularPoint = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/height.png"), tr("Intersect Line and Perpendicular") + "\tL, P");
2755  QAction *action_PointIntersectAxis = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/line_intersect_axis.png"), tr("Intersect Line and Axis") + "\tL, X");
2756 
2757  QAction *selectedAction = menu.exec(QCursor::pos());
2758 
2759  if(selectedAction == nullptr)
2760  {
2761  return;
2762  }
2763  else if (selectedAction == action_Midpoint)
2764  {
2765  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->points_Page);
2766  ui->midpoint_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
2767  handleMidpointTool(true);
2768  }
2769  else if (selectedAction == action_PointAtDA)
2770  {
2771  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->points_Page);
2772  ui->pointAtDistanceAngle_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
2773  handlePointAtDistanceAngleTool(true);
2774  }
2775  else if (selectedAction == action_PointAlongLine)
2776  {
2777  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->points_Page);
2778  ui->alongLine_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
2779  handleAlongLineTool(true);
2780  }
2781  else if (selectedAction == action_AlongPerpendicular)
2782  {
2783  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->points_Page);
2784  ui->normal_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
2785  handleNormalTool(true);
2786  }
2787  else if (selectedAction == action_Bisector)
2788  {
2789  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->points_Page);
2790  ui->bisector_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
2791  handleBisectorTool(true);
2792  }
2793  else if (selectedAction == action_Shoulder)
2794  {
2795  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->points_Page);
2796  ui->shoulderPoint_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
2797  handleShoulderPointTool(true);
2798  }
2799  else if (selectedAction == action_PointOfContact)
2800  {
2801  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->points_Page);
2802  ui->pointOfContact_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
2803  handlePointOfContactTool(true);
2804  }
2805  else if (selectedAction == action_Triangle)
2806  {
2807  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->points_Page);
2808  ui->triangle_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
2809  handleTriangleTool(true);
2810  }
2811  else if (selectedAction == action_PointIntersectXY)
2812  {
2813  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->points_Page);
2814  ui->pointIntersectXY_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
2815  handlePointIntersectXYTool(true);
2816  }
2817  else if (selectedAction == action_PerpendicularPoint)
2818  {
2819  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->points_Page);
2820  ui->height_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
2821  handleHeightTool(true);
2822  }
2823  else if (selectedAction == action_PointIntersectAxis)
2824  {
2825  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->points_Page);
2826  ui->lineIntersectAxis_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
2827  handleLineIntersectAxisTool(true);
2828  }
2829 }
2830

2832 {

2842  {
2843  return;
2844  }

2846  {
2847  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->lines_Page);

2850  }

2869  QAction *action_CircleTangent = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/point_from_circle_and_tangent.png"), tr("Intersect Circle and Tangent") + "\tC, T");

2873

2875

2877  {
2878  return;
2879  }
2880  else if (selectedAction == action_Arc)

2885  }

2890  handlePointAlongArcTool(true);
2891  }

2893  {
2894  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->arcs_Page);
2895  ui->arcIntersectAxis_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
2896  handleArcIntersectAxisTool(true);
2897  }
2898  else if (selectedAction == action_ArcIntersectArc)
2899  {
2900  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->arcs_Page);
2901  ui->pointOfIntersectionArcs_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
2902  handlePointOfIntersectionArcsTool(true);
2903  }
2904  else if (selectedAction == action_CircleIntersect)
2905  {
2906  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->arcs_Page);
2907  ui->pointOfIntersectionCircles_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
2908  handlePointOfIntersectionCirclesTool(true);
2909  }
2910  else if (selectedAction == action_CircleTangent)
2911  {
2912  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->arcs_Page);
2913  ui->pointFromCircleAndTangent_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
2914  handlePointFromCircleAndTangentTool(true);
2915  }
2916  else if (selectedAction == action_ArcTangent)
2917  {
2918  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->arcs_Page);
2919  ui->pointFromArcAndTangent_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
2920  handlePointFromArcAndTangentTool(true);
2921  }

2923  {
2924  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->arcs_Page);
2925  ui->arcWithLength_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
2926  handleArcWithLengthTool(true);
2927  }

2937 {

2939  QMenu menu;
2940 
2941  QAction *action_Curve = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/spline.png"), tr("Curve - Interactive") + "\t" + tr("Alt+C"));
2942  QAction *action_Spline = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/splinePath.png"), tr("Spline - Interactive") + "\t" + tr("Alt+S"));
2943  QAction *action_CurveWithCPs = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/cubic_bezier.png"), tr("Curve - Fixed") + "\t" + tr("Alt+Shift+C"));
2944  QAction *action_SplineWithCPs = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/cubic_bezier_path.png"), tr("Spline - Fixed") + "\t" + tr("Alt+Shift+S"));
2945  QAction *action_PointAlongCurve = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/spline_cut_point.png"), tr("Point on Curve") + "\tO, C");
2946  QAction *action_PointAlongSpline = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/splinePath_cut_point.png"), tr("Point on Spline") + "\tO, S");
2947  QAction *action_CurveIntersectCurve = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/intersection_curves.png"), tr("Intersect Curves") + "\tI, C");
2948  QAction *action_CurveIntersectAxis = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/curve_intersect_axis.png"), tr("Intersect Curve & Axis") + "\tC, X");
2949

2951

2953  {
2954  return;
2955  }

2957  {
2958  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->curves_Page);

2961  }

2967  }

2972  handlePointAlongCurveTool(true);
2973  }

2975  {
2976  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->curves_Page);
2977  ui->pointAlongSpline_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
2978  handlePointAlongSplineTool(true);
2979  }
2980  else if (selectedAction == action_CurveWithCPs)
2981  {
2982  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->curves_Page);
2983  ui->curveWithCPs_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
2984  handleCurveWithControlPointsTool(true);
2985  }
2986  else if (selectedAction == action_SplineWithCPs)
2987  {
2988  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->curves_Page);
2989  ui->splineWithCPs_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
2990  handleSplineWithControlPointsTool(true);
2991  }
2992  else if (selectedAction == action_CurveIntersectCurve)
2993  {
2994  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->curves_Page);
2995  ui->pointOfIntersectionCurves_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
2996  handleCurveIntersectCurveTool(true);
2997  }
2998  else if (selectedAction == action_CurveIntersectAxis)
2999  {
3000  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->curves_Page);
3001  ui->curveIntersectAxis_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3002  handleCurveIntersectAxisTool(true);
3003  }
