3012 void MainWindow::handleOperationsMenu()
3013 {
3014  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Operations Menu selected. \n");
3015  QMenu menu;
3016 
3017  QAction *action_Group = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/group.png"), tr("Add Objects to Group") + "\tG");
3018  QAction *action_Rotate = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/rotation.png"), tr("Rotate") + "\tR");
3019  QAction *action_MirrorByLine = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/mirror_by_line.png"), tr("Mirror by Line") + "\tM, L");
3020  QAction *action_MirrorByAxis = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/mirror_by_axis.png"), tr("Mirror by Axis") + "\tM, A");
3021  QAction *action_Move = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/move.png"), tr("Move") + "\t" + tr("Alt+M"));
3022  QAction *action_TrueDarts = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/true_darts.png"), tr("True Darts") + "\tT, D");
3023  QAction *action_ExportDraftBlocks = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/export.png"), tr("Export Draft Blocks") + "\tE, D");
3024 
3025  QAction *selectedAction = menu.exec(QCursor::pos());
3026 
3027  if(selectedAction == nullptr)
3028  {
3029  return;
3030  }
3031  else if (selectedAction == action_Group)
3032  {
3033  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->operations_Page);
3034  ui->group_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3035  handleGroupTool(true);
3036  }
3037  else if (selectedAction == action_Rotate)
3038  {
3039  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->operations_Page);
3040  ui->rotation_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3041  handleRotationTool(true);
3042  }
3043  else if (selectedAction == action_MirrorByLine)
3044  {
3045  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->operations_Page);
3046  ui->mirrorByLine_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3047  handleMirrorByLineTool(true);
3048  }
3049  else if (selectedAction == action_MirrorByAxis)
3050  {
3051  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->operations_Page);
3052  ui->mirrorByAxis_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3053  handleMirrorByAxisTool(true);
3054  }
3055  else if (selectedAction == action_Move)
3056  {
3057  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->operations_Page);
3058  ui->move_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3059  handleMoveTool(true);
3060  }
3061  else if (selectedAction == action_TrueDarts)
3062  {
3063  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->operations_Page);
3064  ui->trueDarts_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3065  handleTrueDartTool(true);
3066  }
3067  else if (selectedAction == action_ExportDraftBlocks)
3068  {
3069  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->operations_Page);
3070  exportDraftBlocksAs();
3071  }
3072 }
3073 
3074 void MainWindow::handlePieceMenu()
3075 {
3076  QMenu menu;
3077 
3078  QAction *action_Piece = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/new_detail.png"), tr("New Pattern Piece") + "\tN, P");
3079  QAction *action_AnchorPoint = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/anchor_point.png"), tr("Add AnchorPoint") + "\tA, P");
3080  QAction *action_InternalPath = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/path.png"), tr("Create Internal Path") + "\tI, N");
3081  QAction *action_InsertNodes = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/insert_nodes_icon.png"), tr("Insert Nodes in Path") + "\tI, P");
3082 
3083  action_AnchorPoint->setEnabled(pattern->DataPieces()->size() > 0);
3084  action_InternalPath->setEnabled(pattern->DataPieces()->size() > 0);
3085  action_InsertNodes->setEnabled(pattern->DataPieces()->size() > 0);
3086 
3087  QAction *selectedAction = menu.exec(QCursor::pos());
3088 
3089  if(selectedAction == nullptr)
3090  {
3091  return;
3092  }
3093  else if (selectedAction == action_Piece)
3094  {
3095  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->piece_Page);
3096  ui->addPatternPiece_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3097  handlePatternPieceTool(true);
3098  }
3099  else if (selectedAction == action_AnchorPoint)
3100  {
3101  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->piece_Page);
3102  ui->anchorPoint_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3103  handleAnchorPointTool(true);
3104  }
3105  else if (selectedAction == action_InternalPath)
3106  {
3107  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->piece_Page);
3108  ui->internalPath_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3109  handleInternalPathTool(true);
3110  }
3111  else if (selectedAction == action_InsertNodes)
3112  {
3113  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->piece_Page);
3114  ui->insertNodes_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3115  handleInsertNodesTool(true);
3116  }
3117 }
3118 
3119 void MainWindow::handlePatternPiecesMenu()
3120 {
3121  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "PatternPieces Menu selected. \n");
3122  QMenu menu;
3123 
3124  QAction *action_Union = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/union.png"), tr("Union Tool") + "\tU");
3125  QAction *action_ExportPieces = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/export.png"), tr("Export Pattern Pieces") + "\tE, P");
3126  QAction *selectedAction = menu.exec(QCursor::pos());
3127 
3128  if(selectedAction == nullptr)
3129  {
3130  return;
3131  }
3132  else if (selectedAction == action_Union)
3133  {
3134  ui->piece_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->details_Page);
3135  ui->unitePieces_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3136  handleUnionTool(true);
3137  }
3138  else if (selectedAction == action_ExportPieces)
3139  {
3140  ui->piece_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->details_Page);
3141  exportPiecesAs();
3142  }
3143 }
3144 
3145 void MainWindow::handleLayoutMenu()
3146 {
3147  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Layout Menu selected. \n");
3148 
3149 
3150  QMenu menu;
3151 
3152  QAction *action_NewLayout = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/layout_settings.png"), tr("New Print Layout") + "\tN, L");
3153  QAction *action_ExportLayout = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/export.png"), tr("Export Layout") + "\tE, L");
3154 
3155  QAction *selectedAction = menu.exec(QCursor::pos());
3156 
3157  if(selectedAction == nullptr)
3158  {
3159  return;
3160  }
3161  else if (selectedAction == action_NewLayout)
3162  {
3163  ui->layout_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->layout_Page);
3164  ui->layoutSettings_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3165  handleNewLayout(true);
3166  }
3167  else if (selectedAction == action_ExportLayout)
3168  {
3169  ui->layout_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->layout_Page);
3170  exportLayoutAs();
3171  }
3172 }

3174 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3175 /**
3176  * @brief mouseMove save mouse position and show user.
3177  * @param scenePos position mouse.
3178  */
3179 void MainWindow::MouseMove(const QPointF &scenePos)
3180 {
3181  if (mouseCoordinates)
3182  {
3183  mouseCoordinates->updateCoordinates(scenePos);
3184  }
3185 }
3186 
3187 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3188 QT_WARNING_PUSH
3189 QT_WARNING_DISABLE_GCC("-Wswitch-default")
3190 /**
3191  * @brief CancelTool cancel tool.
3192  */
3193 void MainWindow::CancelTool()
3194 {
3195  // This check helps to find missed tools in the switch
3196  Q_STATIC_ASSERT_X(static_cast<int>(Tool::LAST_ONE_DO_NOT_USE) == 53, "Not all tools were handled.");
3197 
3198  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Canceling tool.");
3199  dialogTool.clear();
3200  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Dialog closed.");
3201 
3202  currentScene->setFocus(Qt::OtherFocusReason);
3203  currentScene->clearSelection();
3204  emit ui->view->itemClicked(nullptr); // Hide visualization to avoid a crash
3205 
3206  ui->zoomPan_Action->setChecked(false); //Disable Pan Zoom
3207  ui->view->zoomPanEnabled(false);
3208 
3209  ui->zoomToArea_Action->setChecked(false); //Disable Zoom to Area
3210  ui->view->zoomToAreaEnabled(false);
3211 
3212  switch (currentTool)
3213  {
3214  case Tool::Arrow:
3215  ui->arrowPointer_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3216  ui->arrow_Action->setChecked(false);
3217  helpLabel->setText(QString(""));
3218 
3219  // Crash: using CRTL+Z while using line tool.
3220  undoAction->setEnabled(false);
3221  redoAction->setEnabled(false);
3222  VAbstractTool::m_suppressContextMenu = true;
3223  return;
3224  case Tool::BasePoint:
3225  case Tool::SinglePoint:
3226  case Tool::DoublePoint:
3227  case Tool::LinePoint:
3228  case Tool::AbstractSpline:
3229  case Tool::Cut:
3230  case Tool::LAST_ONE_DO_NOT_USE:
3231  case Tool::NodePoint:
3232  case Tool::NodeArc:
3233  case Tool::NodeElArc:
3234  case Tool::NodeSpline:
3235  case Tool::NodeSplinePath:
3236  Q_UNREACHABLE(); //-V501
3237  //Nothing to do here because we can't create this tool from main window.
3238  break;
3239  case Tool::EndLine:
3240  ui->pointAtDistanceAngle_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3241  break;
3242  case Tool::Line:
3243  ui->line_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3244  break;
3245  case Tool::AlongLine:
3246  ui->alongLine_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3247  break;
3248  case Tool::Midpoint:
3249  ui->midpoint_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3250  break;
3251  case Tool::ShoulderPoint:
3252  ui->shoulderPoint_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3253  break;
3254  case Tool::Normal:
3255  ui->normal_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3256  break;
3257  case Tool::Bisector:
3258  ui->bisector_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3259  break;
3260  case Tool::LineIntersect:
3261  ui->lineIntersect_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3262  break;
3263  case Tool::Spline:
3264  ui->curve_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3265  break;
3266  case Tool::CubicBezier:
3267  ui->curveWithCPs_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3268  break;
3269  case Tool::Arc:
3270  ui->arc_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3271  break;
3272  case Tool::ArcWithLength:
3273  ui->arcWithLength_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3274  break;
3275  case Tool::SplinePath:
3276  ui->spline_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3277  break;
3278  case Tool::CubicBezierPath:
3279  ui->splineWithCPs_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3280  break;
3281  case Tool::PointOfContact:
3282  ui->pointOfContact_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3283  break;
3284  case Tool::Piece:
3285  ui->addPatternPiece_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3286  break;
3287  case Tool::InternalPath:
3288  ui->internalPath_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3289  break;
3290  case Tool::Height:
3291  ui->height_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3292  break;
3293  case Tool::Triangle:
3294  ui->triangle_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3295  break;
3296  case Tool::PointOfIntersection:
3297  ui->pointIntersectXY_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3298  break;
3299  case Tool::CutSpline:
3300  ui->pointAlongCurve_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3301  break;
3302  case Tool::CutSplinePath:
3303  ui->pointAlongSpline_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3304  break;
3305  case Tool::Union:
3306  ui->unitePieces_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3307  break;
3308  case Tool::CutArc:
3309  ui->pointAlongArc_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3310  break;
3311  case Tool::LineIntersectAxis:
3312  ui->lineIntersectAxis_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3313  break;
3314  case Tool::CurveIntersectAxis:
3315  ui->curveIntersectAxis_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3316  break;
3317  case Tool::ArcIntersectAxis:
3318  ui->arcIntersectAxis_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3319  break;
3320  case Tool::PointOfIntersectionArcs:
3321  ui->pointOfIntersectionArcs_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3322  break;
3323  case Tool::PointOfIntersectionCircles:
3324  ui->pointOfIntersectionCircles_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3325  break;
3326  case Tool::PointOfIntersectionCurves:
3327  ui->pointOfIntersectionCurves_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3328  break;
3329  case Tool::PointFromCircleAndTangent:
3330  ui->pointFromCircleAndTangent_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3331  break;
3332  case Tool::PointFromArcAndTangent:
3333  ui->pointFromArcAndTangent_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3334  break;
3335  case Tool::TrueDarts:
3336  ui->trueDarts_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3337  break;
3338  case Tool::Group:
3339  ui->group_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3340  break;
3341  case Tool::Rotation:
3342  ui->rotation_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3343  break;
3344  case Tool::MirrorByLine:
3345  ui->mirrorByLine_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3346  break;
3347  case Tool::MirrorByAxis:
3348  ui->mirrorByAxis_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3349  break;
3350  case Tool::Move:
3351  ui->move_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3352  break;
3353  case Tool::EllipticalArc:
3354  ui->ellipticalArc_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3355  break;
3356  case Tool::AnchorPoint:
3357  ui->anchorPoint_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3358  break;
3359  case Tool::InsertNodes:
3360  ui->insertNodes_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3361  break;
3362  }
3363 
3364  // Crash: using CRTL+Z while using line tool.
3365  undoAction->setEnabled(qApp->getUndoStack()->canUndo());
3366  redoAction->setEnabled(qApp->getUndoStack()->canRedo());
3367 }
3368 
3369 QT_WARNING_POP
3370 
3371 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3372 /**
3373  * @brief handleArrowTool enable arrow tool.
3374  */
3375 void MainWindow::handleArrowTool(bool checked)
3376 {
3377  if (checked && currentTool != Tool::Arrow)
3378  {
3379  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Arrow tool.");
3380  CancelTool();
3381  ui->arrowPointer_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3382  ui->arrow_Action->setChecked(true);
3383  currentTool = Tool::Arrow;
3384  emit EnableItemMove(true);
3385  emit ItemsSelection(SelectionType::ByMouseRelease);
3386  VAbstractTool::m_suppressContextMenu = false;
3387 
3388  // Only true for rubber band selection
3389  emit EnableLabelSelection(true);
3390  emit EnablePointSelection(false);
3391  emit EnableLineSelection(false);
3392  emit EnableArcSelection(false);
3393  emit EnableElArcSelection(false);
3394  emit EnableSplineSelection(false);
3395  emit EnableSplinePathSelection(false);
3396  emit EnableNodeLabelSelection(true);
3397  emit EnableNodePointSelection(true);
3398  emit enablePieceSelection(true);// Disable when done with pattern piece visualization
3399 
3400  // Hovering
3401  emit EnableLabelHover(true);
3402  emit EnablePointHover(true);
3403  emit EnableLineHover(true);
3404  emit EnableArcHover(true);
3405  emit EnableElArcHover(true);
3406  emit EnableSplineHover(true);
3407  emit EnableSplinePathHover(true);
3408  emit EnableNodeLabelHover(true);
3409  emit EnableNodePointHover(true);
3410  emit enablePieceHover(true);
3411 
3412  ui->view->allowRubberBand(true);
3413 
3414  ui->view->viewport()->unsetCursor();
3415  helpLabel->setText("");
3416  ui->view->setShowToolOptions(true);
3417  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Enabled arrow tool.");
3418  }
3419  else
3420  {
3421  ui->view->viewport()->setCursor(QCursor(Qt::ArrowCursor));
3422  ui->arrowPointer_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3423  ui->arrow_Action->setChecked(true);
3424  }
3425 }
3426 
3427 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3428 /**
3429  * @brief keyPressEvent handle key press events.
3430  * @param event key event.
3431  */
3432 void MainWindow::keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent *event)
3433 {
3434  switch (event->key())
3435  {
3436  case Qt::Key_Escape:
3437  handleArrowTool(true);
3438  break;
3439  case Qt::Key_Return:
3440  case Qt::Key_Enter:
3441  EndVisualization();
3442  break;
3443  case Qt::Key_Space:
3444  if (qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->isPanActiveSpaceKey())
3445  {
3446  ui->zoomPan_Action->setChecked(true);
3447  }
3448  break;
3449  default:
3450  break;
3451  }
3452  QMainWindow::keyPressEvent (event);
3453 }
3454 
3455 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3456 /**
3457  * @brief keyReleaseEvent handle key press events.
3458  * @param event key event.
3459  */
3460 void MainWindow::keyReleaseEvent(QKeyEvent *event)
3461 {
3462  switch (event->key())
3463  {
3464  case Qt::Key_Space:
3465  if (qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->isPanActiveSpaceKey())
3466  {
3467  ui->zoomPan_Action->setChecked(false);
3468  }
3469  default:
3470  break;
3471  }
3472  QMainWindow::keyReleaseEvent(event);
3473 }
3474 
3475 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3476 /**
3477  * @brief SaveCurrentScene save scene options before set another.
3478  */
3479 void MainWindow::SaveCurrentScene()
3480 {
3481  if (mode == Draw::Calculation || mode == Draw::Modeling)
3482  {
3483  VMainGraphicsScene *scene = qobject_cast<VMainGraphicsScene *>(currentScene);
3484  SCASSERT(scene != nullptr)
3485 
3486  /*Save transform*/
3487  scene->setCurrentTransform(ui->view->transform());
3488  /*Save scroll bars value for previous scene.*/
3489  QScrollBar *horScrollBar = ui->view->horizontalScrollBar();
3490  scene->setHorScrollBar(horScrollBar->value());
3491  QScrollBar *verScrollBar = ui->view->verticalScrollBar();
3492  scene->setVerScrollBar(verScrollBar->value());
3493  }
3494 }
3495 
3496 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3497 /**
3498  * @brief RestoreCurrentScene restore scene options after change.
3499  */
3500 void MainWindow::RestoreCurrentScene()
3501 {
3502  VMainGraphicsScene *scene = qobject_cast<VMainGraphicsScene *>(currentScene);
3503  SCASSERT(scene != nullptr)
3504 
3505  /*Set transform for current scene*/
3506  ui->view->setTransform(scene->transform());
3507  zoomScaleChanged(ui->view->transform().m11());
3508  /*Set value for current scene scroll bar.*/
3509  QScrollBar *horScrollBar = ui->view->horizontalScrollBar();
3510  horScrollBar->setValue(scene->getHorScrollBar());
3511  QScrollBar *verScrollBar = ui->view->verticalScrollBar();
3512  verScrollBar->setValue(scene->getVerScrollBar());
3513 }
3514 
3515 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3516 /**
3517  * @brief showDraftMode show draw scene.
3518  * @param checked true - button checked.
3519  */
3520 void MainWindow::showDraftMode(bool checked)
3521 {
3522  if (checked)
3523  {
3524  ui->toolbox_StackedWidget->setCurrentIndex(0);
3525  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Show draft scene");
3526  handleArrowTool(true);
3527 
3528  leftGoToStage->setPixmap(QPixmap("://icon/24x24/fast_forward_left_to_right_arrow.png"));
3529  rightGoToStage->setPixmap(QPixmap("://icon/24x24/left_to_right_arrow.png"));
3530 
3531  ui->showDraftMode->setChecked(true);
3532  ui->pieceMode_Action->setChecked(false);
3533  ui->layoutMode_Action->setChecked(false);
3534 
3535  SaveCurrentScene();
3536 
3537  currentScene = draftScene;
3538  ui->view->setScene(currentScene);
3539  RestoreCurrentScene();
3540 
3541  mode = Draw::Calculation;
3542  draftBlockComboBox->setCurrentIndex(currentBlockIndex); //restore current draft block
3543  drawMode = true;
3544 
3545  setToolsEnabled(true);
3546  setWidgetsEnabled(true);
3547 
3548  draftScene->enablePiecesMode(qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->getShowControlPoints());
3549  draftScene->setOriginsVisible(qApp->Settings()->getShowAxisOrigin());
3550 
3551  updateViewToolbar();
3552 
3553  //ui->toggleAnchorPoints_Action->setChecked(qApp->Settings()->getShowAnchorPoints());
3554  //draftScene->setOriginsVisible(qApp->Settings()->getShowAnchorPoints());
3555 
3556  ui->useToolColor_Action->setChecked(qApp->Settings()->getUseToolColor());
3557 
3558  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentIndex(currentToolBoxIndex);
3559 
3560  if (qApp->patternType() == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
3561  {
3562  gradationHeightsLabel->setVisible(true);
3563  gradationHeights->setVisible(true);
3564  gradationSizesLabel->setVisible(true);
3565  gradationSizes->setVisible(true);
3566  }
3567  ui->groups_DockWidget->setWidget(groupsWidget);
3568  ui->groups_DockWidget->setWindowTitle(tr("Group Manager"));
3569  }
3570  else
3571  {
3572  ui->showDraftMode->setChecked(true);
3573  }
3574 }
3575 
3576 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3577 /**
3578  * @brief showPieceMode show Piece scene.
3579  * @param checked true - button checked.
3580  */
3581 void MainWindow::showPieceMode(bool checked)
3582 {
3583  if (checked)
3584  {
3585  ui->toolbox_StackedWidget->setCurrentIndex(1);
3586  handleArrowTool(true);
3587 
3588  if(drawMode)
3589  {
3590  currentBlockIndex = draftBlockComboBox->currentIndex(); // Save current draftf block.
3591  drawMode = false;
3592  }
3593  draftBlockComboBox->setCurrentIndex(draftBlockComboBox->count()-1); // Need to get data about all blocks.
3594 
3595  leftGoToStage->setPixmap(QPixmap("://icon/24x24/right_to_left_arrow.png"));
3596  rightGoToStage->setPixmap(QPixmap("://icon/24x24/left_to_right_arrow.png"));
3597 
3598  ui->showDraftMode->setChecked(false);
3599  ui->pieceMode_Action->setChecked(true);
3600  ui->layoutMode_Action->setChecked(false);
3601 
3602  if(!qApp->getOpeningPattern())
3603  {
3604  if (pattern->DataPieces()->count() == 0)
3605  {
3606  QMessageBox::information(this, tr("Piece mode"), tr("You can't use Piece mode yet. "
3607  "Please, create at least one pattern piece."),
3608  QMessageBox::Ok, QMessageBox::Ok);
3609  showDraftMode(true);
3610  return;
3611  }
3612  }
3613 
3614  patternPiecesWidget->updateList();
3615 
3616  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Show piece scene");
3617  SaveCurrentScene();
3618 
3619  currentScene = pieceScene;
3620  emit ui->view->itemClicked(nullptr);
3621  ui->view->setScene(currentScene);
3622  RestoreCurrentScene();
3623 
3624  if (mode == Draw::Calculation)
3625  {
3626  currentToolBoxIndex = ui->piece_ToolBox->currentIndex();
3627  }
3628  mode = Draw::Modeling;
3629  setToolsEnabled(true);
3630  setWidgetsEnabled(true);
3631 
3632  pieceScene->setOriginsVisible(qApp->Settings()->getShowAxisOrigin());
3633 
3634  updateViewToolbar();
3635 
3636  ui->piece_ToolBox->setCurrentIndex(ui->piece_ToolBox->indexOf(ui->details_Page));
3637 
3638  if (qApp->patternType() == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
3639  {
3640  gradationHeightsLabel->setVisible(true);
3641  gradationHeights->setVisible(true);
3642  gradationSizesLabel->setVisible(true);
3643  gradationSizes->setVisible(true);
3644  }
3645  ui->groups_DockWidget->setWidget(patternPiecesWidget);
3646  ui->groups_DockWidget->setWindowTitle(tr("Pattern Pieces"));
3647 
3648  helpLabel->setText("");
3649  }
3650  else
3651  {
3652  ui->pieceMode_Action->setChecked(true);
3653  }
3654 }
3655 
3656 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3657 /**
3658  * @brief showLayoutMode show layout scene.
3659  * @param checked true - button checked.
3660  */
3661 void MainWindow::showLayoutMode(bool checked)
3662 {
3663  if (checked)
3664  {
3665  ui->toolbox_StackedWidget->setCurrentIndex(2);
3666  handleArrowTool(true);
3667 
3668  if(drawMode)
3669  {
3670  currentBlockIndex = draftBlockComboBox->currentIndex();//save current drfat block
3671  drawMode = false;
3672  }
3673  draftBlockComboBox->setCurrentIndex(draftBlockComboBox->count()-1);// Need to get data about all draft blocks
3674 
3675  leftGoToStage->setPixmap(QPixmap("://icon/24x24/right_to_left_arrow.png"));
3676  rightGoToStage->setPixmap(QPixmap("://icon/24x24/fast_forward_right_to_left_arrow.png"));
3677 
3678  ui->showDraftMode->setChecked(false);
3679  ui->pieceMode_Action->setChecked(false);
3680  ui->layoutMode_Action->setChecked(true);
3681 
3682  QHash<quint32, VPiece> pieces;
3683  if(!qApp->getOpeningPattern())
3684  {
3685  const QHash<quint32, VPiece> *allPieces = pattern->DataPieces();
3686  if (allPieces->count() == 0)
3687  {
3688  QMessageBox::information(this, tr("Layout mode"), tr("You can't use Layout mode yet. "
3689  "Please, create at least one pattern piece."),
3690  QMessageBox::Ok, QMessageBox::Ok);
3691  showDraftMode(true);
3692  return;
3693  }
3694  else
3695  {
3696  QHash<quint32, VPiece>::const_iterator i = allPieces->constBegin();
3697  while (i != allPieces->constEnd())
3698  {
3699  if (i.value().isInLayout())
3700  {
3701  pieces.insert(i.key(), i.value());
3702  }
3703  ++i;
3704  }
3705 
3706  if (pieces.count() == 0)
3707  {
3708  QMessageBox::information(this, tr("Layout mode"), tr("You can't use Layout mode yet. Please, "
3709  "include at least one pattern piece in layout."),
3710  QMessageBox::Ok, QMessageBox::Ok);
3711  mode == Draw::Calculation ? showDraftMode(true) : showPieceMode(true);
3712  return;
3713  }
3714  }
3715  }
3716 
3717  draftBlockComboBox->setCurrentIndex(-1);// Hide pattern pieces
3718 
3719  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Show layout scene");
3720 
3721  SaveCurrentScene();
3722 
3723  try
3724  {
3725  pieceList = preparePiecesForLayout(pieces);
3726  }
3727 
3728  catch (VException &exception)
3729  {
3730  pieceList.clear();
3731  QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Layout mode"),
3732  tr("You can't use Layout mode yet.") + QLatin1String(" \n") + exception.ErrorMessage(),
3733  QMessageBox::Ok, QMessageBox::Ok);
3734  mode == Draw::Calculation ? showDraftMode(true) : showPieceMode(true);
3735  return;
3736  }
3737 
3738  currentScene = tempSceneLayout;
3739  emit ui->view->itemClicked(nullptr);
3740  ui->view->setScene(currentScene);
3741 
3742  if (mode == Draw::Calculation)
3743  {
3744  currentToolBoxIndex = ui->layout_ToolBox->currentIndex();
3745  }
3746  mode = Draw::Layout;
3747  setToolsEnabled(true);
3748  setWidgetsEnabled(true);
3749  ui->layout_ToolBox->setCurrentIndex(ui->layout_ToolBox->indexOf(ui->layout_Page));
3750 
3751  mouseCoordinates->updateCoordinates(QPointF());
3752 
3753  if (qApp->patternType() == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
3754  {
3755  gradationHeightsLabel->setVisible(false);
3756  gradationHeights->setVisible(false);
3757  gradationSizesLabel->setVisible(false);
3758  gradationSizes->setVisible(false);
3759  }
3760 
3761  showLayoutPages(ui->listWidget->currentRow());
3762 
3763  if (scenes.isEmpty())
3764  {
3765  ui->layoutSettings_ToolButton->click();
3766  }
3767 
3768  helpLabel->setText("");
3769  }
3770  else
3771  {
3772  ui->layoutMode_Action->setChecked(true);
3773  }
3774 }
3775 
3776 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3777 /**
3778  * @brief SaveAs save as pattern file.
3779  * @return true for successes saving.
3780  */
3781 bool MainWindow::SaveAs()
3782 {
3783  if (patternReadOnly)
3784  {
3785  QMessageBox messageBox(this);
3786  messageBox.setIcon(QMessageBox::Warning);
3787  messageBox.setText(tr("Can not save file."));
3788  messageBox.setInformativeText(tr("Pattern is read only."));
3789  messageBox.setDefaultButton(QMessageBox::Ok);
3790  messageBox.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox::Ok);
3791  messageBox.exec();
3792  return false;
3793  }
3794  QString filters(tr("Pattern files") + QLatin1String("(*.") + sm2dExt + QLatin1String(")"));
3795  QString filePath = qApp->getFilePath();
3796  QString dir;
3797  QString fileName;
3798  bool usedNotExistedDir = false;
3799  if (filePath.isEmpty())
3800  {
3801  dir = qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->getPatternPath();
3802  fileName = tr("pattern");
3803  }
3804  else
3805  {
3806  dir = QFileInfo(filePath).path();
3807  fileName = QFileInfo(filePath).baseName();
3808  }
3809 
3810  auto RemoveTempDir = [usedNotExistedDir, dir]()
3811  {
3812  if (usedNotExistedDir)
3813  {
3814  QDir directory(dir);
3815  directory.rmpath(".");
3816  }
3817  };
3818 
3819  QDir directory(dir);
3820  if (!directory.exists())
3821  {
3822  usedNotExistedDir = directory.mkpath(".");
3823  }
3824 
3825  fileName = fileDialog(this, tr("Save as"),
3826  dir + QLatin1String("/") + fileName + QLatin1String(".") + sm2dExt,
3827  filters, nullptr, QFileDialog::DontUseNativeDialog, QFileDialog::AnyFile,
3828  QFileDialog::AcceptSave);
3829 
3830  if (fileName.isEmpty())
3831  {
3832  RemoveTempDir();
3833  return false;
3834  }
3835 
3836  QFileInfo fileInfo(fileName);
3837  if (fileInfo.suffix().isEmpty() && fileInfo.suffix() != sm2dExt)
3838  {
3839  fileName += QLatin1String(".") + sm2dExt;
3840  }
3841 
3842  if (fileInfo.exists() && fileName != filePath)
3843  {
3844  // Temporarily try to lock the file before saving
3845  // Also help to rewrite current read-only pattern
3846  VLockGuard<char> lock(fileName);
3847  if (!lock.IsLocked())
3848  {
3849  qCWarning(vMainWindow, "%s",
3850  qUtf8Printable(tr("Failed to lock. File with this name is opened in another window.")));
3851  RemoveTempDir();
3852  return false;
3853  }
3854  }
3855 
3856  // Need for restoring previous state in case of failure
3857  const bool wasModified = doc->IsModified(); // Need because SetReadOnly() will change internal state
3858  QString error;
3859  const bool result = SavePattern(fileName, error);
3860  if (result == false)
3861  {
3862  QMessageBox messageBox(this);
3863  messageBox.setIcon(QMessageBox::Warning);
3864  messageBox.setInformativeText(tr("Could not save file"));
3865  messageBox.setDefaultButton(QMessageBox::Ok);
3866  messageBox.setDetailedText(error);
3867  messageBox.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox::Ok);
3868  messageBox.exec();
3869 
3870  // Restoring previous state
3871  doc->SetModified(wasModified);
3872 
3873  RemoveTempDir();
3874  return result;
3875  }
3876 
3877  QFile::remove(qApp->getFilePath() + autosavePrefix);
3878  m_curFileFormatVersion = VPatternConverter::PatternMaxVer;
3879  m_curFileFormatVersionStr = VPatternConverter::PatternMaxVerStr;
3880 
3881  if (fileName != filePath)
3882  {
3883  VlpCreateLock(lock, fileName);
3884  if (!lock->IsLocked())
3885  {
3886  qCWarning(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Failed to lock. This file already opened in another window. "
3887  "Expect collisions when running 2 copies of the program.")));
3888  RemoveTempDir();
3889  return false;
3890  }
3891  }
3892 
3893  RemoveTempDir();
3894  return result;
3895 }
3896 
3897 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3898 /**
3899  * @brief Save save pattern file.
3900  * @return true for successes saving.
3901  */
3902 bool MainWindow::Save()
3903 {
3904  if (patternReadOnly)
3905  {
3906  QMessageBox messageBox(this);
3907  messageBox.setIcon(QMessageBox::Warning);
3908  messageBox.setText(tr("Can not save file."));
3909  messageBox.setInformativeText(tr("Pattern is read only."));
3910  messageBox.setDefaultButton(QMessageBox::Ok);
3911  messageBox.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox::Ok);
3912  messageBox.exec();
3913  return false;
3914  }
3915  if (qApp->getFilePath().isEmpty())
3916  {
3917  return SaveAs();
3918  }
3919  else
3920  {
3921  if (m_curFileFormatVersion < VPatternConverter::PatternMaxVer
3922  && not ContinueFormatRewrite(m_curFileFormatVersionStr, VPatternConverter::PatternMaxVerStr))
3923  {
3924  return false;
3925  }
3926 
3927 #ifdef Q_OS_WIN32
3928  qt_ntfs_permission_lookup++; // turn checking on
3929 #endif /*Q_OS_WIN32*/
3930  const bool isFileWritable = QFileInfo(qApp->getFilePath()).isWritable();
3931 
3932  if (!isFileWritable)
3933  {
3934  QMessageBox messageBox(this);
3935  messageBox.setIcon(QMessageBox::Question);
3936  messageBox.setText(tr("The document has no write permissions."));
3937  messageBox.setInformativeText("Do you want to change the permissions?");
3938  messageBox.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::Cancel);
3939  messageBox.setDefaultButton(QMessageBox::Yes);
3940 
3941  if (messageBox.exec() == QMessageBox::Yes)
3942  {
3943  bool changed = QFile::setPermissions(qApp->getFilePath(),
3944  QFileInfo(qApp->getFilePath()).permissions() | QFileDevice::WriteUser);
3945 #ifdef Q_OS_WIN32
3946  qt_ntfs_permission_lookup--; // turn it off again
3947 #endif /*Q_OS_WIN32*/
3948 
3949  if (!changed)
3950  {
3951  QMessageBox messageBox(this);
3952  messageBox.setIcon(QMessageBox::Warning);
3953  messageBox.setText(tr("Cannot set permissions for %1 to writable.").arg(qApp->getFilePath()));
3954  messageBox.setInformativeText(tr("Could not save the file."));
3955  messageBox.setDefaultButton(QMessageBox::Ok);
3956  messageBox.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox::Ok);
3957  messageBox.exec();
3958  return false;
3959  }
3960  }
3961  else
3962  {
3963  return false;
3964  }
3965  }
3966 
3967  QString error;
3968  bool result = SavePattern(qApp->getFilePath(), error);
3969  if (result)
3970  {
3971  QFile::remove(qApp->getFilePath() + autosavePrefix);
3972  m_curFileFormatVersion = VPatternConverter::PatternMaxVer;
3973  m_curFileFormatVersionStr = VPatternConverter::PatternMaxVerStr;
3974  }
3975  else
3976  {
3977  QMessageBox messageBox(this);
3978  messageBox.setIcon(QMessageBox::Warning);
3979  messageBox.setText(tr("Could not save the file"));
3980  messageBox.setDefaultButton(QMessageBox::Ok);
3981  messageBox.setDetailedText(error);
3982  messageBox.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox::Ok);
3983  messageBox.exec();
3984  }
3985  return result;
3986  }
3987 }
3988 
3989 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3990 /**
3991  * @brief Open ask user select pattern file.
3992  */
3993 void MainWindow::Open()
3994 {
3995  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Opening new file.");
3996 
3997  const QString filter = tr("Pattern files") + QLatin1String(" (*.") + valExt +
3998  QLatin1String(" *.") + sm2dExt + QLatin1String(")");
3999 
4000  //Get list last open files
4001  const QStringList files = qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->GetRecentFileList();
4002  QString dir;
4003  if (files.isEmpty())
4004  {
4005  dir = QDir::homePath();
4006  }
4007  else
4008  {
4009  //Absolute path to last open file
4010  dir = QFileInfo(files.first()).absolutePath();
4011  }
4012  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Run QFileDialog::getOpenFileName: dir = %s.", qUtf8Printable(dir));
4013 
4014  const QString filename = fileDialog(this, tr("Open file"), dir, filter, nullptr, QFileDialog::DontUseNativeDialog,
4015  QFileDialog::ExistingFile, QFileDialog::AcceptOpen);
4016 
4017  if (filename.isEmpty())
4018  {
4019  return;
4020  }
4021  LoadPattern(filename);
4022 }
4023 
4024 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4025 /**
4026  * @brief Clear reset to default window.
4027  */
4028 void MainWindow::Clear()
4029 {
4030  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Resetting main window.");
4031  lock.reset();
4032  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Unlocked pattern file.");
4033  showDraftMode(true);
4034  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Returned to Draft mode.");
4035  setCurrentFile(QString());
4036  pattern->Clear();
4037  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Clearing pattern.");
4038  if (!qApp->getFilePath().isEmpty() && not doc->MPath().isEmpty())
4039  {
4040  watcher->removePath(AbsoluteMPath(qApp->getFilePath(), doc->MPath()));
4041  }
4042  doc->clear();
4043  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Clearing scenes.");
4044  draftScene->clear();
4045  pieceScene->clear();
4046  handleArrowTool(true);
4047  draftBlockComboBox->clear();
4048  ui->showDraftMode->setEnabled(false);
4049  ui->pieceMode_Action->setEnabled(false);
4050  ui->layoutMode_Action->setEnabled(false);
4051  ui->newDraft_Action->setEnabled(false);
4052  ui->renameDraft_Action->setEnabled(false);
4053  ui->save_Action->setEnabled(false);
4054  ui->saveAs_Action->setEnabled(false);
4055  ui->patternPreferences_Action->setEnabled(false);
4056 
4057  // disable zoom actions until a pattern is loaded
4058  zoomScaleSpinBox->setEnabled(false);
4059  ui->zoomIn_Action->setEnabled(false);
4060  ui->zoomOut_Action->setEnabled(false);
4061  ui->zoomToFit_Action->setEnabled(false);
4062  ui->zoomToSelected_Action->setEnabled(false);
4063  ui->zoom100Percent_Action->setEnabled(false);
4064  ui->zoomToPrevious_Action->setEnabled(false);
4065  ui->zoomToArea_Action->setEnabled(false);
4066  ui->zoomPan_Action->setEnabled(false);
4067  ui->zoomToPoint_Action->setEnabled(false);
4068 
4069  //disable group actions
4070  ui->groups_DockWidget->setEnabled(false);
4071 
4072  //disable history menu actions
4073  ui->history_Action->setEnabled(false);
4074  ui->table_Action->setEnabled(false);
4075 
4076  ui->lastTool_Action->setEnabled(false);
4077  ui->increaseSize_Action->setEnabled(false);
4078  ui->decreaseSize_Action->setEnabled(false);
4079  ui->useToolColor_Action->setEnabled(false);
4080  ui->showPointNames_Action->setEnabled(false);
4081  ui->toggleWireframe_Action->setEnabled(false);
4082  ui->toggleControlPoints_Action->setEnabled(false);
4083  ui->toggleAxisOrigin_Action->setEnabled(false);
4084  ui->toggleSeamAllowances_Action->setEnabled(false);
4085  ui->toggleGrainLines_Action->setEnabled(false);
4086  ui->toggleLabels_Action->setEnabled(false);
4087  //ui->toggleAnchorPoints_Action->setEnabled(false);
4088 
4089 
4090  //disable measurements menu actions
4091  ui->loadIndividual_Action->setEnabled(false);
4092  ui->loadMultisize_Action->setEnabled(false);
4093  ui->unloadMeasurements_Action->setEnabled(false);
4094  ui->editCurrent_Action->setEnabled(false);
4095 
4096  setToolsEnabled(false);
4097  qApp->setPatternUnit(Unit::Cm);
4098  qApp->setPatternType(MeasurementsType::Unknown);
4099 
4100 #ifndef QT_NO_CURSOR
4101  QGuiApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
4102 #endif
4103  CleanLayout();
4104  pieceList.clear(); // don't move to CleanLayout()
4105  qApp->getUndoStack()->clear();
4106  toolProperties->clearPropertyBrowser();
4107  toolProperties->itemClicked(nullptr);
4108 }
4109 
4110 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4111 void MainWindow::FileClosedCorrect()
4112 {
4113  WriteSettings();
4114 
4115  //File was closed correct.
4116  QStringList restoreFiles = qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->GetRestoreFileList();
4117  restoreFiles.removeAll(qApp->getFilePath());
4118  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->SetRestoreFileList(restoreFiles);
4119 
4120  // Remove autosave file
4121  QFile autofile(qApp->getFilePath() + autosavePrefix);
4122  if (autofile.exists())
4123  {
4124  autofile.remove();
4125  }
4126  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "File %s closed correct.", qUtf8Printable(qApp->getFilePath()));
4127 }
4128 
4129 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4130 void MainWindow::fullParseFile()
4131 {
4132  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Full parsing file");
4133 
4134  toolProperties->clearPropertyBrowser();
4135  try
4136  {
4137  setGuiEnabled(true);
4138  doc->Parse(Document::FullParse);
4139  }
4140 
4141  catch (const VExceptionUndo &exception)
4142  {
4143  Q_UNUSED(exception)
4144 
4145  /* If user want undo last operation before undo we need finish broken redo operation. For those we post event
4146  * myself. Later in method customEvent call undo.*/
4147  QApplication::postEvent(this, new UndoEvent());
4148  return;
4149  }
4150 
4151  catch (const VExceptionObjectError &exception)
4152  {
4153  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Error parsing file.")), //-V807
4154  qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()), qUtf8Printable(exception.DetailedInformation()));
4155  setGuiEnabled(false);
4156 
4157  if (!VApplication::IsGUIMode())
4158  {
4159  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
4160  }
4161  return;
4162  }
4163 
4164  catch (const VExceptionConversionError &exception)
4165  {
4166  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Error can't convert value.")),
4167  qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()), qUtf8Printable(exception.DetailedInformation()));
4168  setGuiEnabled(false);
4169 
4170  if (!VApplication::IsGUIMode())
4171  {
4172  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
4173  }
4174  return;
4175  }
4176 
4177  catch (const VExceptionEmptyParameter &exception)
4178  {
4179  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Error empty parameter.")),
4180  qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()), qUtf8Printable(exception.DetailedInformation()));
4181  setGuiEnabled(false);
4182 
4183  if (!VApplication::IsGUIMode())
4184  {
4185  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
4186  }
4187  return;
4188  }
4189 
4190  catch (const VExceptionWrongId &exception)
4191  {
4192  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Error wrong id.")),
4193  qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()), qUtf8Printable(exception.DetailedInformation()));
4194  setGuiEnabled(false);
4195 
4196  if (!VApplication::IsGUIMode())
4197  {
4198  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
4199  }
4200  return;
4201  }
4202 
4203  catch (VException &exception)
4204  {
4205  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Error parsing file.")),
4206  qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()), qUtf8Printable(exception.DetailedInformation()));
4207  setGuiEnabled(false);
4208 
4209  if (!VApplication::IsGUIMode())
4210  {
4211  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
4212  }
4213  return;
4214  }
4215  catch (const std::bad_alloc &)
4216  {
4217  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Error parsing file (std::bad_alloc).")));
4218 
4219  setGuiEnabled(false);
4220 
4221  if (!VApplication::IsGUIMode())
4222  {
4223  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
4224  }
4225  return;
4226  }
4227 
4228  QString draftBlock;
4229  if (draftBlockComboBox->currentIndex() != -1)
4230  {
4231  draftBlock = draftBlockComboBox->itemText(draftBlockComboBox->currentIndex());
4232  }
4233  draftBlockComboBox->blockSignals(true);
4234  draftBlockComboBox->clear();
4235 
4236  QStringList draftBlockNames = doc->getPatternPieces();
4237  draftBlockNames.sort();
4238  draftBlockComboBox->addItems(draftBlockNames);
4239 
4240  if (!drawMode)
4241  {
4242  draftBlockComboBox->setCurrentIndex(draftBlockComboBox->count()-1);
4243  }
4244  else
4245  {
4246  const qint32 index = draftBlockComboBox->findText(draftBlock);
4247  if (index != -1)
4248  {
4249  draftBlockComboBox->setCurrentIndex(index);
4250  }
4251  }
4252  draftBlockComboBox->blockSignals(false);
4253  ui->patternPreferences_Action->setEnabled(true);
4254 
4255  changeDraftBlockGlobally(draftBlock);
4256 
4257  setToolsEnabled(draftBlockComboBox->count() > 0);
4258  patternPiecesWidget->updateList();
4259 
4260  VMainGraphicsView::NewSceneRect(draftScene, qApp->getSceneView());
4261  VMainGraphicsView::NewSceneRect(pieceScene, qApp->getSceneView());
4262 }
4263 
4264 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4265 void MainWindow::changeDraftBlockGlobally(const QString &draftBlock)
4266 {
4267  const qint32 index = draftBlockComboBox->findText(draftBlock);
4268  try
4269  {
4270  if (index != -1)
4271  { // -1 for not found
4272  changeDraftBlock(index, false);
4273  draftBlockComboBox->blockSignals(true);
4274  draftBlockComboBox->setCurrentIndex(index);
4275  draftBlockComboBox->blockSignals(false);
4276  }
4277  else
4278  {
4279  changeDraftBlock(0, false);
4280  }
4281  }
4282 
4283  catch (VExceptionBadId &exception)
4284  {
4285  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Bad id.")),
4286  qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()), qUtf8Printable(exception.DetailedInformation()));
4287  setGuiEnabled(false);
4288 
4289  if (!VApplication::IsGUIMode())
4290  {
4291  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
4292  }
4293  return;
4294  }
4295 
4296  catch (const VExceptionEmptyParameter &exception)
4297  {
4298  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Error empty parameter.")),
4299  qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()), qUtf8Printable(exception.DetailedInformation()));
4300  setGuiEnabled(false);
4301 
4302  if (!VApplication::IsGUIMode())
4303  {
4304  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
4305  }
4306  return;
4307  }
4308 }
4309 
4310 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4311 void MainWindow::setGuiEnabled(bool enabled)
4312 {
4313  if (guiEnabled != enabled)
4314  {
4315  if (enabled == false)
4316  {
4317  handleArrowTool(true);
4318  qApp->getUndoStack()->clear();
4319  }
4320  setWidgetsEnabled(enabled);
4321 
4322  guiEnabled = enabled;
4323 
4324  setToolsEnabled(enabled);
4325  ui->statusBar->setEnabled(enabled);
4326  #ifndef QT_NO_CURSOR
4327  QGuiApplication::setOverrideCursor(Qt::ArrowCursor);
4328  #endif
4329  }
4330 }
4331 
4332 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4333 /**
4334  * @brief setWidgetsEnabled enable action button.
4335  * @param enable enable value.
4336  */
4337 void MainWindow::setWidgetsEnabled(bool enable)
4338 {
4339  const bool draftStage = (mode == Draw::Calculation);
4340  const bool pieceStage = (mode == Draw::Modeling);
4341  const bool designStage = (draftStage || pieceStage);
4342  const bool layoutStage = (mode == Draw::Layout);
4343 
4344  draftBlockComboBox->setEnabled(enable && draftStage);
4345  ui->arrow_Action->setEnabled(enable && designStage);
4346 
4347  // enable file menu actions
4348  ui->save_Action->setEnabled(isWindowModified() && enable && not patternReadOnly);
4349  ui->saveAs_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4350  ui->patternPreferences_Action->setEnabled(enable && designStage);
4351 
4352  // enable edit menu actions
4353  undoAction->setEnabled(enable && designStage && qApp->getUndoStack()->canUndo());
4354  redoAction->setEnabled(enable && designStage && qApp->getUndoStack()->canRedo());
4355 
4356  // enable view menu actions
4357  ui->showDraftMode->setEnabled(enable);
4358  ui->pieceMode_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4359  ui->layoutMode_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4360  zoomScaleSpinBox->setEnabled(enable);
4361  ui->zoomIn_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4362  ui->zoomOut_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4363  ui->zoomToFit_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4364  ui->zoomToSelected_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4365  ui->zoom100Percent_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4366  ui->zoomToPrevious_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4367  ui->zoomToArea_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4368  ui->zoomPan_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4369  ui->zoomToPoint_Action->setEnabled(enable && draftStage);
4370  m_zoomToPointComboBox->setEnabled(enable && draftStage);
4371 
4372  ui->increaseSize_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4373  ui->decreaseSize_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4374  ui->useToolColor_Action->setEnabled(enable && draftStage);
4375  ui->showPointNames_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4376  ui->toggleWireframe_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4377  ui->toggleControlPoints_Action->setEnabled(enable && draftStage);
4378  ui->toggleAxisOrigin_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4379  ui->toggleSeamAllowances_Action->setEnabled(enable && pieceStage);
4380  ui->toggleGrainLines_Action->setEnabled(enable && pieceStage);
4381  ui->toggleLabels_Action->setEnabled(enable && pieceStage);
4382  //ui->toggleAnchorPoints_Action->setEnabled(enable && draftStage);
4383 
4384  //enable group actions
4385  groupsWidget->setAddGroupEnabled(enable && draftStage);
4386 
4387  //enable tool menu actions
4388  ui->newDraft_Action->setEnabled(enable && draftStage);
4389  ui->renameDraft_Action->setEnabled(enable && draftStage);
4390 
4391  //enable measurement menu actions
4392  ui->loadIndividual_Action->setEnabled(enable && designStage);
4393  ui->loadMultisize_Action->setEnabled(enable && designStage);
4394  ui->unloadMeasurements_Action->setEnabled(enable && designStage);
4395  ui->table_Action->setEnabled(enable && draftStage);
4396 
4397  //enable history menu actions
4398  ui->history_Action->setEnabled(enable && draftStage);
4399 
4400  //enable utilities menu actions
4401  ui->calculator_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4402  ui->decimalChart_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4403 
4404  //enable help menu
4405  ui->shortcuts_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4406 
4407  //enable dock widget actions
4408  ui->groups_DockWidget->setEnabled(enable && designStage);
4409  ui->toolProperties_DockWidget->setEnabled(enable && draftStage);
4410  ui->layoutPages_DockWidget->setEnabled(enable && layoutStage);
4411  actionDockWidgetToolOptions->setEnabled(enable && designStage);
4412  actionDockWidgetGroups->setEnabled(enable && designStage);
4413  actionDockWidgetLayouts->setEnabled(enable && layoutStage);
4414 
4415  //Now we don't want allow user call context menu
4416  draftScene->setToolsDisabled(!enable, doc->getActiveDraftBlockName());
4417  ui->view->setEnabled(enable);
4418 }
4419 
4420 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4421 void MainWindow::UpdateHeightsList(const QStringList &list)
4422 {
4423  QString value;
4424  if (gradationHeights->currentIndex() != -1)
4425  {
4426  value = gradationHeights->currentText();
4427  }
4428 
4429  gradationHeights->blockSignals(true);
4430  gradationHeights->clear();
4431  gradationHeights->addItems(list);
4432  gradationHeights->blockSignals(false);
4433 
4434  int index = gradationHeights->findText(value);
4435  if (index != -1)
4436  {
4437  gradationHeights->setCurrentIndex(index);
4438  }
4439  else
4440  {
4441  ChangedHeight(0);
4442  }
4443 }
4444 
4445 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4446 void MainWindow::UpdateSizesList(const QStringList &list)
4447 {
4448  QString value;
4449  if (gradationSizes->currentIndex() != -1)
4450  {
4451  value = gradationSizes->currentText();
4452  }
4453 
4454  gradationSizes->blockSignals(true);
4455  gradationSizes->clear();
4456  gradationSizes->addItems(list);
4457  gradationSizes->blockSignals(false);
4458 
4459  int index = gradationSizes->findText(value);
4460  if (index != -1)
4461  {
4462  gradationSizes->setCurrentIndex(index);
4463  }
4464  else
4465  {
4466  ChangedSize(0);
4467  }
4468 }
4469 
4470 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4471 /**
4472  * @brief NewPattern create new empty pattern.
4473  */
4474 void MainWindow::New()
4475 {
4476  if (draftBlockComboBox->count() == 0)
4477  {
4478  // Creating a new pattern design requires creating a new draft block
4479  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "New Draft Block.");
4480  QString draftBlockName = tr("Draft block %1").arg(draftBlockComboBox->count()+1);
4481  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Generated Draft Block name: %s", qUtf8Printable(draftBlockName));
4482 
4483  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "First Draft Block");
4484  DialogNewPattern newPattern(pattern, draftBlockName, this);
4485  if (newPattern.exec() == QDialog::Accepted)
4486  {
4487  draftBlockName = newPattern.name();
4488  qApp->setPatternUnit(newPattern.PatternUnit());
4489  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Draft Block name: %s", qUtf8Printable(draftBlockName));
4490  }
4491  else
4492  {
4493  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Creating new Draft Block was canceled.");
4494  return;
4495  }
4496 
4497  //Set scene size to size scene view
4498  VMainGraphicsView::NewSceneRect(draftScene, ui->view);
4499  VMainGraphicsView::NewSceneRect(pieceScene, ui->view);
4500 
4501  addDraftBlock(draftBlockName);
4502 
4503  mouseCoordinates = new MouseCoordinates(qApp->patternUnit());
4504  ui->statusBar->addPermanentWidget((mouseCoordinates));
4505 
4506  m_curFileFormatVersion = VPatternConverter::PatternMaxVer;
4507  m_curFileFormatVersionStr = VPatternConverter::PatternMaxVerStr;
4508  }
4509  else
4510  {
4511  OpenNewSeamly2D();
4512  }
4513 }
4514 
4515 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4516 /**
4517  * @brief haveChange enable action save if we have unsaved change.
4518  */
4519 void MainWindow::patternChangesWereSaved(bool saved)
4520 {
4521  if (guiEnabled)
4522  {
4523  const bool state = doc->IsModified() || !saved;
4524  setWindowModified(state);
4525  not patternReadOnly ? ui->save_Action->setEnabled(state): ui->save_Action->setEnabled(false);
4526  isLayoutStale = true;
4527  }
4528 }
4529 
4530 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4531 /**
4532  * @brief ChangedSize change new size value.
4533  * @param index index of the selected item.
4534  */
4535 void MainWindow::ChangedSize(int index)
4536 {
4537  const int size = static_cast<int>(VContainer::size());
4538  if (updateMeasurements(AbsoluteMPath(qApp->getFilePath(), doc->MPath()),
4539  gradationSizes.data()->itemText(index).toInt(),
4540  static_cast<int>(VContainer::height())))
4541  {
4542  doc->LiteParseTree(Document::LiteParse);
4543  emit pieceScene->DimensionsChanged();
4544  }
4545  else
4546  {
4547  qCWarning(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Couldn't update measurements.")));
4548 
4549  const qint32 index = gradationSizes->findText(QString().setNum(size));
4550  if (index != -1)
4551  {
4552  gradationSizes->setCurrentIndex(index);
4553  }
4554  else
4555  {
4556  qCWarning(vMainWindow, "Couldn't restore size value.");
4557  }
4558  }
4559 }
4560 
4561 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4562 /**
4563  * @brief ChangedGrowth change new height value.
4564  * @param index index of the selected item.
4565  */
4566 void MainWindow::ChangedHeight(int index)
4567 {
4568  const int height = static_cast<int>(VContainer::height());
4569  if (updateMeasurements(AbsoluteMPath(qApp->getFilePath(), doc->MPath()), static_cast<int>(VContainer::size()),
4570  gradationHeights.data()->itemText(index).toInt()))
4571  {
4572  doc->LiteParseTree(Document::LiteParse);
4573  emit pieceScene->DimensionsChanged();
4574  }
4575  else
4576  {
4577  qCWarning(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Couldn't update measurements.")));
4578 
4579  const qint32 index = gradationHeights->findText(QString().setNum(height));
4580  if (index != -1)
4581  {
4582  gradationHeights->setCurrentIndex(index);
4583  }
4584  else
4585  {
4586  qCWarning(vMainWindow, "Couldn't restore height value.");
4587  }
4588  }
4589 }
4590 
4591 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4592 void MainWindow::SetDefaultHeight()
4593 {
4594  const QString defHeight = QString().setNum(doc->GetDefCustomHeight());
4595  int index = gradationHeights->findText(defHeight);
4596  if (index != -1)
4597  {
4598  gradationHeights->setCurrentIndex(index);
4599  }
4600  else
4601  {
4602  index = gradationHeights->findText(QString().setNum(VContainer::height()));
4603  if (index != -1)
4604  {
4605  gradationHeights->setCurrentIndex(index);
4606  }
4607  }
4608  VContainer::setHeight(gradationHeights->currentText().toInt());
4609 }
4610 
4611 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4612 void MainWindow::SetDefaultSize()
4613 {
4614  const QString defSize = QString().setNum(doc->GetDefCustomSize());
4615  int index = gradationSizes->findText(defSize);
4616  if (index != -1)
4617  {
4618  gradationSizes->setCurrentIndex(index);
4619  }
4620  else
4621  {
4622  index = gradationSizes->findText(QString().setNum(VContainer::size()));
4623  if (index != -1)
4624  {
4625  gradationSizes->setCurrentIndex(index);
4626  }
4627  }
4628  VContainer::setSize(gradationSizes->currentText().toInt());
4629 }
4630 
4631 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4632 /**
4633  * @brief setToolsEnabled enable button.
4634  * @param enable enable value.
4635  */
4636 void MainWindow::setToolsEnabled(bool enable)
4637 {
4638  bool draftTools = false;
4639  bool pieceTools = false;
4640  bool layoutTools = false;
4641 
4642  switch (mode)
4643  {
4644  case Draw::Calculation:
4645  draftTools = enable;
4646  break;
4647  case Draw::Modeling:
4648  pieceTools = enable;
4649  break;
4650  case Draw::Layout:
4651  layoutTools = enable;
4652  break;
4653  default:
4654  break;
4655  }
4656 
4657  // This check helps to find missed tools
4658  Q_STATIC_ASSERT_X(static_cast<int>(Tool::LAST_ONE_DO_NOT_USE) == 53, "Not all tools were handled.");
4659 
4660  //Toolbox Drafting Tools
4661  //Points
4662  ui->pointAtDistanceAngle_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4663  ui->alongLine_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4664  ui->normal_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4665  ui->bisector_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4666  ui->shoulderPoint_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4667  ui->pointOfContact_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4668  ui->triangle_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4669  ui->pointIntersectXY_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4670  ui->height_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4671  ui->lineIntersectAxis_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4672  ui->midpoint_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4673 
4674  //Lines
4675  ui->line_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4676  ui->lineIntersect_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4677 
4678  //Curves
4679  ui->curve_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4680  ui->spline_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4681  ui->curveWithCPs_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4682  ui->splineWithCPs_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4683  ui->pointAlongCurve_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4684  ui->pointAlongSpline_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4685  ui->pointOfIntersectionCurves_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4686  ui->curveIntersectAxis_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4687 
4688  //Arcs
4689  ui->arc_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4690  ui->pointAlongArc_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4691  ui->arcIntersectAxis_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4692  ui->pointOfIntersectionArcs_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4693  ui->pointOfIntersectionCircles_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4694  ui->pointFromCircleAndTangent_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4695  ui->pointFromArcAndTangent_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4696  ui->arcWithLength_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4697  ui->ellipticalArc_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4698 
4699  //Operations
4700  ui->group_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4701  ui->rotation_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4702  ui->mirrorByLine_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4703  ui->mirrorByAxis_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4704  ui->move_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4705  ui->trueDarts_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4706  ui->exportDraftBlocks_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4707 
4708  //Piece
4709  ui->addPatternPiece_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4710  ui->anchorPoint_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools & (pattern->DataPieces()->size() > 0));
4711  ui->internalPath_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools & (pattern->DataPieces()->size() > 0));
4712  ui->insertNodes_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools & (pattern->DataPieces()->size() > 0));
4713 
4714  //Details
4715  ui->unitePieces_ToolButton->setEnabled(pieceTools);
4716  ui->exportPiecesAs_ToolButton->setEnabled(pieceTools);
4717 
4718  //Layout
4719  ui->layoutSettings_ToolButton->setEnabled(layoutTools);
4720 
4721  //enable Toolbox Toolbar actions
4722  ui->arrow_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4723  ui->points_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4724  ui->lines_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4725  ui->arcs_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4726  ui->curves_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4727  ui->modifications_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4728  ui->pieces_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4729  ui->details_Action->setEnabled(pieceTools);
4730  ui->layout_Action->setEnabled(layoutTools);
4731 
4732  //Menu Actions
4733  //Points
4734  ui->midpoint_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4735  ui->pointAtDistanceAngle_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4736  ui->pointAlongLine_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4737  ui->pointAlongPerpendicular_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4738  ui->bisector_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4739  ui->pointOnShoulder_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4740  ui->pointOfContact_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4741  ui->triangle_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4742  ui->pointIntersectXY_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4743  ui->perpendicularPoint_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4744  ui->pointIntersectAxis_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4745 
4746  //Lines
4747  ui->lineTool_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4748  ui->lineIntersect_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4749 
4750  //Curves
4751  ui->curve_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4752  ui->spline_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4753  ui->curveWithCPs_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4754  ui->splineWithCPs_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4755  ui->pointAlongCurve_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4756  ui->pointAlongSpline_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4757  ui->curveIntersectCurve_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4758  ui->splineIntersectAxis_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4759 
4760  //Arcs
4761  ui->arcTool_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4762  ui->pointAlongArc_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4763  ui->arcIntersectAxis_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4764  ui->arcIntersectArc_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4765  ui->circleIntersect_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4766  ui->circleTangent_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4767  ui->arcTangent_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);;
4768  ui->arcWithLength_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4769  ui->ellipticalArc_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4770 
4771  //Operations
4772  ui->group_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4773  ui->rotation_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4774  ui->mirrorByLine_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4775  ui->mirrorByAxis_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4776  ui->move_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4777  ui->trueDarts_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4778  ui->exportDraftBlocks_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4779 
4780  //Piece
4781  ui->addPiece_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4782  ui->anchorPoint_Action->setEnabled(draftTools & (pattern->DataPieces()->size() > 0));
4783  ui->internalPath_Action->setEnabled(draftTools & (pattern->DataPieces()->size() > 0));
4784  ui->insertNodes_Action->setEnabled(draftTools & (pattern->DataPieces()->size() > 0));
4785 
4786  //Details
4787  ui->union_Action->setEnabled(pieceTools);
4788  ui->exportPieces_Action->setEnabled(pieceTools);
4789 
4790  //Layout
4791  ui->newPrintLayout_Action->setEnabled(layoutTools);
4792  ui->exportLayout_Action->setEnabled(layoutTools);
4793  ui->lastTool_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
4794 
4795  ui->arrowPointer_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools || pieceTools);
4796  ui->arrowPointer_ToolButton->setChecked(draftTools || pieceTools);
4797  ui->arrow_Action->setChecked(draftTools || pieceTools);
4798 }
