4800 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4801 void MainWindow::SetLayoutModeActions()
4802 {
4803  const bool enabled = not scenes.isEmpty();
4804 
4805  ui->exportLayout_ToolButton->setEnabled(enabled);
4806  ui->exportAs_Action->setEnabled(enabled);
4807  ui->printPreview_Action->setEnabled(enabled);
4808  ui->printPreviewTiled_Action->setEnabled(enabled);
4809  ui->print_Action->setEnabled(enabled);
4810  ui->printTiled_Action->setEnabled(enabled);
4811 }
4812 
4813 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4814 /**
4815  * @brief MinimumScrollBar set scroll bar to minimum.
4816  */
4817 void MainWindow::MinimumScrollBar()
4818 {
4819  QScrollBar *horScrollBar = ui->view->horizontalScrollBar();
4820  horScrollBar->setValue(horScrollBar->minimum());
4821  QScrollBar *verScrollBar = ui->view->verticalScrollBar();
4822  verScrollBar->setValue(verScrollBar->minimum());
4823 }
4824 
4825 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4826 /**
4827  * @brief SavePattern save pattern file.
4828  * @param fileName pattern file name.
4829  * @return true if all is good.
4830  */
4831 bool MainWindow::SavePattern(const QString &fileName, QString &error)
4832 {
4833  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Saving pattern file %s.", qUtf8Printable(fileName));
4834  QFileInfo tempInfo(fileName);
4835 
4836  const QString filename = AbsoluteMPath(qApp->getFilePath(), doc->MPath());
4837  if (!filename.isEmpty() && qApp->getFilePath() != fileName)
4838  {
4839  doc->SetMPath(RelativeMPath(fileName, filename));
4840  }
4841 
4842  const bool result = doc->SaveDocument(fileName, error);
4843  if (result)
4844  {
4845  if (tempInfo.suffix() != QLatin1String("autosave"))
4846  {
4847  setCurrentFile(fileName);
4848  helpLabel->setText(tr("File saved"));
4849  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "File %s saved.", qUtf8Printable(fileName));
4850  patternChangesWereSaved(result);
4851  }
4852  }
4853  else
4854  {
4855  doc->SetMPath(filename);
4856  emit doc->UpdatePatternLabel();
4857  qCWarning(vMainWindow, "Could not save file %s. %s.", qUtf8Printable(fileName), qUtf8Printable(error));
4858  }
4859  return result;
4860 }
4861 
4862 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4863 /**
4864  * @brief AutoSavePattern start safe saving.
4865  */
4866 void MainWindow::AutoSavePattern()
4867 {
4868  if (patternReadOnly)
4869  {
4870  return;
4871  }
4872  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Autosaving pattern.");
4873 
4874  if (qApp->getFilePath().isEmpty() == false && this->isWindowModified() == true)
4875  {
4876  QString autofile = qApp->getFilePath() + autosavePrefix;
4877  QString error;
4878  SavePattern(autofile, error);
4879  }
4880 }
4881 
4882 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4883 /**
4884  * @brief setCurrentFile the function is called to reset the state of a few variables when a file
4885  * is loaded or saved, or when the user starts editing a new file (in which case fileName is empty).
4886  * @param fileName file name.
4887  */
4888 void MainWindow::setCurrentFile(const QString &fileName)
4889 {
4890  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Set current name to \"%s\"", qUtf8Printable(fileName));
4891  qApp->setFilePath(fileName);
4892  doc->SetPatternWasChanged(true);
4893  emit doc->UpdatePatternLabel();
4894  qApp->getUndoStack()->setClean();
4895 
4896  if (!qApp->getFilePath().isEmpty() && VApplication::IsGUIMode())
4897  {
4898  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Updating recent file list.");
4899  VSettings *settings = qApp->Seamly2DSettings();
4900  QStringList files = settings->GetRecentFileList();
4901  files.removeAll(fileName);
4902  files.prepend(fileName);
4903  while (files.size() > MaxRecentFiles)
4904  {
4905  files.removeLast();
4906  }
4907 
4908  settings->SetRecentFileList(files);
4909  UpdateRecentFileActions();
4910 
4911  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Updating restore file list.");
4912  QStringList restoreFiles = settings->GetRestoreFileList();
4913  restoreFiles.removeAll(fileName);
4914  restoreFiles.prepend(fileName);
4915  settings->SetRestoreFileList(restoreFiles);
4916  }
4917 
4918  UpdateWindowTitle();
4919 }
4920 
4921 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4922 /**
4923  * @brief ReadSettings read setting for app.
4924  */
4925 void MainWindow::ReadSettings()
4926 {
4927  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Reading settings.");
4928  const VSettings *settings = qApp->Seamly2DSettings();
4929  restoreGeometry(settings->GetGeometry());
4930  restoreState(settings->GetWindowState());
4931  restoreState(settings->GetToolbarsState(), APP_VERSION);
4932 
4933  // Scene antialiasing
4934  const bool graphOutputValue = settings->GetGraphicalOutput();
4935  ui->view->setRenderHint(QPainter::Antialiasing, graphOutputValue);
4936  ui->view->setRenderHint(QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform, graphOutputValue);
4937 
4938  // Stack limit
4939  qApp->getUndoStack()->setUndoLimit(settings->GetUndoCount());
4940 
4941  // Text under tool button icon
4942  ToolBarStyles();
4943 
4944  isToolOptionsDockVisible = ui->toolProperties_DockWidget->isVisible();
4945  isGroupsDockVisible = ui->groups_DockWidget->isVisible();
4946  isLayoutsDockVisible = ui->layoutPages_DockWidget->isVisible();
4947  isToolboxDockVisible = ui->toolbox_DockWidget->isVisible();
4948 }
4949 
4950 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4951 /**
4952  * @brief WriteSettings save setting for app.
4953  */
4954 void MainWindow::WriteSettings()
4955 {
4956  showDraftMode(true);
4957 
4958  VSettings *setings = qApp->Seamly2DSettings();
4959  setings->SetGeometry(saveGeometry());
4960  setings->SetWindowState(saveState());
4961  setings->SetToolbarsState(saveState(APP_VERSION));
4962 }
4963 
4964 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4965 /**
4966  * @brief MaybeSave The function is called to save pending changes.
4967  * @return returns true in all cases, except when the user clicks Cancel.
4968  */
4969 bool MainWindow::MaybeSave()
4970 {
4971  if (this->isWindowModified() && guiEnabled)
4972  {
4973  QScopedPointer<QMessageBox> messageBox(new QMessageBox(tr("Unsaved changes"),
4974  tr("The pattern has been modified.\n"
4975  "Do you want to save your changes?"),
4976  QMessageBox::Warning, QMessageBox::Yes, QMessageBox::No,
4977  QMessageBox::Cancel, this, Qt::Sheet));
4978 
4979  messageBox->setDefaultButton(QMessageBox::Yes);
4980  messageBox->setEscapeButton(QMessageBox::Cancel);
4981 
4982  messageBox->setButtonText(QMessageBox::Yes,
4983  qApp->getFilePath().isEmpty() || patternReadOnly ? tr("Save...") : tr("Save"));
4984  messageBox->setButtonText(QMessageBox::No, tr("Don't Save"));
4985 
4986  messageBox->setWindowModality(Qt::ApplicationModal);
4987  messageBox->setWindowFlags(windowFlags() & ~Qt::WindowContextHelpButtonHint
4988  & ~Qt::WindowMaximizeButtonHint
4989  & ~Qt::WindowMinimizeButtonHint);
4990  const auto ret = static_cast<QMessageBox::StandardButton>(messageBox->exec());
4991 
4992  switch (ret)
4993  {
4994  case QMessageBox::Yes:
4995  if (patternReadOnly)
4996  {
4997  return SaveAs();
4998  }
4999  else
5000  {
5001  return Save();
5002  }
5003  case QMessageBox::No:
5004  return true;
5005  case QMessageBox::Cancel:
5006  return false;
5007  default:
5008  break;
5009  }
5010  }
5011  return true;
5012 }
5013 
5014 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5015 void MainWindow::UpdateRecentFileActions()
5016 {
5017  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Updating recent file actions.");
5018  const QStringList files = qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->GetRecentFileList();
5019  const int numRecentFiles = qMin(files.size(), static_cast<int>(MaxRecentFiles));
5020 
5021  for (int i = 0; i < numRecentFiles; ++i)
5022  {
5023  QString text = QString("&%1. %2").arg(i + 1).arg(strippedName(files.at(i)));
5024  recentFileActs[i]->setText(text);
5025  recentFileActs[i]->setData(files.at(i));
5026  recentFileActs[i]->setVisible(true);
5027  }
5028  for (int j = numRecentFiles; j < MaxRecentFiles; ++j)
5029  {
5030  recentFileActs[j]->setVisible(false);
5031  }
5032 
5033  separatorAct->setVisible(numRecentFiles > 0);
5034 }
5035 
5036 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5037 void MainWindow::CreateMenus()
5038 {
5039  //Add last 5 most recent projects to file menu.
5040  for (int i = 0; i < MaxRecentFiles; ++i)
5041  {
5042  ui->file_Menu->insertAction(ui->exit_Action, recentFileActs[i]);
5043  }
5044  separatorAct = new QAction(this);
5045  separatorAct->setSeparator(true);
5046  ui->file_Menu->insertAction(ui->exit_Action, separatorAct);
5047  UpdateRecentFileActions();
5048 
5049  //Add Undo/Redo actions to edit menu.
5050  QList<QKeySequence> undoShortcuts;
5051  undoShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::ControlModifier + Qt::Key_Z));
5052  undoShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::AltModifier + Qt::Key_Backspace));
5053 
5054  undoAction = qApp->getUndoStack()->createUndoAction(this, tr("&Undo"));
5055  undoAction->setShortcuts(undoShortcuts);
5056  undoAction->setIcon(QIcon::fromTheme("edit-undo"));
5057  connect(undoAction, &QAction::triggered, toolProperties, &VToolOptionsPropertyBrowser::refreshOptions);
5058  ui->edit_Menu->addAction(undoAction);
5059  ui->edit_Toolbar->addAction(undoAction);
5060 
5061  QList<QKeySequence> redoShortcuts;
5062  redoShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::ControlModifier + Qt::Key_Y));
5063  redoShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::ControlModifier + Qt::ShiftModifier + Qt::Key_Z));
5064  redoShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::AltModifier + Qt::ShiftModifier + Qt::Key_Backspace));
5065 
5066  redoAction = qApp->getUndoStack()->createRedoAction(this, tr("&Redo"));
5067  redoAction->setShortcuts(redoShortcuts);
5068  redoAction->setIcon(QIcon::fromTheme("edit-redo"));
5069  connect(redoAction, &QAction::triggered, toolProperties, &VToolOptionsPropertyBrowser::refreshOptions);
5070  ui->edit_Menu->addAction(redoAction);
5071  ui->edit_Toolbar->addAction(redoAction);
5072 
5073  separatorAct = new QAction(this);
5074  separatorAct->setSeparator(true);
5075  ui->edit_Menu->addAction(separatorAct);
5076 
5077  AddDocks();
5078 
5079  separatorAct = new QAction(this);
5080  separatorAct->setSeparator(true);
5081  ui->view_Menu->addAction(separatorAct);
5082 
5083  QMenu *menu = new QMenu(tr("Toolbars"));
5084  ui->view_Menu->addMenu(menu);
5085 
5086  menu->addAction(ui->file_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5087  connect(ui->file_ToolBar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
5088  {
5089  ui->file_ToolBar->setVisible(visible);
5090  });
5091  menu->addAction(ui->edit_Toolbar->toggleViewAction());
5092  connect(ui->edit_Toolbar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
5093  {
5094  ui->edit_Toolbar->setVisible(visible);
5095  });
5096  menu->addAction(ui->view_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5097  connect(ui->view_ToolBar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
5098  {
5099  ui->view_ToolBar->setVisible(visible);
5100  });
5101 
5102  menu->addAction(ui->mode_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5103  connect(ui->mode_ToolBar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
5104  {
5105  ui->mode_ToolBar->setVisible(visible);
5106  });
5107  menu->addAction(ui->draft_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5108  connect(ui->draft_ToolBar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
5109  {
5110  ui->draft_ToolBar->setVisible(visible);
5111  });
5112 
5113  menu->addAction(ui->zoom_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5114  connect(ui->zoom_ToolBar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
5115  {
5116  ui->zoom_ToolBar->setVisible(visible);
5117  });
5118  menu->addAction(ui->tools_ToolBox_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5119  menu->addAction(ui->points_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5120  menu->addAction(ui->lines_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5121  menu->addAction(ui->curves_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5122  menu->addAction(ui->arcs_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5123  menu->addAction(ui->operations_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5124  menu->addAction(ui->pieces_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5125  menu->addAction(ui->details_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5126  menu->addAction(ui->layout_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5127  menu->addAction(ui->pointName_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5128 }
5129 
5130 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5131 QT_WARNING_PUSH
5132 QT_WARNING_DISABLE_GCC("-Wswitch-default")
5133 void MainWindow::LastUsedTool()
5134 {
5135  // This check helps to find missed tools in the switch
5136  Q_STATIC_ASSERT_X(static_cast<int>(Tool::LAST_ONE_DO_NOT_USE) == 53, "Not all tools were handled.");
5137 
5138  if (currentTool == lastUsedTool)
5139  {
5140  return;
5141  }
5142 
5143  switch (lastUsedTool)
5144  {
5145  case Tool::Arrow:
5146  ui->arrowPointer_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5147  ui->arrow_Action->setChecked(true);
5148  handleArrowTool(true);
5149  break;
5150  case Tool::BasePoint:
5151  case Tool::SinglePoint:
5152  case Tool::DoublePoint:
5153  case Tool::LinePoint:
5154  case Tool::AbstractSpline:
5155  case Tool::Cut:
5156  case Tool::LAST_ONE_DO_NOT_USE:
5157  case Tool::NodePoint:
5158  case Tool::NodeArc:
5159  case Tool::NodeElArc:
5160  case Tool::NodeSpline:
5161  case Tool::NodeSplinePath:
5162  Q_UNREACHABLE(); //-V501
5163  //Nothing to do here because we can't create this tool from main window.
5164  break;
5165  case Tool::EndLine:
5166  ui->pointAtDistanceAngle_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5167  handlePointAtDistanceAngleTool(true);
5168  break;
5169  case Tool::Line:
5170  ui->line_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5171  handleLineTool(true);
5172  break;
5173  case Tool::AlongLine:
5174  ui->alongLine_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5175  handleAlongLineTool(true);
5176  break;
5177  case Tool::Midpoint:
5178  ui->midpoint_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5179  handleMidpointTool(true);
5180  break;
5181  case Tool::ShoulderPoint:
5182  ui->shoulderPoint_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5183  handleShoulderPointTool(true);
5184  break;
5185  case Tool::Normal:
5186  ui->normal_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5187  handleNormalTool(true);
5188  break;
5189  case Tool::Bisector:
5190  ui->bisector_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5191  handleBisectorTool(true);
5192  break;
5193  case Tool::LineIntersect:
5194  ui->lineIntersect_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5195  handleLineIntersectTool(true);
5196  break;
5197  case Tool::Spline:
5198  ui->curve_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5199  handleCurveTool(true);
5200  break;
5201  case Tool::CubicBezier:
5202  ui->curveWithCPs_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5203  handleCurveWithControlPointsTool(true);
5204  break;
5205  case Tool::Arc:
5206  ui->arc_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5207  handleArcTool(true);
5208  break;
5209  case Tool::SplinePath:
5210  ui->spline_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5211  handleSplineTool(true);
5212  break;
5213  case Tool::CubicBezierPath:
5214  ui->splineWithCPs_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5215  handleSplineWithControlPointsTool(true);
5216  break;
5217  case Tool::PointOfContact:
5218  ui->pointOfContact_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5219  handlePointOfContactTool(true);
5220  break;
5221  case Tool::Piece:
5222  ui->addPatternPiece_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5223  handlePatternPieceTool(true);
5224  break;
5225  case Tool::InternalPath:
5226  ui->internalPath_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5227  handleInternalPathTool(true);
5228  break;
5229  case Tool::Height:
5230  ui->height_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5231  handleHeightTool(true);
5232  break;
5233  case Tool::Triangle:
5234  ui->triangle_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5235  handleTriangleTool(true);
5236  break;
5237  case Tool::PointOfIntersection:
5238  ui->pointIntersectXY_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5239  handlePointIntersectXYTool(true);
5240  break;
5241  case Tool::PointOfIntersectionArcs:
5242  ui->pointOfIntersectionArcs_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5243  handlePointOfIntersectionArcsTool(true);
5244  break;
5245  case Tool::CutSpline:
5246  ui->pointAlongCurve_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5247  handlePointAlongCurveTool(true);
5248  break;
5249  case Tool::CutSplinePath:
5250  ui->pointAlongSpline_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5251  handlePointAlongSplineTool(true);
5252  break;
5253  case Tool::Union:
5254  ui->unitePieces_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5255  handleUnionTool(true);
5256  break;
5257  case Tool::CutArc:
5258  ui->pointAlongArc_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5259  handlePointAlongArcTool(true);
5260  break;
5261  case Tool::LineIntersectAxis:
5262  ui->lineIntersectAxis_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5263  handleLineIntersectAxisTool(true);
5264  break;
5265  case Tool::CurveIntersectAxis:
5266  ui->curveIntersectAxis_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5267  handleCurveIntersectAxisTool(true);
5268  break;
5269  case Tool::ArcIntersectAxis:
5270  ui->arcIntersectAxis_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5271  handleArcIntersectAxisTool(true);
5272  break;
5273  case Tool::PointOfIntersectionCircles:
5274  ui->pointOfIntersectionCircles_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5275  handlePointOfIntersectionCirclesTool(true);
5276  break;
5277  case Tool::PointOfIntersectionCurves:
5278  ui->pointOfIntersectionCurves_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5279  handleCurveIntersectCurveTool(true);
5280  break;
5281  case Tool::PointFromCircleAndTangent:
5282  ui->pointFromCircleAndTangent_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5283  handlePointFromCircleAndTangentTool(true);
5284  break;
5285  case Tool::PointFromArcAndTangent:
5286  ui->pointFromArcAndTangent_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5287  handlePointFromArcAndTangentTool(true);
5288  break;
5289  case Tool::ArcWithLength:
5290  ui->arcWithLength_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5291  handleArcWithLengthTool(true);
5292  break;
5293  case Tool::TrueDarts:
5294  ui->trueDarts_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5295  handleTrueDartTool(true);
5296  break;
5297  case Tool::Group:
5298  ui->group_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5299  handleGroupTool(true);
5300  break;
5301  case Tool::Rotation:
5302  ui->rotation_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5303  handleRotationTool(true);
5304  break;
5305  case Tool::MirrorByLine:
5306  ui->mirrorByLine_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5307  handleMirrorByLineTool(true);
5308  break;
5309  case Tool::MirrorByAxis:
5310  ui->mirrorByAxis_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5311  handleMirrorByAxisTool(true);
5312  break;
5313  case Tool::Move:
5314  ui->move_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5315  handleMoveTool(true);
5316  break;
5317  case Tool::EllipticalArc:
5318  ui->ellipticalArc_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5319  handleEllipticalArcTool(true);
5320  break;
5321  case Tool::AnchorPoint:
5322  ui->anchorPoint_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5323  handleAnchorPointTool(true);
5324  break;
5325  case Tool::InsertNodes:
5326  ui->insertNodes_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5327  handleInsertNodesTool(true);
5328  break;
5329  }
5330 }

5333 
5334 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5335 void MainWindow::AddDocks()
5336 {
5337  //Add dock
5338  actionDockWidgetToolOptions = ui->toolProperties_DockWidget->toggleViewAction();
5339  ui->view_Menu->addAction(actionDockWidgetToolOptions);
5340  connect(ui->toolProperties_DockWidget, &QDockWidget::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
5341  {
5342  isToolOptionsDockVisible = visible;
5343  });
5344 
5345  actionDockWidgetGroups = ui->groups_DockWidget->toggleViewAction();
5346  ui->view_Menu->addAction(actionDockWidgetGroups);
5347  connect(ui->groups_DockWidget, &QDockWidget::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
5348  {
5349  isGroupsDockVisible = visible;
5350  });
5351 
5352  actionDockWidgetLayouts = ui->layoutPages_DockWidget->toggleViewAction();
5353  ui->view_Menu->addAction(actionDockWidgetLayouts);
5354  connect(ui->layoutPages_DockWidget, &QDockWidget::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
5355  {
5356  isLayoutsDockVisible = visible;
5357  });
5358 
5359  actionDockWidgetToolbox = ui->toolbox_DockWidget->toggleViewAction();
5360  ui->view_Menu->addAction(actionDockWidgetToolbox);
5361  connect(ui->toolbox_DockWidget, &QDockWidget::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
5362  {
5363  isToolboxDockVisible = visible;
5364  });
5365 
5366  tabifyDockWidget(ui->groups_DockWidget, ui->toolProperties_DockWidget);
5367  splitDockWidget(ui->toolProperties_DockWidget, ui->layoutPages_DockWidget, Qt::Vertical);
5368 }
5369 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5370 void MainWindow::InitDocksContain()
5371 {
5372  setTabPosition(Qt::RightDockWidgetArea, QTabWidget::West);
5373  setTabPosition(Qt::LeftDockWidgetArea, QTabWidget::East);
5374 
5375  initPropertyEditor();
5376 
5377  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Initialize Groups manager.");
5378  groupsWidget = new GroupsWidget(pattern, doc, this);
5379  ui->groups_DockWidget->setWidget(groupsWidget);
5380  connect(doc, &VAbstractPattern::updateGroups, this, &MainWindow::updateGroups);
5381 
5382  patternPiecesWidget = new PiecesWidget(pattern, doc, this);
5383  connect(doc, &VPattern::FullUpdateFromFile, patternPiecesWidget, &PiecesWidget::updateList);
5384  connect(doc, &VPattern::UpdateInLayoutList, patternPiecesWidget, &PiecesWidget::togglePiece);
5385  connect(doc, &VPattern::showPiece, patternPiecesWidget, &PiecesWidget::selectPiece);
5386  connect(patternPiecesWidget, &PiecesWidget::Highlight, pieceScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::HighlightItem);
5387  patternPiecesWidget->setVisible(false);
5388 
5389  ui->toolbox_StackedWidget->setCurrentIndex(0);
5390 }
5391 
5392 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5393 bool MainWindow::OpenNewSeamly2D(const QString &fileName) const
5394 {
5395  if (this->isWindowModified() || qApp->getFilePath().isEmpty() == false)
5396  {
5397  VApplication::NewSeamly2D(fileName);
5398  return true;
5399  }
5400  return false;
5401 }
5402 
5403 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5404 void MainWindow::CreateActions()
5405 {
5406  ui->setupUi(this);
5407 
5408  //Files menu
5409  connect(ui->actionNew, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::New);
5410  connect(ui->actionOpen, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::Open);
5411  connect(ui->save_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::Save);
5412  connect(ui->saveAs_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::SaveAs);
5413  connect(ui->closePattern_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this]()
5414  {
5415  if (MaybeSave())
5416  {
5417  FileClosedCorrect();
5418  Clear();
5419  }
5420  });
5421 
5422  connect(ui->exportAs_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::exportLayoutAs);
5423  connect(ui->printPreview_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::PrintPreviewOrigin);
5424  connect(ui->printPreviewTiled_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::PrintPreviewTiled);
5425  connect(ui->print_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::PrintOrigin);
5426  connect(ui->printTiled_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::PrintTiled);
5427 
5428  connect(ui->appPreferences_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::Preferences);
5429  connect(ui->patternPreferences_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this]()
5430  {
5431  DialogPatternProperties proper(doc, pattern, this);
5432  connect(&proper, &DialogPatternProperties::UpdateGradation, this, [this]()
5433  {
5434  UpdateHeightsList(MeasurementVariable::ListHeights(doc->GetGradationHeights(), qApp->patternUnit()));
5435  UpdateSizesList(MeasurementVariable::ListSizes(doc->GetGradationSizes(), qApp->patternUnit()));
5436  });
5437  proper.exec();
5438  });
5439  ui->patternPreferences_Action->setEnabled(false);
5440 
5441  //Actions for recent files loaded by a main window application.
5442  for (int i = 0; i < MaxRecentFiles; ++i)
5443  {
5444  QAction *action = new QAction(this);
5445  action->setVisible(false);
5446  recentFileActs[i] = action;
5447  connect(recentFileActs[i], &QAction::triggered, this, [this]()
5448  {
5449  if (QAction *action = qobject_cast<QAction*>(sender()))
5450  {
5451  const QString filePath = action->data().toString();
5452  if (!filePath.isEmpty())
5453  {
5454  LoadPattern(filePath);
5455  }
5456  }
5457  });
5458  }
5459 
5460  connect(ui->documentInfo_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this]()
5461  {
5462  ShowInfoDialog *infoDialog = new ShowInfoDialog(doc, this);
5463  infoDialog->setAttribute(Qt::WA_DeleteOnClose, true);
5464  infoDialog->adjustSize();
5465  infoDialog->show();
5466  });
5467 
5468  connect(ui->exit_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::close);
5469 
5470  //Edit Menu
5471  connect(ui->labelTemplateEditor_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this]()
5472  {
5473  EditLabelTemplateDialog editor(doc);
5474  editor.exec();
5475  });
5476 
5477  //View menu
5478  connect(ui->showDraftMode, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::showDraftMode);
5479  connect(ui->pieceMode_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::showPieceMode);
5480  connect(ui->layoutMode_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::showLayoutMode);
5481 
5482  connect(ui->toggleWireframe_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this](bool checked)
5483  {
5484  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->setWireframe(checked);
5485  emit ui->view->itemClicked(nullptr);
5486  upDateScenes();
5487  });
5488 
5489  connect(ui->toggleControlPoints_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this](bool checked)
5490  {
5491  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->setShowControlPoints(checked);
5492  emit ui->view->itemClicked(nullptr);
5493  draftScene->enablePiecesMode(checked);
5494  });
5495 
5496  connect(ui->toggleAxisOrigin_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this](bool checked)
5497  {
5498  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->setShowAxisOrigin(checked);
5499  draftScene->setOriginsVisible(checked);
5500  pieceScene->setOriginsVisible(checked);
5501  });
5502 
5503  connect(ui->toggleSeamAllowances_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this](bool checked)
5504  {
5505  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->setShowSeamAllowances(checked);
5506  emit ui->view->itemClicked(nullptr);
5507  refreshSeamAllowances();
5508  });
5509 
5510  connect(ui->toggleGrainLines_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this](bool checked)
5511  {
5512  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->setShowGrainlines(checked);
5513  emit ui->view->itemClicked(nullptr);
5514  refreshGrainLines();
5515  });
5516 
5517  connect(ui->toggleLabels_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this](bool checked)
5518  {
5519  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->setShowLabels(checked);
5520  emit ui->view->itemClicked(nullptr);
5521  refreshLabels();
5522  });
5523 /**
5524  connect(ui->toggleAnchorPoints_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this](bool checked)
5525  {
5526  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->setShowAnchorPoints(checked);
5527  });
5528 **/
5529  connect(ui->increaseSize_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this]()
5530  {
5531  int index = qMin(fontSizeComboBox->currentIndex() + 1, fontSizeComboBox->count()-1);
5532  fontSizeComboBox->setCurrentIndex(index);
5533  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->setPointNameSize(fontSizeComboBox->currentText().toInt());
5534  upDateScenes();
5535  });
5536 
5537  connect(ui->decreaseSize_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this]()
5538  {
5539  const int index = qMax(fontSizeComboBox->currentIndex() - 1, 0);
5540  fontSizeComboBox->setCurrentIndex(index);
5541  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->setPointNameSize(fontSizeComboBox->currentText().toInt());
5542  upDateScenes();
5543  });
5544 
5545  connect(ui->showPointNames_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this](bool checked)
5546  {
5547  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->setHidePointNames(checked);
5548  upDateScenes();
5549  });
5550 
5551  connect(ui->useToolColor_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this](bool checked)
5552  {
5553  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->setUseToolColor(checked);
5554  upDateScenes();
5555  });
5556 
5557  //Tools menu
5558  connect(ui->newDraft_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this]()
5559  {
5560  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "New Draft Block.");
5561  QString draftBlockName = tr("Draft Block %1").arg(draftBlockComboBox->count()+1);
5562  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Generated Draft Block name: %s", qUtf8Printable(draftBlockName));
5563 
5564  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Draft Block count %d", draftBlockComboBox->count());
5565  draftBlockName = createDraftBlockName(draftBlockName);
5566  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Draft Block name: %s", qUtf8Printable(draftBlockName));
5567  if (draftBlockName.isEmpty())
5568  {
5569  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Draft Block name is empty.");
5570  return;
5571  }
5572 
5573  addDraftBlock(draftBlockName);
5574  });
5575 
5576  //Tools->Point submenu actions
5577  connect(ui->midpoint_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this]
5578  {
5579  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->points_Page);

5877  connect(ui->openSeamlyMe_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this]()
5878  {
5879  const QString seamlyme = qApp->SeamlyMeFilePath();
5880  const QString workingDirectory = QFileInfo(seamlyme).absoluteDir().absolutePath();
5881 
5882  QStringList arguments;
5883  if (isNoScaling)
5884  {
5885  arguments.append(QLatin1String("--") + LONG_OPTION_NO_HDPI_SCALING);
5886  }

5889  });

5895  connect(ui->syncMeasurements_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::SyncMeasurements);
5896  connect(ui->table_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this](bool checked)
5897  {
5898  if (checked)
5899  {
5900  dialogTable = new DialogVariables(pattern, doc, this);
5901  connect(dialogTable.data(), &DialogVariables::updateProperties, toolProperties,
5902  &VToolOptionsPropertyBrowser::refreshOptions);
5903  connect(dialogTable.data(), &DialogVariables::DialogClosed, this, [this]()
5904  {
5905  ui->table_Action->setChecked(false);
5906  if (dialogTable != nullptr)
5907  {
5908  delete dialogTable;
5909  }
5910  });
5911  dialogTable->show();
5912  }
5913  else
5914  {
5915  ui->table_Action->setChecked(true);
5916  dialogTable->activateWindow();
5917  }
5918  });
5919  connect(ui->exportVariablesToCSV_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::handleExportToCSV);
5920

5923  {
5924  if (checked)
5925  {
5926  historyDialog = new HistoryDialog(pattern, doc, this);
5927  connect(this, &MainWindow::RefreshHistory, historyDialog.data(), &HistoryDialog::updateHistory);
5928  connect(historyDialog.data(), &HistoryDialog::DialogClosed, this, [this]()
5929  {
5930  ui->history_Action->setChecked(false);
5931  if (historyDialog != nullptr)
5932  {
5933  delete historyDialog;
5934  }
5935  });
5936  historyDialog->show();
5937  }
5938  else
5939  {
5940  ui->history_Action->setChecked(true);
5941  historyDialog->activateWindow();
5942  }
5943  });

5986  });

5991  });

6003  connect(ui->lines_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::handleLinesMenu);

6005  connect(ui->curves_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::handleCurvesMenu);
6006  connect(ui->modifications_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::handleOperationsMenu);
6007  connect(ui->details_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::handlePatternPiecesMenu);
6008  connect(ui->pieces_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::handlePieceMenu);
6009  connect(ui->layout_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::handleLayoutMenu);
6010 }
6011 
6012 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6013 void MainWindow::InitAutoSave()
6014 {
6015  //Autosaving file each 1 minutes
6016  delete autoSaveTimer;
6017  autoSaveTimer = nullptr;
6018 
6019  autoSaveTimer = new QTimer(this);
6020  autoSaveTimer->setTimerType(Qt::VeryCoarseTimer);
6021  connect(autoSaveTimer, &QTimer::timeout, this, &MainWindow::AutoSavePattern);
6022  autoSaveTimer->stop();
6023 
6024  if (qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->GetAutosaveState())
6025  {
6026  const qint32 autoTime = qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->getAutosaveInterval();
6027  autoSaveTimer->start(autoTime*60000);
6028  qCInfo(vMainWindow, "Autosaving every %d minutes.", autoTime);
6029  }
6030  qApp->setAutoSaveTimer(autoSaveTimer);
6031 }
6032 
6033 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6034 QString MainWindow::createDraftBlockName(const QString &text)
6035 {
6036  QInputDialog *dialog = new QInputDialog(this);
6037  dialog->setInputMode(QInputDialog::TextInput);
6038  dialog->setLabelText(tr("Name:"));
6039  dialog->setTextEchoMode(QLineEdit::Normal);
6040  dialog->setWindowTitle(tr("Draft block."));
6041  dialog->setWindowFlags(windowFlags() & ~Qt::WindowContextHelpButtonHint
6042  & ~Qt::WindowMaximizeButtonHint
6043  & ~Qt::WindowMinimizeButtonHint);
6044  dialog->resize(300, 100);
6045  dialog->setTextValue(text);
6046  QString draftBlockName;
6047  while (1)
6048  {
6049  const bool result = dialog->exec();
6050  draftBlockName = dialog->textValue();
6051  if (result == false || draftBlockName.isEmpty())
6052  {
6053  delete dialog;
6054  return QString();
6055  }
6056  if (draftBlockComboBox->findText(draftBlockName) == -1)
6057  {
6058  break; //exit dialog
6059  }
6060  //repeat show dialog
6061  QMessageBox messageBox;
6062  messageBox.setWindowTitle(tr("Name Exists"));
6063  messageBox.setIcon(QMessageBox::Warning);
6064  messageBox.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox::Retry | QMessageBox::Cancel);
6065  messageBox.setDefaultButton(QMessageBox::Retry);
6066  messageBox.setText(tr("The action can't be completed because the Draft Block name already exists."));
6067  int boxResult = messageBox.exec();
6068 
6069  switch (boxResult)
6070  {
6071  case QMessageBox::Retry:
6072  break; // Repeat Dialog
6073  case QMessageBox::Cancel:
6074  return QString(); // Exit Dialog
6075  default:
6076  break; // should never be reached
6077  }
6078  }
6079  delete dialog;
6080  return draftBlockName;
6081 }
6082 
6083 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6084 MainWindow::~MainWindow()
6085 {
6086  CancelTool();
6087  CleanLayout();
6088 
6089  delete doc;
6090  delete ui;
6091 }
6092 
6093 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6094 /**
6095  * @brief LoadPattern open pattern file.
6096  * @param fileName name of file.
6097  */
6098 bool MainWindow::LoadPattern(const QString &fileName, const QString& customMeasureFile)
6099 {
6100  qCInfo(vMainWindow, "Loading new file %s.", qUtf8Printable(fileName));
6101 
6102  //We have unsaved changes or load more then one file per time
6103  if (OpenNewSeamly2D(fileName))
6104  {
6105  return false;
6106  }
6107 
6108  if (fileName.isEmpty())
6109  {
6110  qCWarning(vMainWindow, "New loaded filename is empty.");
6111  Clear();
6112  return false;
6113  }
6114 
6115  try
6116  {
6117  // Here comes undocumented Seamly2D's feature.
6118  // Because app bundle in Mac OS X doesn't allow setup association for SeamlyMe we must do this through Seamly2D
6119  MeasurementDoc measurements(pattern);
6120  measurements.setSize(VContainer::rsize());
6121  measurements.setHeight(VContainer::rheight());
6122  measurements.setXMLContent(fileName);
6123 
6124  if (measurements.Type() == MeasurementsType::Multisize || measurements.Type() == MeasurementsType::Individual)
6125  {
6126  const QString seamlyme = qApp->SeamlyMeFilePath();
6127  const QString workingDirectory = QFileInfo(seamlyme).absoluteDir().absolutePath();
6128 
6129  QStringList arguments = QStringList() << fileName;
6130  if (isNoScaling)
6131  {
6132  arguments.append(QLatin1String("--") + LONG_OPTION_NO_HDPI_SCALING);
6133  }
6134 
6135  QProcess::startDetached(seamlyme, arguments, workingDirectory);
6136  qApp->exit(V_EX_OK);
6137  return false; // stop continue processing
6138  }
6139  }
6140 
6141  catch (VException &exception)
6142  {
6143  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("File exception.")),
6144  qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()), qUtf8Printable(exception.DetailedInformation()));
6145 
6146  Clear();
6147  if (!VApplication::IsGUIMode())
6148  {
6149  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
6150  }
6151  return false;
6152  }
6153 
6154  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Locking file");
6155  VlpCreateLock(lock, fileName);
6156 
6157  if (lock->IsLocked())
6158  {
6159  qCInfo(vMainWindow, "Pattern file %s was locked.", qUtf8Printable(fileName));
6160  }
6161  else
6162  {
6163  if (!IgnoreLocking(lock->GetLockError(), fileName))
6164  {
6165  return false;
6166  }
6167  }
6168 
6169  // On this stage scene empty. Fit scene size to view size
6170  VMainGraphicsView::NewSceneRect(draftScene, ui->view);
6171  VMainGraphicsView::NewSceneRect(pieceScene, ui->view);
6172 
6173  qApp->setOpeningPattern();//Begin opening file
6174  try
6175  {
6176  VPatternConverter converter(fileName);
6177  m_curFileFormatVersion = converter.GetCurrentFormatVarsion();
6178  m_curFileFormatVersionStr = converter.GetVersionStr();
6179  doc->setXMLContent(converter.Convert());
6180  if (!customMeasureFile.isEmpty())
6181  {
6182  doc->SetMPath(RelativeMPath(fileName, customMeasureFile));
6183  }
6184  qApp->setPatternUnit(doc->measurementUnits());
6185  const QString path = AbsoluteMPath(fileName, doc->MPath());
6186 
6187  if (!path.isEmpty())
6188  {
6189  // Check if exist
6190  const QString newPath = checkPathToMeasurements(fileName, path);
6191  if (newPath.isEmpty())
6192  {
6193  qApp->setOpeningPattern();// End opening file
6194  Clear();
6195  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("The measurements file '%1' could not be found.")
6196  .arg(path)));
6197  if (!VApplication::IsGUIMode())
6198  {
6199  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
6200  }
6201  return false;
6202  }
6203 
6204  if (!loadMeasurements(newPath))
6205  {
6206  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("The measurements file '%1' could not be found.")
6207  .arg(newPath)));
6208  qApp->setOpeningPattern();// End opening file
6209  Clear();
6210  if (!VApplication::IsGUIMode())
6211  {
6212  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
6213  }
6214  return false;
6215  }
6216  else
6217  {
6218  ui->unloadMeasurements_Action->setEnabled(true);
6219  watcher->addPath(path);
6220  ui->editCurrent_Action->setEnabled(true);
6221  }
6222  }
6223 
6224  if (qApp->patternType() == MeasurementsType::Unknown)
6225  {// Show toolbar only if was not uploaded any measurements.
6226  initStatusBar();
6227  }
6228  }
6229 
6230  catch (VException &exception)
6231  {
6232  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("File exception.")),
6233  qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()), qUtf8Printable(exception.DetailedInformation()));
6234 
6235  qApp->setOpeningPattern();// End opening file
6236  Clear();
6237  if (!VApplication::IsGUIMode())
6238  {
6239  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
6240  }
6241  return false;
6242  }
6243 
6244  fullParseFile();
6245 
6246  if (guiEnabled)
6247  { // No errors occurred
6248  patternReadOnly = doc->isReadOnly();
6249  setWidgetsEnabled(true);
6250  setCurrentFile(fileName);
6251  helpLabel->setText(tr("File loaded"));
6252  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(helpLabel->text()));
6253 
6254  //Fit scene size to best size for first show
6255  zoomFirstShow();
6256  updateZoomToPointComboBox(draftPointNamesList());
6257 
6258  showDraftMode(true);
6259 
6260  qApp->setOpeningPattern();// End opening file
6261  return true;
6262  }
6263  else
6264  {
6265  qApp->setOpeningPattern();// End opening file
6266  return false;
6267  }
6268 }
6269 
6270 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6271 QStringList MainWindow::GetUnlokedRestoreFileList() const
6272 {
6273  QStringList restoreFiles;
6274  //Take all files that need to be restored
6275  QStringList files = qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->GetRestoreFileList();
6276  if (files.size() > 0)
6277  {
6278  for (int i = 0; i < files.size(); ++i)
6279  {
6280  // Seeking file that really needs reopen
6281  VLockGuard<char> lock(files.at(i));
6282  if (lock.IsLocked())
6283  {
6284  restoreFiles.append(files.at(i));
6285  }
6286  }
6287 
6288  // Clearing list after filtering
6289  for (int i = 0; i < restoreFiles.size(); ++i)
6290  {
6291  files.removeAll(restoreFiles.at(i));
6292  }
6293 
6294  // Clear all files that do not exist.
6295  QStringList filtered;
6296  for (int i = 0; i < files.size(); ++i)
6297  {
6298  if (QFileInfo(files.at(i)).exists())
6299  {
6300  filtered.append(files.at(i));
6301  }
6302  }
6303 
6304  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->SetRestoreFileList(filtered);
6305  }
6306  return restoreFiles;
6307 }
6308 
6309 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6310 void MainWindow::ToolBarStyles()
6311 {
6312  ToolBarStyle(ui->draft_ToolBar);
6313  ToolBarStyle(ui->mode_ToolBar);
6314  ToolBarStyle(ui->edit_Toolbar);
6315  ToolBarStyle(ui->zoom_ToolBar);
6316  ToolBarStyle(ui->file_ToolBar);
6317 
6318  fontComboBox->setCurrentFont(qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->getPointNameFont());
6319  int index = fontSizeComboBox->findData(qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->getPointNameSize());
6320  fontSizeComboBox->setCurrentIndex(index);
6321 }
6322 
6323 void MainWindow::resetOrigins()
6324 {
6325  draftScene->InitOrigins();
6326  draftScene->setOriginsVisible(true);
6327  pieceScene->InitOrigins();
6328  pieceScene->setOriginsVisible(true);
6329 }
6330 
6331 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6332 void MainWindow::showLayoutPages(int index)
6333 {
6334  if (index < 0 || index >= scenes.size())
6335  {
6336  ui->view->setScene(tempSceneLayout);
6337  }
6338  else
6339  {
6340  ui->view->setScene(scenes.at(index));
6341  }
6342 
6343  ui->view->fitInView(ui->view->scene()->sceneRect(), Qt::KeepAspectRatio);
6344 }
6345 
6346 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6347 void MainWindow::Preferences()
6348 {
6349  // Calling constructor of the dialog take some time. Because of this user have time to call the dialog twice.
6350  static QPointer<DialogPreferences> guard;// Prevent any second run
6351  if (guard.isNull())
6352  {
6353  QGuiApplication::setOverrideCursor(QCursor(Qt::WaitCursor));
6354  DialogPreferences *preferences = new DialogPreferences(this);
6355  // QScopedPointer needs to be sure any exception will never block guard
6356  QScopedPointer<DialogPreferences> dialog(preferences);
6357  guard = preferences;
6358  connect(dialog.data(), &DialogPreferences::updateProperties, this, &MainWindow::WindowsLocale); // Must be first
6359  connect(dialog.data(), &DialogPreferences::updateProperties, this, &MainWindow::ToolBarStyles);
6360  connect(dialog.data(), &DialogPreferences::updateProperties, this, &MainWindow::updateToolBarVisibility);
6361  connect(dialog.data(), &DialogPreferences::updateProperties, this, &MainWindow::refreshLabels);
6362  connect(dialog.data(), &DialogPreferences::updateProperties, this, &MainWindow::resetOrigins);
6363  connect(dialog.data(), &DialogPreferences::updateProperties, this, &MainWindow::upDateScenes);
6364  connect(dialog.data(), &DialogPreferences::updateProperties, this, &MainWindow::updateViewToolbar);
6365  connect(dialog.data(), &DialogPreferences::updateProperties, this, &MainWindow::resetPanShortcuts);
6366  connect(dialog.data(), &DialogPreferences::updateProperties, this, [this](){emit doc->FullUpdateFromFile();});
6367  //connect(dialog.data(), &DialogPreferences::updateProperties,
6368  // toolProperties, &VToolOptionsPropertyBrowser::refreshOptions);
6369  connect(dialog.data(), &DialogPreferences::updateProperties, this, &MainWindow::initPropertyEditor);
6370 
6371  connect(dialog.data(), &DialogPreferences::updateProperties, ui->view, &VMainGraphicsView::resetScrollBars);
6372  connect(dialog.data(), &DialogPreferences::updateProperties, ui->view, &VMainGraphicsView::resetScrollAnimations);
6373 
6374 
6375  QGuiApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
6376 
6377  if (guard->exec() == QDialog::Accepted)
6378  {
6379  InitAutoSave();
6380  }
6381  }
6382 }
6383 
6384 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6385 #if defined(Q_OS_MAC)
6386 void MainWindow::CreateMeasurements()
6387 {
6388  const QString seamlyme = qApp->SeamlyMeFilePath();
6389  const QString workingDirectory = QFileInfo(seamlyme).absoluteDir().absolutePath();
6390 
6391  QStringList arguments;
6392  if (isNoScaling)
6393  {
6394  arguments.append(QLatin1String("--") + LONG_OPTION_NO_HDPI_SCALING);
6395  }
6396 
6397  QProcess::startDetached(seamlyme, arguments, workingDirectory);
6398 }
6399 #endif
6400 
6401 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6402 void MainWindow::exportLayoutAs()
6403 {
6404  ui->exportLayout_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
6405 
6406  if (isLayoutStale)
6407  {
6408  if (ContinueIfLayoutStale() == QMessageBox::No)
6409  {
6410  ui->exportLayout_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
6411  return;
6412  }
6413  }
6414 
6415  try
6416  {
6417  ExportLayoutDialog dialog(scenes.size(), Draw::Layout, FileName(), this);
6418 
6419  if (dialog.exec() == QDialog::Rejected)
6420  {
6421  ui->exportLayout_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
6422  return;
6423  }
6424 
6425  ExportData(QVector<VLayoutPiece>(), dialog);
6426  }
6427 
6428  catch (const VException &exception)
6429  {
6430  ui->exportLayout_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
6431  qCritical("%s\n\n%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Export exception.")),
6432  qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()), qUtf8Printable(exception.DetailedInformation()));
6433  return;
6434  }
6435  ui->exportLayout_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
6436 }
6437 
6438 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6439 void MainWindow::exportPiecesAs()
6440 {
6441  helpLabel->setText(QString(""));
6442 
6443  ui->arrowPointer_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
6444  ui->arrow_Action->setChecked(false);
6445  ui->exportPiecesAs_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
6446 
6447  const QHash<quint32, VPiece> *allPieces = pattern->DataPieces();
6448  QHash<quint32, VPiece>::const_iterator i = allPieces->constBegin();
6449  QHash<quint32, VPiece> piecesInLayout;
6450  while (i != allPieces->constEnd())
6451  {
6452  if (i.value().isInLayout())
6453  {
6454  piecesInLayout.insert(i.key(), i.value());
6455  }
6456  ++i;
6457  }
6458 
6459  if (piecesInLayout.count() == 0)
6460  {
6461  QMessageBox::information(this, tr("Layout mode"), tr("You don't have any pieces to export. Please, "
6462  "include at least one piece in layout."),
6463  QMessageBox::Ok, QMessageBox::Ok);
6464  return;
6465  }
6466 
6467  QVector<VLayoutPiece> pieceList;
6468  try
6469  {
6470  pieceList = preparePiecesForLayout(piecesInLayout);
6471  }
6472 
6473  catch (VException &exception)
6474  {
6475  QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Export pieces"),
6476  tr("Can't export pieces.") + QLatin1String(" \n") + exception.ErrorMessage(),
6477  QMessageBox::Ok, QMessageBox::Ok);
6478  return;
6479  }
6480 
6481  try
6482  {
6483  ExportLayoutDialog dialog(1, Draw::Modeling, FileName(), this);
6484  dialog.setWindowTitle("Export Pattern Pieces");
6485 
6486  if (dialog.exec() == QDialog::Rejected)
6487  {
6488  ui->exportPiecesAs_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
6489  return;
6490  }
6491 
6492  ExportData(pieceList, dialog);
6493  }
6494 
6495  catch (const VException &exception)
6496  {
6497  ui->exportPiecesAs_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
6498  qCritical("%s\n\n%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Export exception.")),
6499  qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()), qUtf8Printable(exception.DetailedInformation()));
6500  return;
6501  }
6502 
6503  ui->arrowPointer_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
6504  ui->arrow_Action->setChecked(true);
6505  ui->exportPiecesAs_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
6506 }
6507 
6508 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6509 void MainWindow::exportDraftBlocksAs()
6510 {
6511  helpLabel->setText(QString(""));
6512 
6513  //select export tool button
6514  ui->arrowPointer_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
6515  ui->arrow_Action->setChecked(false);
6516  ui->exportDraftBlocks_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
6517 
6518  //Get view info so we can restore after export
6519  int vScrollBar = ui->view->verticalScrollBar()->value();
6520  int hScrollBar = ui->view->horizontalScrollBar()->value();
6521  QTransform viewTransform = ui->view->transform();
6522 
6523  //Include all items in draft scene
6524  ui->view->zoomToFit();
6525  ui->view->repaint();
6526  ui->view->zoom100Percent();
6527 
6528  // Enable all draft blocks in the scene
6529  const QList<QGraphicsItem *> items = draftScene->items();
6530  for (auto *item : items)
6531  {
6532  item->setEnabled(true);
6533  }
6534  ui->view->repaint();
6535 
6536  draftScene->setOriginsVisible(false);
6537 
6538  //Open a file dialog to save export
6539  ExportLayoutDialog dialog(1, Draw::Calculation, FileName(), this);
6540  dialog.setWindowTitle("Export Draft Blocks");
6541 
6542  if (dialog.exec() == QDialog::Accepted)
6543  {
6544  const QString filename = QString("%1/%2%3")
6545  .arg(dialog.path()) //1
6546  .arg(dialog.fileName()) //2
6547  .arg(ExportLayoutDialog::exportFormatSuffix(dialog.format())); //3
6548 
6549  QRectF rect;
6550  rect = draftScene->itemsBoundingRect();
6551  draftScene->update(rect);
6552  QGraphicsRectItem *paper = new QGraphicsRectItem(rect);
6553  QMarginsF margins = QMarginsF(0, 0, 0, 0);
6554 
6555  switch(dialog.format())
6556  {
6557  case LayoutExportFormat::SVG:
6558  {
6559  exportSVG(filename, paper, draftScene);
6560  break;
6561  }
6562  case LayoutExportFormat::PNG:
6563  {
6564  exportPNG(filename, draftScene);
6565  break;
6566  }
6567  case LayoutExportFormat::JPG:
6568  {
6569  exportJPG(filename, draftScene);
6570  break;
6571  }
6572  case LayoutExportFormat::BMP:
6573  {
6574  exportBMP(filename, draftScene);
6575  break;
6576  }
6577  case LayoutExportFormat::TIF:
6578  {
6579  exportTIF(filename, draftScene);
6580  break;
6581  }
6582  case LayoutExportFormat::PPM:
6583  {
6584  exportPPM(filename, draftScene);
6585  break;
6586  }
6587  case LayoutExportFormat::PDF:
6588  {
6589  exportPDF(filename, paper, draftScene, true, margins);
6590  break;
6591  }
6592  case LayoutExportFormat::PDFTiled:
6593  case LayoutExportFormat::OBJ:
6594  case LayoutExportFormat::PS:
6595  {
6596  exportPS(filename, paper, draftScene, true, margins);
6597  break;
6598  }
6599  case LayoutExportFormat::EPS:
6600  {
6601  exportEPS(filename, paper, draftScene, true, margins);
6602  break;
6603  }
6604  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1006_Flat:
6605  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1009_Flat:
6606  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1012_Flat:
6607  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1014_Flat:
6608  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1015_Flat:
6609  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1018_Flat:
6610  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1021_Flat:
6611  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1024_Flat:
6612  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1027_Flat:
6613  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1006_AAMA:
6614  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1009_AAMA:
6615  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1012_AAMA:
6616  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1014_AAMA:
6617  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1015_AAMA:
6618  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1018_AAMA:
6619  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1021_AAMA:
6620  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1024_AAMA:
6621  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1027_AAMA:
6622  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1006_ASTM:
6623  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1009_ASTM:
6624  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1012_ASTM:
6625  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1014_ASTM:
6626  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1015_ASTM:
6627  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1018_ASTM:
6628  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1021_ASTM:
6629  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1024_ASTM:
6630  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1027_ASTM:
6631  default:
6632  break;
6633  }
6634  }
6635 
6636  // Disable draft blocks in the scenee except current block
6637  doc->changeActiveDraftBlock(doc->getActiveDraftBlockName(), Document::FullParse);
6638 
6639  draftScene->setOriginsVisible(qApp->Settings()->getShowAxisOrigin());
6640 
6641  // Restore scale, scrollbars, current active draft block
6642  ui->view->setTransform(viewTransform);
6643  VMainGraphicsView::NewSceneRect(ui->view->scene(), ui->view);
6644  zoomScaleChanged(ui->view->transform().m11());
6645 
6646  ui->view->verticalScrollBar()->setValue(vScrollBar);
6647  ui->view->horizontalScrollBar()->setValue(hScrollBar);
6648 
6649  //reset tool buttons
6650  ui->arrowPointer_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
6651  ui->arrow_Action->setChecked(true);
6652  ui->exportDraftBlocks_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
6653 }
6654 
6655 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6656 void MainWindow::ReopenFilesAfterCrash(QStringList &args)
6657 {
6658  const QStringList files = GetUnlokedRestoreFileList();
6659  if (files.size() > 0)
6660  {
6661  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Reopen files after crash.");
6662 
6663  QStringList restoreFiles;
6664  for (int i = 0; i < files.size(); ++i)
6665  {
6666  QFile file(files.at(i) + autosavePrefix);
6667  if (file.exists())
6668  {
6669  restoreFiles.append(files.at(i));
6670  }
6671  }
6672 
6673  if (restoreFiles.size() > 0)
6674  {
6675  QMessageBox::StandardButton reply;
6676  const QString mes = tr("Seamly2D didn't shut down correctly. Do you want reopen files (%1) you had open?")
6677  .arg(restoreFiles.size());
6678  reply = QMessageBox::question(this, tr("Reopen files."), mes, QMessageBox::Yes|QMessageBox::No,
6679  QMessageBox::Yes);
6680  if (reply == QMessageBox::Yes)
6681  {
6682  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "User said Yes.");
6683 
6684  for (int i = 0; i < restoreFiles.size(); ++i)
6685  {
6686  QString error;
6687  if (VDomDocument::SafeCopy(restoreFiles.at(i) + autosavePrefix, restoreFiles.at(i), error))
6688  {
6689  QFile autoFile(restoreFiles.at(i) + autosavePrefix);
6690  autoFile.remove();
6691  LoadPattern(restoreFiles.at(i));
6692  args.removeAll(restoreFiles.at(i));// Do not open file twice after we restore him.
6693  }
6694  else
6695  {
6696  qCWarning(vMainWindow, "Could not copy %s%s to %s %s",
6697  qUtf8Printable(restoreFiles.at(i)), qUtf8Printable(autosavePrefix),
6698  qUtf8Printable(restoreFiles.at(i)), qUtf8Printable(error));
6699  }
6700  }
6701  }
6702  }
6703  }
6704 }
6705 
6706 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6707 QString MainWindow::checkPathToMeasurements(const QString &patternPath, const QString &path)
6708 {
6709  if (path.isEmpty())
6710  {
6711  return path;
6712  }
6713 
6714  QFileInfo table(path);
6715  if (table.exists() == false)
6716  {
6717  if (!VApplication::IsGUIMode())
6718  {
6719  return QString();// console mode doesn't support fixing path to a measurement file
6720  }
6721  else
6722  {
6723  const QString text = tr("The measurements file <br/><br/> <b>%1</b> <br/><br/> could not be found. Do you "
6724  "want to update the file location?").arg(path);
6725  QMessageBox::StandardButton result = QMessageBox::question(this, tr("Loading measurements file"), text,
6726  QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::No,
6727  QMessageBox::Yes);
6728  if (result == QMessageBox::No)
6729  {
6730  return QString();
6731  }
6732  else
6733  {
6734  MeasurementsType patternType;
6735  if ((table.suffix() == vstExt) || (table.suffix() == smmsExt))
6736  {
6737  patternType = MeasurementsType::Multisize;
6738  }
6739  else if ((table.suffix() == vitExt) || (table.suffix() == smisExt))
6740  {
6741  patternType = MeasurementsType::Individual;
6742  }
6743  else
6744  {
6745  patternType = MeasurementsType::Unknown;
6746  }
6747 
6748  QString filename;
6749  if (patternType == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
6750  {
6751  const QString filter = tr("Multisize measurements") + QLatin1String(" (*.") + smmsExt +
6752  QLatin1String(" *.") + vstExt +
6753  QLatin1String(")");
6754  //Use standard path to multisize measurements
6755  QString dir = qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->getMultisizePath();
6756  dir = VCommonSettings::prepareMultisizeTables(dir);
6757  filename = fileDialog(this, tr("Open file"), dir, filter, nullptr, QFileDialog::DontUseNativeDialog,
6758  QFileDialog::ExistingFile, QFileDialog::AcceptOpen);
6759 
6760  }
6761  else if (patternType == MeasurementsType::Individual)
6762  {
6763  const QString filter = tr("Individual measurements") + QLatin1String(" (*.") + smisExt +
6764  QLatin1String(" *.") + vitExt +
6765  QLatin1String(")");
6766  //Use standard path to individual measurements
6767  const QString dir = qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->getIndividualSizePath();
6768 
6769  bool usedNotExistedDir = false;
6770 
6771  QDir directory(dir);
6772  if (!directory.exists())
6773  {
6774  usedNotExistedDir = directory.mkpath(".");
6775  }
6776 
6777  filename = fileDialog(this, tr("Open file"), dir, filter, nullptr, QFileDialog::DontUseNativeDialog,
6778  QFileDialog::ExistingFile, QFileDialog::AcceptOpen);
6779 
6780  if (usedNotExistedDir)
6781  {
6782  QDir directory(dir);
6783  directory.rmpath(".");
6784  }
6785  }
6786  else
6787  {
6788  const QString filter = tr("Individual measurements") + QLatin1String(" (*.") + smisExt +
6789  QLatin1String(" *.") + vitExt +
6790  QLatin1String(");;") +
6791  tr("Multisize measurements") + QLatin1String(" (*.") + smmsExt +
6792  QLatin1String(" *.") + vstExt +
6793  QLatin1String(")");
6794 
6795  //Use standard path to individual measurements
6796  const QString dir = qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->getIndividualSizePath();
6797  VCommonSettings::prepareMultisizeTables(VCommonSettings::getDefaultMultisizePath());
6798 
6799  bool usedNotExistedDir = false;
6800  QDir directory(path);
6801  if (!directory.exists())
6802  {
6803  usedNotExistedDir = directory.mkpath(".");
6804  }
6805 
6806  filename = fileDialog(this, tr("Open file"), dir, filter, nullptr, QFileDialog::DontUseNativeDialog,
6807  QFileDialog::ExistingFile, QFileDialog::AcceptOpen);
6808 
6809  if (usedNotExistedDir)
6810  {
6811  QDir directory(dir);
6812  directory.rmpath(".");
6813  }
6814  }
6815 
6816  if (filename.isEmpty())
6817  {
6818  return filename;
6819  }
6820  else
6821  {
6822  QScopedPointer<MeasurementDoc> measurements(new MeasurementDoc(pattern));
6823  measurements->setSize(VContainer::rsize());
6824  measurements->setHeight(VContainer::rheight());
6825  measurements->setXMLContent(filename);
6826 
6827  patternType = measurements->Type();
6828 
6829  if (patternType == MeasurementsType::Unknown)
6830  {
6831  VException exception(tr("Measurement file has unknown format."));
6832  throw exception;
6833  }
6834 
6835  if (patternType == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
6836  {
6837  MultiSizeConverter converter(filename);
6838  QString filename = converter.Convert();
6839  if (filename.contains(QLatin1String(".") + vstExt))
6840  {
6841  filename.replace(QLatin1String(".") + vstExt, QLatin1String(".") + smmsExt);
6842  QString error;
6843  const bool result = measurements->SaveDocument(filename, error);
6844  if (result)
6845  {
6846  UpdateWindowTitle();
6847  }
6848  }
6849  measurements->setXMLContent(filename);// Read again after conversion
6850  }
6851  else
6852  {
6853  IndividualSizeConverter converter(filename);
6854  QString filename = converter.Convert();
6855  if (filename.contains(QLatin1String(".") + vitExt))
6856  {
6857  filename.replace(QLatin1String(".") + vitExt, QLatin1String(".") + smisExt);
6858  QString error;
6859  const bool result = measurements->SaveDocument(filename, error);
6860  if (result)
6861  {
6862  UpdateWindowTitle();
6863  }
6864  }
6865  measurements->setXMLContent(filename);// Read again after conversion
6866  }
6867 
6868  if (!measurements->eachKnownNameIsValid())
6869  {
6870  VException exception(tr("Measurement file contains invalid known measurement(s)."));
6871  throw exception;
6872  }
6873 
6874  checkRequiredMeasurements(measurements.data());
6875 
6876  qApp->setPatternType(patternType);
6877 
6878  doc->SetMPath(RelativeMPath(patternPath, filename));
6879  patternChangesWereSaved(false);
6880  return filename;
6881  }
6882  }
6883  }
6884  }
6885  return path;
6886 }
6887 
6888 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6889 void MainWindow::changeDraftBlock(int index, bool zoomBestFit)
6890 {
6891  if (index != -1)
6892  {
6893  doc->changeActiveDraftBlock(draftBlockComboBox->itemText(index));
6894  doc->setCurrentData();
6895  emit RefreshHistory();
6896  if (drawMode)
6897  {
6898  handleArrowTool(true);
6899  if (zoomBestFit)
6900  {
6901  zoomToSelected();
6902  }
6903  }
6904  toolProperties->itemClicked(nullptr);//hide options for tool in previous pattern piece
6905  groupsWidget->updateGroups();
6906  }
6907 }
6908 
6909 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6910 void MainWindow::EndVisualization(bool click)
6911 {
6912  if (!dialogTool.isNull())
6913  {
6914  dialogTool->ShowDialog(click);
6915  }
6916 }
6917 
6918 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6919 /**
6920  * @brief zoomFirstShow Fit scene size to best size for first show
6921  */
6922 void MainWindow::zoomFirstShow()
6923 {
6924  /* If don't call zoomToFit() twice, after first scaling or moving pattern piece, scene change coordinate and whole
6925  * pattern will be moved. Looks very ugly. It is best solution that i have now.
6926  */
6927  if (pattern->DataPieces()->size() > 0)
6928  {
6929  showPieceMode(true);
6930  ui->view->zoomToFit();
6931  }
6932  if (!ui->showDraftMode->isChecked())
6933  {
6934  showDraftMode(true);
6935  }
6936  zoomToSelected();
6937 
6938  VMainGraphicsView::NewSceneRect(draftScene, ui->view);
6939  VMainGraphicsView::NewSceneRect(pieceScene, ui->view);
6940 
6941  if (pattern->DataPieces()->size() > 0)
6942  {
6943  showPieceMode(true);
6944  ui->view->zoomToFit();
6945  }
6946 
6947  if (!ui->showDraftMode->isChecked())
6948  {
6949  showDraftMode(true);
6950  }
6951 }
6952 
6953 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6954 void MainWindow::DoExport(const VCommandLinePtr &expParams)
6955 {
6956  const QHash<quint32, VPiece> *pieces = pattern->DataPieces();
6957  if(!qApp->getOpeningPattern())
6958  {
6959  if (pieces->count() == 0)
6960  {
6961  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("You can't export empty scene.")));
6962  qApp->exit(V_EX_DATAERR);
6963  return;
6964  }
6965  }
6966  pieceList = preparePiecesForLayout(*pieces);
6967 
6968  const bool exportOnlyPieces = expParams->exportOnlyPieces();
6969  if (exportOnlyPieces)
6970  {
6971  try
6972  {
6973  ExportLayoutDialog dialog(1, Draw::Modeling, expParams->OptBaseName(), this);
6974  dialog.setDestinationPath(expParams->OptDestinationPath());
6975  dialog.selectFormat(static_cast<LayoutExportFormat>(expParams->OptExportType()));
6976  dialog.setBinaryDXFFormat(expParams->IsBinaryDXF());
6977  dialog.setTextAsPaths(expParams->isTextAsPaths());
6978 
6979  ExportData(pieceList, dialog);
6980  }
6981 
6982  catch (const VException &exception)
6983  {
6984  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Export exception.")), qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()));
6985  qApp->exit(V_EX_DATAERR);
6986  return;
6987  }
6988  }
6989  else
6990  {
6991  auto settings = expParams->DefaultGenerator();
6992  settings->SetTestAsPaths(expParams->isTextAsPaths());
6993 
6994  if (LayoutSettings(*settings.get()))
6995  {
6996  try
6997  {
6998  ExportLayoutDialog dialog(scenes.size(), Draw::Layout, expParams->OptBaseName(), this);
6999  dialog.setDestinationPath(expParams->OptDestinationPath());
7000  dialog.selectFormat(static_cast<LayoutExportFormat>(expParams->OptExportType()));
7001  dialog.setBinaryDXFFormat(expParams->IsBinaryDXF());
7002 
7003  ExportData(pieceList, dialog);
7004  }
7005 
7006  catch (const VException &exception)
7007  {
7008  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Export exception.")), qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()));
7009  qApp->exit(V_EX_DATAERR);
7010  return;
7011  }
7012  }
7013  else
7014  {
7015  return;
7016  }
7017  }
7018 
7019  qApp->exit(V_EX_OK);
7020 }
7021 
7022 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7023 bool MainWindow::setSize(const QString &text)
7024 {
7025  if (!VApplication::IsGUIMode())
7026  {
7027  if (this->isWindowModified() || not qApp->getFilePath().isEmpty())
7028  {
7029  if (qApp->patternType() == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
7030  {
7031  const int size = static_cast<int>(UnitConvertor(text.toInt(), Unit::Cm, *pattern->GetPatternUnit()));
7032  const qint32 index = gradationSizes->findText(QString().setNum(size));
7033  if (index != -1)
7034  {
7035  gradationSizes->setCurrentIndex(index);
7036  }
7037  else
7038  {
7039  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s",
7040  qUtf8Printable(tr("Not supported size value '%1' for this pattern file.").arg(text)));
7041  return false;
7042  }
7043  }
7044  else
7045  {
7046  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s",
7047  qUtf8Printable(tr("Couldn't set size. Need a file with multisize measurements.")));
7048  return false;
7049  }
7050  }
7051  else
7052  {
7053  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Couldn't set size. File wasn't opened.")));
7054  return false;
7055  }
7056  }
7057  else
7058  {
7059  qCWarning(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("The method %1 does nothing in GUI mode").arg(Q_FUNC_INFO)));
7060  return false;
7061  }
7062  return true;
7063 }
7064 
7065 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7066 bool MainWindow::setHeight(const QString &text)
7067 {
7068  if (!VApplication::IsGUIMode())
7069  {
7070  if (this->isWindowModified() || not qApp->getFilePath().isEmpty())
7071  {
7072  if (qApp->patternType() == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
7073  {
7074  const int height = static_cast<int>(UnitConvertor(text.toInt(), Unit::Cm, *pattern->GetPatternUnit()));
7075  const qint32 index = gradationHeights->findText(QString().setNum(height));
7076  if (index != -1)
7077  {
7078  gradationHeights->setCurrentIndex(index);
7079  }
7080  else
7081  {
7082  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s",
7083  qUtf8Printable(tr("Not supported height value '%1' for this pattern file.").arg(text)));
7084  return false;
7085  }
7086  }
7087  else
7088  {
7089  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s",
7090  qUtf8Printable(tr("Couldn't set height. Need a file with multisize measurements.")));
7091  return false;
7092  }
7093  }
7094  else
7095  {
7096  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Couldn't set height. File wasn't opened.")));
7097  return false;
7098  }
7099  }
7100  else
7101  {
7102  qCWarning(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("The method %1 does nothing in GUI mode").arg(Q_FUNC_INFO)));
7103  return false;
7104  }
7105  return true;
7106 }
7107 
7108 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7109 void MainWindow::ProcessCMD()
7110 {
7111  const VCommandLinePtr cmd = qApp->CommandLine();
7112  auto args = cmd->OptInputFileNames();
7113 
7114  isNoScaling = cmd->IsNoScalingEnabled();
7115 
7116  if (VApplication::IsGUIMode())
7117  {
7118  ReopenFilesAfterCrash(args);
7119  }
7120  else
7121  {
7122  if (args.size() != 1)
7123  {
7124  qCritical() << tr("Please, provide one input file.");
7125  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
7126  return;
7127  }
7128  }
7129 
7130  for (int i=0, sz = args.size(); i < sz; ++i)
7131  {
7132  const bool loaded = LoadPattern(args.at(static_cast<int>(i)), cmd->OptMeasurePath());
7133 
7134  if (!loaded && not VApplication::IsGUIMode())
7135  {
7136  return; // process only one input file
7137  }
7138 
7139  bool hSetted = true;
7140  bool sSetted = true;
7141  if (loaded && (cmd->IsTestModeEnabled() || cmd->IsExportEnabled()))
7142  {
7143  if (cmd->IsSetGradationSize())
7144  {
7145  sSetted = setSize(cmd->OptGradationSize());
7146  }
7147 
7148  if (cmd->IsSetGradationHeight())
7149  {
7150  hSetted = setHeight(cmd->OptGradationHeight());
7151  }
7152  }
7153 
7154  if (!cmd->IsTestModeEnabled())
7155  {
7156  if (cmd->IsExportEnabled())
7157  {
7158  if (loaded && hSetted && sSetted)
7159  {
7160  DoExport(cmd);
7161  return; // process only one input file
7162  }
7163  else
7164  {
7165  qApp->exit(V_EX_DATAERR);
7166  return;
7167  }
7168  break;
7169  }
7170  }
7171  }
7172 
7173  if (!VApplication::IsGUIMode())
7174  {
7175  qApp->exit(V_EX_OK);// close program after processing in console mode
7176  }
7177 }
7178 
7179 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7180 QString MainWindow::GetPatternFileName()
7181 {
7182  QString shownName = tr("untitled.sm2d");
7183  if(!qApp->getFilePath().isEmpty())
7184  {
7185  shownName = qApp->getFilePath();
7186  }
7187  shownName += QLatin1String("[*]");
7188  return shownName;
7189 }
7190 
7191 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7192 QString MainWindow::GetMeasurementFileName()
7193 {
7194  if(doc->MPath().isEmpty())
7195  {
7196  return "";
7197  }
7198  else
7199  {
7200  QString shownName(" - [");
7201  shownName += strippedName(AbsoluteMPath(qApp->getFilePath(), doc->MPath()));
7202 
7203  if(mChanges)
7204  {
7205  shownName += QLatin1String("*");
7206  }
7207 
7208  shownName += QLatin1String("]");
7209  return shownName;
7210  }
7211 }
7212 
7213 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7214 void MainWindow::UpdateWindowTitle()
7215 {
7216  bool isFileWritable = true;
7217  if (!qApp->getFilePath().isEmpty())
7218  {
7219 #ifdef Q_OS_WIN32
7220  qt_ntfs_permission_lookup++; // turn checking on
7221 #endif /*Q_OS_WIN32*/
7222  isFileWritable = QFileInfo(qApp->getFilePath()).isWritable();
7223 #ifdef Q_OS_WIN32
7224  qt_ntfs_permission_lookup--; // turn it off again
7225 #endif /*Q_OS_WIN32*/
7226  }
7227 
7228  if (!patternReadOnly && isFileWritable)
7229  {
7230  setWindowTitle(VER_INTERNALNAME_STR + QString(" - ") + GetPatternFileName() + GetMeasurementFileName());
7231  }
7232  else
7233  {
7234  setWindowTitle(VER_INTERNALNAME_STR + QString(" - ") + GetPatternFileName() +
7235  GetMeasurementFileName() + QString(" - ") + tr("read only"));
7236  }
7237  setWindowFilePath(qApp->getFilePath());
7238 
7239 #if defined(Q_OS_MAC)
7240  static QIcon fileIcon = QIcon(QCoreApplication::applicationDirPath() +
7241  QLatin1String("/../Resources/Seamly2D.icns"));
7242  QIcon icon;
7243  if (!qApp->getFilePath().isEmpty())
7244  {
7245  if (!isWindowModified())
7246  {
7247  icon = fileIcon;
7248  }
7249  else
7250  {
7251  static QIcon darkIcon;
7252 
7253  if (darkIcon.isNull())
7254  {
7255  darkIcon = QIcon(darkenPixmap(fileIcon.pixmap(16, 16)));
7256  }
7257  icon = darkIcon;
7258  }
7259  }
7260  setWindowIcon(icon);
7261 #endif //defined(Q_OS_MAC)
7262 }
7263 
7264 void MainWindow::upDateScenes()
7265 {
7266  if (draftScene)
7267  {
7268  draftScene->update();
7269  }
7270 
7271  if (pieceScene)
7272  {
7273  pieceScene->update();
7274  }
7275 }
7276 
7277 void MainWindow::updateViewToolbar()
7278 {
7279  ui->toggleWireframe_Action->setChecked(qApp->Settings()->isWireframe());
7280  ui->toggleControlPoints_Action->setChecked(qApp->Settings()->getShowControlPoints());
7281  ui->toggleAxisOrigin_Action->setChecked(qApp->Settings()->getShowAxisOrigin());
7282  ui->toggleGrainLines_Action->setChecked(qApp->Settings()->showGrainlines());
7283  ui->toggleSeamAllowances_Action->setChecked(qApp->Settings()->showSeamAllowances());
7284  ui->toggleLabels_Action->setChecked(qApp->Settings()->showLabels());
7285 }
7286 
7287 void MainWindow::resetPanShortcuts()
7288 {
7289  QList<QKeySequence> zoomPanShortcuts;
7290  zoomPanShortcuts = ui->zoomPan_Action->shortcuts();
7291  zoomPanShortcuts.removeAll(QKeySequence(Qt::Key_Space));
7292  if (!qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->isPanActiveSpaceKey())
7293  {
7294  zoomPanShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::Key_Space));
7295  }
7296  ui->zoomPan_Action->setShortcuts(zoomPanShortcuts);
7297 }
7298 
7299 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7300 bool MainWindow::IgnoreLocking(int error, const QString &path)
7301 {
7302  QMessageBox::StandardButton answer = QMessageBox::Abort;
7303  if (VApplication::IsGUIMode())
7304  {
7305  switch(error)
7306  {
7307  case QLockFile::LockFailedError:
7308  answer = QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Locking file"),
7309  tr("This file already opened in another window. Ignore if you want "
7310  "to continue (not recommended, can cause a data corruption)."),
7311  QMessageBox::Abort|QMessageBox::Ignore, QMessageBox::Abort);
7312  break;
7313  case QLockFile::PermissionError:
7314  answer = QMessageBox::question(this, tr("Locking file"),
7315  tr("The lock file could not be created, for lack of permissions. "
7316  "Ignore if you want to continue (not recommended, can cause "
7317  "a data corruption)."),
7318  QMessageBox::Abort|QMessageBox::Ignore, QMessageBox::Abort);
7319  break;
7320  case QLockFile::UnknownError:
7321  answer = QMessageBox::question(this, tr("Locking file"),
7322  tr("Unknown error happened, for instance a full partition prevented "
7323  "writing out the lock file. Ignore if you want to continue (not "
7324  "recommended, can cause a data corruption)."),
7325  QMessageBox::Abort|QMessageBox::Ignore, QMessageBox::Abort);
7326  break;
7327  default:
7328  answer = QMessageBox::Abort;
7329  break;
7330  }
7331  }
7332 
7333  if (answer == QMessageBox::Abort)
7334  {
7335  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Failed to lock %s", qUtf8Printable(path));
7336  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Error type: %d", error);
7337  Clear();
7338  if (!VApplication::IsGUIMode())
7339  {
7340  switch(error)
7341  {
7342  case QLockFile::LockFailedError:
7343  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s",
7344  qUtf8Printable(tr("This file already opened in another window.")));
7345  break;
7346  case QLockFile::PermissionError:
7347  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s",
7348  qUtf8Printable(tr("The lock file could not be created, for lack of permissions.")));
7349  break;
7350  case QLockFile::UnknownError:
7351  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s",
7352  qUtf8Printable(tr("Unknown error happened, for instance a full partition prevented "
7353  "writing out the lock file.")));
7354  break;
7355  default:
7356  break;
7357  }
7358 
7359  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
7360  }
7361  return false;
7362  }
7363  return true;
7364 }
7365 
7366 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7367 /**
7368  * @brief draftPointNamesList gets the list of points in draft mode.
7369  */
7370 QStringList MainWindow::draftPointNamesList()
7371 {
7372  QStringList pointNames;
7373  for (QHash<quint32, QSharedPointer<VGObject>>::const_iterator item = pattern->DataGObjects()->begin();
7374  item != pattern->DataGObjects()->end();
7375  ++item)
7376  {
7377  if (item.value()->getType() == GOType::Point && !pointNames.contains(item.value()->name()))
7378  pointNames << item.value()->name();
7379  }
7380  pointNames.sort();
7381  pointNames.removeDuplicates();
7382  return pointNames;
7383 }
7384 
7385 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7386 /**
7387  * @brief updateZoomToPointComboBox updates the list of points included in the toolbar combobox.
7388  */
7389 void MainWindow::updateZoomToPointComboBox(QStringList namesList)
7390 {
7391  m_zoomToPointComboBox->blockSignals(true); // prevent this UI update from zooming to the first point
7392  m_zoomToPointComboBox->clear();
7393  m_zoomToPointComboBox->addItems(namesList);
7394  m_zoomToPointComboBox->blockSignals(false);
7395 }
7396 
7397 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7398 void MainWindow::ToolSelectPoint() const
7399 {
7400  // Only true for rubber band selection
7401  emit EnableLabelSelection(false);
7402  emit EnablePointSelection(false);
7403  emit EnableLineSelection(false);
7404  emit EnableArcSelection(false);
7405  emit EnableElArcSelection(false);
7406  emit EnableSplineSelection(false);
7407  emit EnableSplinePathSelection(false);
7408 
7409  // Hovering
7410  emit EnableLabelHover(true);
7411  emit EnablePointHover(true);
7412  emit EnableLineHover(false);
7413  emit EnableArcHover(false);
7414  emit EnableElArcHover(false);
7415  emit EnableSplineHover(false);
7416  emit EnableSplinePathHover(false);
7417 
7418  ui->view->allowRubberBand(false);
7419 }
7420

7423 {
7424  ToolSelectPoint();

7426 }

7513 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7514 void MainWindow::ToolSelectPointArc() const
7515 {

7517  emit EnableLabelSelection(false);
7518  emit EnablePointSelection(false);
7519  emit EnableLineSelection(false);
7520  emit EnableArcSelection(false);
7521  emit EnableElArcSelection(false);
7522  emit EnableSplineSelection(false);

7524 
7525  // Hovering
7526  emit EnableLabelHover(true);
7527  emit EnablePointHover(true);
7528  emit EnableLineHover(false);

7530  emit EnableElArcHover(false);

7532  emit EnableSplinePathHover(false);
7533 
7534  emit ItemsSelection(SelectionType::ByMouseRelease);
7535 
7536  ui->view->allowRubberBand(false);
7537 }
7538 
7539 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7540 void MainWindow::ToolSelectCurve() const
7541 {
7542  // Only true for rubber band selection
7543  emit EnableLabelSelection(false);
7544  emit EnablePointSelection(false);
7545  emit EnableLineSelection(false);
7546  emit EnableArcSelection(false);
7547  emit EnableElArcSelection(false);
7548  emit EnableSplineSelection(false);
7549  emit EnableSplinePathSelection(false);
7550 
7551  // Hovering
7552  emit EnableLabelHover(false);
7553  emit EnablePointHover(false);
7554  emit EnableLineHover(false);
7555  emit EnableArcHover(true);
7556  emit EnableElArcHover(true);
7557  emit EnableSplineHover(true);
7558  emit EnableSplinePathHover(true);
7559 
7560  emit ItemsSelection(SelectionType::ByMouseRelease);
7561 
7562  ui->view->allowRubberBand(false);
7563 }
7564 
7565 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7566 void MainWindow::selectAllDraftObjectsTool() const
7567 {
7568  // Only true for rubber band selection
7569  emit EnableLabelSelection(false);
7570  emit EnablePointSelection(false);
7571  emit EnableLineSelection(false);
7572  emit EnableArcSelection(false);
7573  emit EnableElArcSelection(false);
7574  emit EnableSplineSelection(false);
7575  emit EnableSplinePathSelection(false);
7576 
7577  // Hovering
7578  emit EnableLabelHover(true);
7579  emit EnablePointHover(true);
7580  emit EnableLineHover(false);
7581  emit EnableArcHover(true);
7582  emit EnableElArcHover(true);
7583  emit EnableSplineHover(true);
7584  emit EnableSplinePathHover(true);
7585 
7586  emit ItemsSelection(SelectionType::ByMouseRelease);
7587 
7588  ui->view->allowRubberBand(false);
7589 }
7590 
7591 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7592 void MainWindow::ToolSelectOperationObjects() const
7593 {
7594  // Only true for rubber band selection
7595  emit EnableLabelSelection(true);
7596  emit EnablePointSelection(true);
7597  emit EnableLineSelection(false);
7598  emit EnableArcSelection(true);
7599  emit EnableElArcSelection(true);
7600  emit EnableSplineSelection(true);
7601  emit EnableSplinePathSelection(true);
7602 
7603  // Hovering
7604  emit EnableLabelHover(true);
7605  emit EnablePointHover(true);
7606  emit EnableLineHover(false);
7607  emit EnableArcHover(true);
7608  emit EnableElArcHover(true);
7609  emit EnableSplineHover(true);
7610  emit EnableSplinePathHover(true);
7611 
7612  emit ItemsSelection(SelectionType::ByMouseRelease);
7613 
7614  ui->view->allowRubberBand(true);
7615 }
7616 
7617 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7618 void MainWindow::ToolSelectGroupObjects() const
7619 {
7620  ToolSelectOperationObjects();
7621  // Only true for rubber band selection
7622  emit EnableLineSelection(true);
7623 
7624  // Hovering
7625  emit EnableLineHover(true);
7626 }
7627 
7628 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7629 void MainWindow::selectPieceTool() const
7630 {
7631  // Only true for rubber band selection
7632  emit EnableNodeLabelSelection(false);
7633  emit EnableNodePointSelection(false);
7634  emit enablePieceSelection(true); // Disable when done with pattern piece visualization.
7635 
7636  // Hovering
7637  emit EnableNodeLabelHover(true);
7638  emit EnableNodePointHover(true);
7639  emit enablePieceHover(true);
7640 
7641  emit ItemsSelection(SelectionType::ByMouseRelease);
7642 
7643  ui->view->allowRubberBand(false);
7644 }
